h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T5.0001^ea^ ^a^V3.0001^ea^ ^a^P5.0001^ea^ ^a^M3.0257^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --
[03] ``kimatthiyaani ^a^V3.0002^ea^, bhante, kusalaani siilaani kimaanisa.msaanii''ti? ``avippa.tisaaratthaani kho, aananda, kusalaani siilaani avippa.tisaaraanisa.msaanii''ti.
[03] ``avippa.tisaaro pana, bhante, kimatthiyo kimaanisa.mso''ti? ``avippa.tisaaro kho, aananda, paamojjattho paamojjaanisa.mso''ti {paamujjattho paamujjaanisa.msoti (sii0 syaa0 pii0) a0 ni0 11.1}.
[03] ``paamojja.m pana, bhante, kimatthiya.m kimaanisa.msa''nti? ``paamojja.m kho, aananda, piitattha.m piitaanisa.msa''nti.
[03] ``piiti pana, bhante, kimatthiyaa kimaanisa.msaa''ti? ``piiti kho, aananda, passaddhatthaa passaddhaanisa.msaa''ti.
[03] ``passaddhi ^a^M3.0258^ea^ pana, bhante, kimatthiyaa kimaanisa.msaa''ti? ``passaddhi kho ^a^T5.0002^ea^, aananda, sukhatthaa sukhaanisa.msaa''ti.
[03] ``sukha.m pana, bhante, kimatthiya.m kimaanisa.msa''nti? ``sukha.m kho, aananda, samaadhattha.m samaadhaanisa.msa''nti ^a^P5.0002^ea^.
[03] ``samaadhi pana, bhante, kimatthiyo kimaanisa.mso''ti? ``samaadhi kho, aananda, yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanattho yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanaanisa.mso''ti.
[03] ``yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m pana, bhante, kimatthiya.m kimaanisa.msa''nti? ``yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m kho, aananda, nibbidaaviraagattha.m nibbidaaviraagaanisa.msa''nti.
[03] ``nibbidaaviraago pana, bhante kimatthiyo kimaanisa.mso''ti? ``nibbidaaviraago kho, aananda, vimutti~naa.nadassanattho vimutti~naa.nadassanaanisa.mso {... nisa.msoti (sii0 ka0)}.

[03] ``iti kho, aananda, kusalaani siilaani avippa.tisaaratthaani avippa.tisaaraanisa.msaani; avippa.tisaaro ^a^V3.0003^ea^ paamojjattho paamojjaanisa.mso; paamojja.m piitattha.m piitaanisa.msa.m; piiti passaddhatthaa passaddhaanisa.msaa; passaddhi sukhatthaa sukhaanisa.msaa; sukha.m samaadhattha.m samaadhaanisa.msa.m; samaadhi yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanattho yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanaanisa.mso; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m nibbidaaviraagattha.m nibbidaaviraagaanisa.msa.m; nibbidaaviraago vimutti~naa.nadassanattho vimutti~naa.nadassanaanisa.mso. iti kho, aananda, kusalaani siilaani anupubbena aggaaya parentii''ti {arahattaaya puurentiiti (syaa0)}. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 11.2} ``siilavato, bhikkhave, siilasampannassa na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `avippa.tisaaro me uppajjatuu'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m siilavato siilasampannassa avippa.tisaaro uppajjati. avippa.tisaarissa, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `paamojja.m me uppajjatuu'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m avippa.tisaarissa paamojja.m jaayati. pamuditassa, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya ^a^T5.0003^ea^ kara.niiya.m -- `piiti me uppajjatuu'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m pamuditassa piiti ^a^P5.0003^ea^ uppajjati. piitimanassa, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `kaayo me passambhatuu'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m piitimanassa ^a^M3.0259^ea^ kaayo passambhati. passaddhakaayassa, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `sukha.m vediyaamii'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m passaddhakaayo sukha.m vediyati. sukhino, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `citta.m me samaadhiyatuu'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. samaahitassa, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `yathaabhuuta.m jaanaami passaamii'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m samaahito yathaabhuuta.m jaanaati passati. yathaabhuuta.m, bhikkhave, jaanato passato na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `nibbindaami virajjaamii'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m yathaabhuuta.m jaana.m passa.m nibbindati virajjati. nibbinnassa {nibbindassa (sii0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, virattassa na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `vimutti~naa.nadassana.m sacchikaromii'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m nibbinno {nibbindo (sii0 ka0)} viratto vimutti~naa.nadassana.m sacchikaroti.

[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, nibbidaaviraago vimutti~naa.nadassanattho vimutti~naa.nadassanaanisa.mso; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m nibbidaaviraagattha.m nibbidaaviraagaanisa.msa.m; samaadhi yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanattho yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanaanisa.mso; sukha.m samaadhattha.m samaadhaanisa.msa.m; passaddhi sukhatthaa ^a^V3.0004^ea^ sukhaanisa.msaa; piiti passaddhatthaa passaddhaanisa.msaa; paamojja.m piitattha.m piitaanisa.msa.m; avippa.tisaaro paamojjattho paamojjaanisa.mso; kusalaani siilaani avippa.tisaaratthaani avippa.tisaaraanisa.msaani ^a^T5.0004^ea^. iti kho, bhikkhave, dhammaa dhamme ^a^P5.0004^ea^ abhisandenti, dhammaa dhamme paripuurenti apaaraa paara.m gamanaayaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 5.24; 11.3} ``dussiilassa, bhikkhave, siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti avippa.tisaaro; avippa.tisaare asati avippa.tisaaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti paamojja.m; paamojje asati paamojjavipannassa hatuupanisaa hoti piiti; piitiyaa asati piitivipannassa hatuupanisaa hoti passaddhi; passaddhiyaa asati passaddhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti sukha.m; sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti nibbidaaviraago ^a^M3.0260^ea^; nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasavipanno. tassa papa.tikaapi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi... pheggupi... saaropi na paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, dussiilassa siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti avippa.tisaaro; avippa.tisaare asati avippa.tisaaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.

[03] ``siilavato, bhikkhave, siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippa.tisaaro; avippa.tisaare sati avippa.tisaarasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti paamojja.m; paamojje sati paamojjasampannassa upanisasampannaa hoti piiti; piitiyaa sati piitisampannassa upanisasampannaa hoti passaddhi; passaddhiyaa sati passaddhisampannassa ^a^T5.0005^ea^ upanisasampanna.m hoti sukha.m; sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammaasamaadhi ^a^P5.0005^ea^; sammaasamaadhimhi sati sammaasamaadhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage sati nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasasampanno. tassa papa.tikaapi paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi... pheggupi... saaropi paaripuuri.m ^a^V3.0005^ea^ gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, siilavato siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippa.tisaaro; avippa.tisaare sati avippa.tisaarasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 11.4} tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``dussiilassa, aavuso, siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti avippa.tisaaro; avippa.tisaare asati avippa.tisaaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, aavuso, rukkho saakhaapalaasavipanno. tassa papa.tikaapi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi... pheggupi... saaropi na paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, aavuso, dussiilassa siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti avippa.tisaaro; avippa.tisaare asati avippa.tisaaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.

[03] ``siilavato ^a^M3.0261^ea^, aavuso, siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippa.tisaaro; avippa.tisaare sati avippa.tisaarasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti...pe0 ^a^T5.0006^ea^... vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, aavuso, rukkho saakhaapalaasasampanno. tassa papa.tikaapi paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi... pheggupi... saaropi paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, aavuso, siilavato siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippa.tisaaro; avippa.tisaare sati avippa.tisaarasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 11.5} tatra ^a^T5.0007^ea^ ^a^P5.0006^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``dussiilassa, aavuso, siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti avippa.tisaaro; avippa.tisaare asati avippa.tisaaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti paamojja.m; paamojje asati paamojjavipannassa hatuupanisaa hoti piiti; piitiyaa asati piitivipannassa hatuupanisaa hoti passaddhi; passaddhiyaa asati passaddhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti sukha.m; sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi; sammaasamaadhimhi asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage asati nibbidaaviraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, aavuso, rukkho saakhaapalaasavipanno. tassa papa.tikaapi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi... pheggupi... saaropi na paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, aavuso, dussiilassa siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti avippa.tisaaro; avippa.tisaare asati avippa.tisaaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.

[03] ``siilavato, aavuso, siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippa.tisaaro; avippa.tisaare sati avippa.tisaarasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti paamojja.m; paamojje sati paamojjasampannassa upanisasampannaa hoti piiti; piitiyaa sati piitisampannassa upanisasampannaa hoti passaddhi; passaddhiyaa sati passaddhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti sukha.m; sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammaasamaadhi ^a^T5.0008^ea^; sammaasamaadhimhi sati sammaasamaadhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m ^a^V3.0006^ea^; yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane ^a^M3.0262^ea^ sati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidaaviraago; nibbidaaviraage sati nibbidaaviraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m. seyyathaapi, aavuso, rukkho saakhaapalaasasampanno ^a^P5.0007^ea^. tassa papa.tikaapi paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi... pheggupi... saaropi paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, aavuso, siilavato siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippa.tisaaro; avippa.tisaare sati avippa.tisaarasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 11.18} atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``siyaa nu kho, bhante, bhikkhuno tathaaruupo samaadhipa.tilaabho yathaa neva pathaviya.m pathavisa~n~nii {pa.thavisa~n~nii (sii0), pa.thaviisa~n~nii (syaa0)} assa, na aapasmi.m aaposa~n~nii assa, na tejasmi.m tejosa~n~nii assa, na vaayasmi.m vaayosa~n~nii assa, na aakaasaana~ncaayatane aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na aaki~nca~n~naayatane aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na idhaloke idhalokasa~n~nii assa, na paraloke paralokasa~n~nii assa ^a^V3.0007^ea^; sa~n~nii ca pana assaa''ti? ``siyaa, aananda, bhikkhuno tathaaruupo samaadhipa.tilaabho ^a^T5.0009^ea^ yathaa neva pathaviya.m pathavisa~n~nii assa, na aapasmi.m aaposa~n~nii assa, na tejasmi.m tejosa~n~nii assa, na vaayasmi.m vaayosa~n~nii assa, na aakaasaana~ncaayatane aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na aaki~nca~n~naayatane aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na idhaloke idhalokasa~n~nii assa, na paraloke paralokasa~n~nii assa; sa~n~nii ca pana assaa''ti.

[03] ``yathaa katha.m pana, bhante, siyaa bhikkhuno tathaaruupo samaadhipa.tilaabho yathaa neva pathaviya.m pathavisa~n~nii assa, na aapasmi.m aaposa~n~nii assa na tejasmi.m tejosa~n~nii assa ^a^P5.0008^ea^, na vaayasmi.m vaayosa~n~nii assa, na aakaasaana~ncaayatane aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na ^a^M3.0263^ea^ vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na aaki~nca~n~naayattane aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na idhaloke idhalokasa~n~nii assa, na paraloke paralokasa~n~nii assa; sa~n~nii ca pana assaa''ti?

[03] ``idhaananda, bhikkhu eva.msa~n~nii hoti -- `eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana'nti. eva.m kho, aananda, siyaa bhikkhuno tathaaruupo samaadhipa.tilaabho yathaa neva pathaviya.m pathavisa~n~nii assa, na aapasmi.m aaposa~n~nii assa, na tejasmi.m tejosa~n~nii assa, na vaayasmi.m ^a^T5.0010^ea^ vaayosa~n~nii assa, na aakaasaana~ncaayatane aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na aaki~nca~n~naayatane aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na idhaloke idhalokasa~n~nii assa, na paraloke paralokasa~n~nii assa; sa~n~nii ca pana assaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa ^a^V3.0008^ea^ saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``siyaa nu kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhuno tathaaruupo samaadhipa.tilaabho yathaa neva pathaviya.m pathavisa~n~nii assa, na aapasmi.m aaposa~n~nii assa, na tejasmi.m tejosa~n~nii assa, na vaayasmi.m vaayosa~n~nii assa, na aakaasaana~ncaayatane aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~nii ^a^P5.0009^ea^ assa, na vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na aaki~nca~n~naayatane aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na idhaloke idhalokasa~n~nii assa, na paraloke paralokasa~n~nii assa; sa~n~nii ca pana assaa''ti?

[03] ``siyaa ^a^M3.0264^ea^, aavuso aananda, bhikkhuno tathaaruupo samaadhipa.tilaabho yathaa neva pathaviya.m pathavisa~n~nii assa...pe0... na paraloke paralokasa~n~nii assa; sa~n~nii ^a^T5.0011^ea^ ca pana assaa''ti.

[03] ``yathaa katha.m pana, aavuso saariputta, siyaa bhikkhuno tathaaruupo samaadhipa.tilaabho yathaa neva pathaviya.m pathavisa~n~nii assa...pe0... sa~n~nii ca pana assaa''ti? ``ekamidaaha.m, aavuso aananda, samaya.m idheva saavatthiya.m viharaami andhavanasmi.m. tatthaaha.m {athaaha.m (ka0)} tathaaruupa.m samaadhi.m samaapajji.m {pa.tilabhaami (ka0)} yathaa neva pathaviya.m pathavisa~n~nii ahosi.m, na aapasmi.m aaposa~n~nii ahosi.m, na tejasmi.m tejosa~n~nii ahosi.m, na vaayasmi.m vaayosa~n~nii ahosi.m, na aakaasaana~ncaayatane aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~nii ahosi.m, na vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~nii ahosi.m, na aaki~nca~n~naayatane aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~nii ahosi.m, na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~nii ahosi.m, na idhaloke idhalokasa~n~nii ahosi.m, na paraloke paralokasa~n~nii ahosi.m; sa~n~nii ca pana ahosi''nti.

[03] ``ki.msa~n~nii panaayasmaa saariputto {ki.m sa~n~nii panaavuso saariputta (ka0)} tasmi.m samaye ahosii''ti? ``bhavanirodho nibbaana.m bhavanirodho nibbaana''nti kho me, aavuso, a~n~naava sa~n~naa uppajjati a~n~naava sa~n~naa nirujjhati. seyyathaapi, aavuso, sakalikaggissa jhaayamaanassa a~n~naava acci uppajjati a~n~naava acci nirujjhati; evameva.m kho, aavuso, `bhavanirodho nibbaana.m bhavanirodho nibbaana'nti ^a^V3.0009^ea^ a~n~naava sa~n~naa uppajjati ^a^P5.0010^ea^ a~n~naava sa~n~naa nirujjhati. `bhavanirodho nibbaana'nti {nibbaana.m (sii0 ka0)} sa~n~nii ca panaaha.m, aavuso, tasmi.m samaye ahosi''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``saddho ca {imasmi.m vaakye aya.m ca kaaro natthi syaamapotthake}, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti, no ca {no (syaa0) evamuparipi. a0 ni0 8.71} siilavaa; eva.m so tena"ngena ^a^T5.0012^ea^ aparipuuro hoti. tena ta.m a"nga.m paripuuretabba.m -- `kintaaha.m saddho ca assa.m, siilavaa caa'ti! yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti siilavaa ca, eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti.

[03] ``saddho ^a^M3.0265^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti siilavaa ca, no ca bahussuto...pe0... bahussuto ca, no ca dhammakathiko... dhammakathiko ca, no ca parisaavacaro... parisaavacaro ca, no ca visaarado parisaaya dhamma.m deseti... visaarado ca parisaaya dhamma.m deseti, no ca vinayadharo... vinayadharo ca, no ca aara~n~niko {aara~n~nako (ka0)} pantasenaasano... aara~n~niko ca pantasenaasano, no ca catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii... catunna~nca jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, no ca aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. tena ta.m a"nga.m paripuuretabba.m -- `kintaaha.m saddho ca assa.m, siilavaa ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisaavacaro ca, visaarado ca parisaaya dhamma.m deseyya.m, vinayadharo ca, aara~n~niko ca pantasenaasano, catunna~nca jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m ^a^P5.0011^ea^ di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii assa.m akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'nti.

[03] ``yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti, siilavaa ca, bahussuto ^a^T5.0013^ea^ ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisaavacaro ca, visaarado ca parisaaya dhamma.m deseti, vinayadharo ca, aara~n~niko ca pantasenaasano, catunna~nca jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii ^a^V3.0010^ea^ hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati; eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu samantapaasaadiko ca hoti sabbaakaaraparipuuro caa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti, no ca siilavaa...pe0... siilavaa ca, no ca bahussuto... bahussuto ca, no ca dhammakathiko... dhammakathiko ca, no ^a^M3.0266^ea^ ca parisaavacaro... parisaavacaro ca, no ca visaarado parisaaya dhamma.m deseti... visaarado ca parisaaya dhamma.m deseti, no ca vinayadharo... vinayadharo ca, no ca aara~n~niko pantasenaasano... aara~n~niko ca pantasenaasano, no ca ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa te kaayena phusitvaa viharati... ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa ^a^P5.0012^ea^ te ca kaayena phusitvaa viharati, no ca aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. tena ta.m a"nga.m paripuuretabba.m -- `kintaaha.m saddho ca assa.m, siilavaa ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisaavacaro ca, visaarado ca parisaaya dhamma.m deseyya.m, vinayadharo ca, aara~n~niko ca pantasenaasano, ye ^a^T5.0014^ea^ te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa te ca kaayena phusitvaa vihareyya.m, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'nti.

[03] ``yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti, siilavaa ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisaavacaro ca, visaarado ca parisaaya dhamma.m deseti, vinayadharo ca, aara~n~niko ca pantasenaasano, ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa te ca kaayena phusitvaa viharati, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati; eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu samantapaasaadiko ca hoti sabbaakaaraparipuuro caa''ti. navama.m.

[03] ``saddho ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti siilavaa ca, no ca bahussuto bahussuto ca, no ca dhammakathiko dhammakathiko ca, no ca parisaavacaro parisaavacaro ca, no ca visaarado parisaaya dhamma.m deseti visaarado ^a^M3.0267^ea^ ca parisaaya dhamma.m deseti, no ca vinayadharo vinayadharo ca, no ca anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti ^a^T5.0015^ea^ saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. anekavihita~nca...pe0... pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, no ca dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati dibbena ca cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati, no ca aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. tena ta.m a"nga.m paripuuretabba.m -- `kintaaha.m saddho ca assa.m, siilavaa ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisaavacaro ca, visaarado ca parisaaya dhamma.m deseyya.m, vinayadharo ca, anekavihita~nca pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya.m, seyyathida.m, ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya.m, dibbena ca cakkhunaa visuddhena ^a^P5.0014^ea^ atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaaneyya.m, aasavaana~nca khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'nti.

[03] ``yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti, siilavaa ca, bahussuto ca, dhammakathiko ca, parisaavacaro ca, visaarado ca parisaaya dhamma.m deseti, vinayadharo ca, anekavihita~nca pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, dibbena ca cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m ^a^T5.0016^ea^ ^a^V3.0012^ea^ pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti. imehi, kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu samantapaasaadiko ca hoti sabbaakaaraparipuuro caa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca"ngasamannaagato ^a^V3.0013^ea^ ^a^M3.0268^ea^ ^a^P5.0015^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m senaasana.m sevamaano bhajamaano nacirasseva aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~nca"ngasamannaagato hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti; saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... bhagavaa'ti; appaabaadho hoti appaata"nko, samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya majjhimaaya padhaanakkhamaaya; asa.tho hoti amaayaavii, yathaabhuuta.m attaana.m aavikattaa satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu; aaraddhaviiriyo ^a^T5.0017^ea^ viharati, akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya; thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu; pa~n~navaa hoti, udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~nca"ngasamannaagato hoti.

[01] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, senaasana.m pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, senaasana.m naatiduura.m hoti naaccaasanna.m gamanaagamanasampanna.m divaa appaaki.n.na.m ratti.m appasadda.m appanigghosa.m appa.da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassa.m {appa.da.msa... siri.msapasamphassa.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}; tasmi.m kho pana senaasane viharantassa appakasirena uppajjanti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa; tasmi.m kho pana senaasane theraa bhikkhuu viharanti bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa ^a^P5.0016^ea^ vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa; te kaalena kaala.m upasa"nkamitvaa paripucchati paripa~nhati -- `ida.m, bhante, katha.m, imassa ko attho'ti; tassa te aayasmanto aviva.ta~nceva vivaranti anuttaaniikata~nca uttaani.m karonti anekavihitesu ca ka"nkhaa.thaaniyesu dhammesu ka"nkha.m pa.tivinodenti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, senaasana.m pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m hoti. pa~nca"ngasamannaagato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m senaasana.m sevamaano ^a^V3.0014^ea^ bhajamaano nacirasseva ^a^M3.0269^ea^ aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca"ngavippahiino, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~nca"ngasamannaagato imasmi.m ^a^T5.0018^ea^ dhammavinaye `kevalii vusitavaa uttamapuriso'ti vuccati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~nca"ngavippahiino hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kaamacchando pahiino hoti, byaapaado pahiino hoti, thinamiddha.m {thiinamiddha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} pahiina.m hoti, uddhaccakukkucca.m pahiina.m hoti, vicikicchaa pahiinaa hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~nca"ngavippahiino hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~nca"ngasamannaagato hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekhena siilakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekhena samaadhikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekhena pa~n~naakkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekhena vimuttikkhandhena samannaagato hoti, asekhena vimutti~naa.nadassanakkhandhena samannaagato hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~nca"ngasamannaagato hoti.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``dasayimaani ^a^V3.0015^ea^, bhikkhave, sa.myojanaani. katamaani dasa? pa~ncorambhaagiyaani ^a^T5.0019^ea^ sa.myojanaani, pa~ncuddhambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani. katamaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani ^a^M3.0270^ea^ sa.myojanaani? sakkaayadi.t.thi, vicikicchaa, siilabbataparaamaaso, kaamacchando, byaapaado -- imaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani.

[03] ``katamaani pa~ncuddhambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani? ruuparaago, aruuparaago, maano, uddhacca.m, avijjaa -- imaani pa~ncuddhambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani. imaani kho, bhikkhave, dasa sa.myojanaanii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa pa~nca cetokhilaa appahiinaa pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa asamucchinnaa, tassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati haaniyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.

[03] ``katamassa pa~nca cetokhilaa appahiinaa honti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya ^a^P5.0018^ea^ padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa.thamo cetokhilo appahiino hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme ka"nkhati...pe0... sa"nghe ka"nkhati... sikkhaaya ka"nkhati... sabrahmacaariisu kupito hoti anattamano aahatacitto khilajaato. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacaariisu kupito hoti anattamano aahatacitto khilajaato, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya ^a^V3.0016^ea^ anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa~ncamo cetokhilo appahiino hoti. imassa pa~nca ^a^T5.0020^ea^ cetokhilaa appahiinaa honti.

[03] ``katamassa pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa asamucchinnaa honti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaamesu aviitaraago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho avigatata.nho. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaamesu aviitaraago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho avigatata.nho ^a^M3.0271^ea^, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa.thamo cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye aviitaraago hoti...pe0... ruupe aviitaraago hoti...pe0... yaavadattha.m udaraavadehaka.m bhu~njitvaa seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharati... a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya ^a^P5.0019^ea^ anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa~ncamo cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti. imassa pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa asamucchinnaa honti.

[03] ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa ime pa~nca cetokhilaa appahiinaa ime pa~nca ^a^T5.0021^ea^ cetasovinibandhaa asamucchinnaa, tassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati haaniyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kaa.lapakkhe candassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati, haayateva va.n.nena haayati ma.n.dalena haayati aabhaaya haayati aarohapari.naahena; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa ime pa~nca cetokhilaa appahiinaa ime ^a^V3.0017^ea^ pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa asamucchinnaa, tassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati haaniyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye viitaraago hoti...pe0... ruupe viitaraago hoti ^a^V3.0018^ea^ ...pe0... na yaavadattha.m udaraavadehaka.m bhu~njitvaa seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharati, na a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya...pe0... deva~n~nataro vaati, tassa citta.m namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa~ncamo cetasovinibandho ^a^M3.0273^ea^ susamucchinno hoti. imassa pa~nca ^a^T5.0023^ea^ cetasovinibandhaa susamucchinnaa honti.

[03] ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa ime pa~nca cetokhilaa pahiinaa ime pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa susamucchinnaa ^a^P5.0021^ea^, tassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu no parihaani.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ju.nhapakkhe candassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati, va.d.dhateva va.n.nena va.d.dhati ma.n.dalena va.d.dhati aabhaaya va.d.dhati aarohapari.naahena; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa ime pa~nca cetokhilaa pahiinaa ime pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa susamucchinnaa, tassa yaa ratti vaa divaso vaa aagacchati vuddhiyeva paa.tika"nkhaa kusalesu dhammesu no parihaanii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``yaavataa, bhikkhave, sattaa apadaa vaa dvipadaa vaa catuppadaa vaa bahuppadaa vaa ruupino vaa aruupino vaa sa~n~nino vaa asa~n~nino vaa nevasa~n~ninaasa~n~nino vaa, tathaagato tesa.m aggamakkhaayati araha.m sammaasambuddho; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalaa dhammaa, sabbe te appamaadamuulakaa appamaadasamosara.naa. appamaado tesa.m {tesa.m dhammaana.m (sii0 ka0) sa.m0 ni0 5.139} aggamakkhaayati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici ja"ngalaana.m {ja"ngamaana.m (sii0 pii0) sa.m0 ni0 5.139} paa.naana.m padajaataani, sabbaani taani hatthipade samodhaana.m gacchanti, hatthipada.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m mahantattena; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0019^ea^, ye keci kusalaa dhammaa, sabbe te appamaadamuulakaa appamaadasamosara.naa. appamaado tesa.m aggamakkhaayati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0020^ea^, bhikkhave, yaa kaaci mahaanadiyo, seyyathida.m -- ga"ngaa, yamunaa, aciravatii, sarabhuu, mahii, sabbaa taa samudda"ngamaa samuddaninnaa samuddapo.naa samuddapabbhaaraa, mahaasamuddo taasa.m aggamakkhaayati; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalaa dhammaa, sabbe te appamaadamuulakaa appamaadasamosara.naa. appamaado tesa.m aggamakkhaayatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ {dii0 ni0 3.345, 360} ``sanaathaa ^a^M3.0275^ea^, bhikkhave, viharatha, maa anaathaa. dukkha.m, bhikkhave, anaatho viharati. dasayime, bhikkhave, naathakara.naa dhammaa. katame dasa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu, ayampi dhammo naathakara.no.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M3.0281^ea^ ^a^P5.0031^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.nunnapaccekasacco hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno yaani taani puthusama.nabraahma.naana.m puthupaccekasaccaani, seyyathida.m -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti vaa, `antavaa loko'ti vaa, `anantavaa loko'ti vaa, `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `neva hoti ^a^T5.0033^ea^ na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, sabbaani taani nunnaani honti pa.nunnaani ^a^V3.0027^ea^ {nu.n.naani honti panu.n.naani (?)} cattaani vantaani muttaani pahiinaani pa.tinissa.t.thaani. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.nunnapaccekasacco hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samavayasa.t.thesano hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kaamesanaa pahiinaa hoti, bhavesanaa pahiinaa hoti, brahmacariyesanaa pa.tippassaddhaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samavayasa.t.thesano hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anaavilasa"nkappo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kaamasa"nkappo pahiino hoti, byaapaadasa"nkappo pahiino hoti, vihi.msaasa"nkappo pahiino hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anaavilasa"nkappo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu passaddhakaayasa"nkhaaro hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu passaddhakaayasa"nkhaaro hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suvimuttacitto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno raagaa citta.m vimutta.m hoti, dosaa citta.m vimutta.m hoti, mohaa citta.m vimutta.m hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suvimuttacitto hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suvimuttapa~n~no hoti? idha ^a^P5.0032^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `raago me pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo'ti pajaanaati, doso me pahiino...pe0... `moho ^a^M3.0282^ea^ me pahiino ^a^T5.0034^ea^ ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo'ti pajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suvimuttapa~n~no hoti.

[03] ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atiitamaddhaana.m ariyaa ariyaavaase aavasi.msu, sabbe te imeva dasa ariyaavaase aavasi.msu; ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anaagatamaddhaana.m ariyaa ariyaavaase aavasissanti, sabbe te imeva dasa ariyaavaase aavasissanti; ye hi {yepi (?)} keci, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0028^ea^, etarahi ariyaa ariyaavaase aavasanti, sabbe te imeva dasa ariyaavaase aavasanti. ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa ariyaavaasaa, ye ariyaa aavasi.msu vaa aavasanti vaa aavasissanti vaa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] {ma0 ni0 1.148; vibha0 760; pa.ti0 ma0 2.44} ``dasayimaani ^a^M3.0283^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabalaani, yehi balehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti. katamaani dasa? idha, bhikkhave, tathaagato .thaana~nca .thaanato a.t.thaana~nca a.t.thaanato yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato .thaana~nca .thaanato a.t.thaana~nca a.t.thaanato yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, idampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti, ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m .thaanaso hetuso vipaaka.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m kammasamaadaanaana.m .thaanaso hetuso vipaaka.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, idampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti, ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo ^a^P5.0035^ea^ pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi ^a^T5.0037^ea^ sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe, `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti, iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. yampi ^a^V3.0031^ea^ bhikkhave, tathaagato anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, idampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti, ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa; ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena ^a^M3.0285^ea^ samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m ^a^T5.0038^ea^ upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati. yampi ^a^P5.0036^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagato dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati, idampi, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa tathaagatabala.m hoti, ya.m bala.m aagamma tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ``atthi ^a^P5.0039^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa kaayena pahaatabbaa, no vaacaaya. atthi, bhikkhave, dhammaa vaacaaya pahaatabbaa, no kaayena. atthi, bhikkhave, dhammaa neva kaayena pahaatabbaa no vaacaaya, pa~n~naaya disvaa {disvaa disvaa (sii0 syaa0)} pahaatabbaa.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa kaayena pahaatabbaa, no vaacaaya? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusala.m aapanno hoti ki~nci desa.m {ka~nci deva desa.m (sii0 syaa0)} kaayena. tamena.m anuvicca vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii evamaaha.msu -- `aayasmaa kho akusala.m aapanno ki~nci desa.m kaayena. saadhu vataayasmaa kaayaduccarita.m pahaaya kaayasucarita.m bhaavetuu'ti. so anuvicca vi~n~nuuhi sabrahmacaariihi vuccamaano kaayaduccarita.m pahaaya kaayasucarita.m bhaaveti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhammaa kaayena pahaatabbaa, no vaacaaya.

[03] ``katame ^a^M3.0288^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa vaacaaya pahaatabbaa, no kaayena? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusala.m aapanno hoti ki~nci desa.m vaacaaya. tamena.m anuvicca vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii evamaaha.msu -- `aayasmaa kho akusala.m aapanno ki~nci desa.m vaacaaya. saadhu vataayasmaa vaciiduccarita.m pahaaya vaciisucarita.m bhaavetuu'ti. so anuvicca vi~n~nuuhi sabrahmacaariihi vuccamaano vaciiduccarita.m pahaaya vaciisucarita.m bhaaveti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhammaa vaacaaya pahaatabbaa, no kaayena.
