[03] `sama.no, aavuso, gotamo saavakaana.m eva.m dhamma.m deseti -- etha tumhe, bhikkhave, sabba.m dhamma.m abhijaanaatha, sabba.m dhamma.m abhi~n~naaya viharathaati; mayampi kho, aavuso, saavakaana.m eva.m dhamma.m desema -- etha tumhe, aavuso, sabba.m dhamma.m abhijaanaatha, sabba.m dhamma.m abhi~n~naaya viharathaati. idha no, aavuso, ko viseso ko adhippayaaso ki.m naanaakara.na.m sama.nassa vaa gotamassa amhaaka.m vaa, yadida.m dhammadesanaaya vaa dhammadesana.m anusaasaniyaa vaa anusaasani'nti?

[03] ``atha ^a^V3.0043^ea^ kho ^a^P5.0050^ea^ maya.m, bhante, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m ^a^T5.0053^ea^ neva abhinandimhaa nappa.tikkosimhaa. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamimhaa -- `bhagavato santike etassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaamaa'''ti.

[03] ``eva.mvaadino, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `eko, aavuso, pa~nho eko uddeso eka.m veyyaakara.na.m, dve pa~nhaa dve uddesaa dve veyyaakara.naani, tayo pa~nhaa tayo uddesaa tii.ni veyyaakara.naani, cattaaro pa~nhaa cattaaro uddesaa cattaari veyyaakara.naani, pa~nca pa~nhaa pa~ncuddesaa pa~nca veyyaakara.naani, cha ^a^M3.0297^ea^ pa~nhaa cha uddesaa cha veyyaakara.naani, satta pa~nhaa sattuddesaa satta veyyaakara.naani, a.t.tha pa~nhaa a.t.thuddesaa a.t.tha veyyaakara.naani, nava pa~nhaa navuddesaa nava veyyaakara.naani, dasa pa~nhaa dasuddesaa dasa veyyaakara.naanii'ti. eva.m pu.t.thaa, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa na ceva sampaayissanti, uttari ca vighaata.m aapajjissanti. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa ta.m, bhikkhave, avisayasmi.m. naaha.m ta.m, bhikkhave, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya yo imesa.m pa~nhaana.m veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheyya, a~n~natra tathaagatena vaa tathaagatasaavakena vaa ito vaa pana sutvaa.

[03] ```eko pa~nho eko uddeso eka.m veyyaakara.na'nti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa ^a^T5.0054^ea^ virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamasmi.m ekadhamme? `sabbe sattaa aahaara.t.thitikaa' -- imasmi.m ^a^P5.0051^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhamme bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. `eko pa~nho eko uddeso eka.m veyyaakara.na'nti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```dve pa~nhaa dve uddesaa dve veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? dviisu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu dviisu? naame ca ruupe ca -- imesu kho, bhikkhave, dviisu dhammesu ^a^V3.0044^ea^ bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. `dve pa~nhaa dve uddesaa dve veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```tayo pa~nhaa tayo uddesaa tii.ni veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tiisu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti ^a^M3.0298^ea^. katamesu tiisu? tiisu vedanaasu ^a^T5.0055^ea^ -- imesu kho, bhikkhave, tiisu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. `tayo pa~nhaa tayo uddesaa tii.ni veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```cattaaro pa~nhaa cattaaro uddesaa cattaari veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? catuusu ^a^P5.0052^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu catuusu? catuusu aahaaresu -- imesu kho, bhikkhave, catuusu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. `cattaaro pa~nhaa cattaaro uddesaa cattaari veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```pa~nca pa~nhaa pa~ncuddesaa pa~nca veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? pa~ncasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu pa~ncasu? pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu -- imesu kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti ^a^T5.0056^ea^. `pa~nca pa~nhaa pa~ncuddesaa pa~nca veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```cha ^a^V3.0045^ea^ pa~nhaa cha uddesaa cha veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? chasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu chasu? chasu ajjhattikesu aayatanesu -- imesu kho, bhikkhave, chasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. `cha ^a^P5.0053^ea^ pa~nhaa cha uddesaa cha veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```satta ^a^M3.0299^ea^ pa~nhaa sattuddesaa satta veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? sattasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu sattasu? sattasu vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiisu -- imesu kho, bhikkhave, sattasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. `satta pa~nhaa sattuddesaa satta veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```a.t.tha pa~nhaa a.t.thuddesaa a.t.tha veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? a.t.thasu, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0057^ea^, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu a.t.thasu? a.t.thasu lokadhammesu -- imesu kho, bhikkhave, a.t.thasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano...pe0... dukkhassantakaro hoti. `a.t.tha pa~nhaa a.t.thuddesaa a.t.tha veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```nava pa~nhaa navuddesaa nava veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? navasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu navasu? navasu sattaavaasesu -- imesu ^a^P5.0054^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, navasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii ^a^V3.0046^ea^ sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. `nava pa~nhaa navuddesaa nava veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[01] ```dasa pa~nhaa dasuddesaa dasa veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? dasasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu dasasu? dasasu akusalesu kammapathesu ^a^T5.0058^ea^ -- imesu kho, bhikkhave, dasasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti ^a^M3.0300^ea^. `dasa pa~nhaa dasuddesaa dasa veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kaja"ngalaaya.m viharati ve.luvane. atha kho sambahulaa kaja"ngalakaa upaasakaa yena kaja"ngalikaa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa kaja"ngalika.m bhikkhuni.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho kaja"ngalakaa upaasakaa kaja"ngalika.m bhikkhuni.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``vuttamida.m, ayye, bhagavataa mahaapa~nhesu -- `eko pa~nho eko uddeso eka.m veyyaakara.na.m, dve pa~nhaa dve uddesaa dve veyyaakara.naani, tayo pa~nhaa tayo uddesaa tii.ni veyyaakara.naani, cattaaro ^a^P5.0055^ea^ pa~nhaa cattaaro uddesaa cattaari veyyaakara.naani, pa~nca pa~nhaa pa~ncuddesaa pa~nca veyyaakara.naani, cha pa~nhaa cha uddesaa cha veyyaakara.naani, satta pa~nhaa sattuddesaa satta veyyaakara.naani, a.t.tha pa~nhaa a.t.thuddesaa a.t.tha veyyaakara.naani, nava pa~nhaa navuddesaa nava veyyaakara.naani, dasa pa~nhaa dasuddesaa dasa veyyaakara.naanii'ti. imassa nu kho, ayye, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa katha.m vitthaarena attho da.t.thabbo''ti?

[03] ``na kho paneta.m, aavuso, bhagavato sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m, napi manobhaavaniiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m; api ca, yathaa mettha khaayati ta.m ^a^V3.0047^ea^ su.naatha, saadhuka.m ^a^T5.0059^ea^ manasi karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, ayye''ti, kho kaja"ngalakaa upaasakaa kaja"ngalikaaya bhikkhuniyaa paccassosu.m. kaja"ngalikaa bhikkhunii etadavoca --

[03] ```eko pa~nho eko uddeso eka.m veyyaakara.na'nti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? ekadhamme, aavuso, bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamasmi.m ekadhamme? sabbe sattaa aahaara.t.thitikaa -- imasmi.m kho, aavuso, ekadhamme bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme ^a^M3.0301^ea^ dukkhassantakaro hoti. `eko pa~nho eko uddeso eka.m veyyaakara.nanti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```dve ^a^P5.0056^ea^ pa~nhaa dve uddesaa dve veyyaakara.naanii'ti iti, kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? dviisu, aavuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu dviisu? naame ca ruupe ca...pe0... ^a^T5.0060^ea^ katamesu tiisu? tiisu vedanaasu -- imesu kho, aavuso, tiisu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. `tayo pa~nhaa tayo uddesaa tii.ni veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```cattaaro pa~nhaa cattaaro uddesaa cattaari veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? catuusu, aavuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa subhaavitacitto sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu catuusu? catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu -- imesu kho, aavuso, catuusu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa subhaavitacitto sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. `cattaaro pa~nhaa cattaaro uddesaa cattaari veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```pa~nca ^a^V3.0048^ea^ pa~nhaa pa~ncuddesaa pa~nca veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? pa~ncasu, aavuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa subhaavitacitto sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu pa~ncasu? pa~ncasu indriyesu...pe0... katamesu chasu? chasu ^a^T5.0061^ea^ ^a^P5.0057^ea^ nissara.niiyaasu dhaatuusu...pe0... katamesu sattasu? sattasu bojjha"ngesu...pe0... katamesu a.t.thasu? a.t.thasu ariyaa.t.tha"ngikamaggesu -- imesu kho, aavuso, a.t.thasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa subhaavitacitto sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. `a.t.tha pa~nhaa a.t.thuddesaa a.t.tha veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```nava ^a^M3.0302^ea^ pa~nhaa navuddesaa nava veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? navasu, aavuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu navasu? navasu sattaavaasesu -- imesu kho, aavuso, navasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa nibbindamaano sammaa virajjamaano sammaa vimuccamaano sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. `nava pa~nhaa navuddesaa nava veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```dasa pa~nhaa dasuddesaa dasa veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? dasasu, aavuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa subhaavitacitto sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamesu dasasu? dasasu kusalesu kammapathesu -- imesu ^a^P5.0058^ea^ kho, aavuso, dasasu dhammesu bhikkhu sammaa subhaavitacitto sammaa pariyantadassaavii sammadattha.m abhisamecca di.t.theva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. `dasa pa~nhaa dasuddesaa ^a^T5.0062^ea^ dasa veyyaakara.naanii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``iti kho, aavuso, ya.m ta.m vutta.m bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitaasu mahaapa~nhaasu -- `eko pa~nho eko uddeso eka.m veyyaakara.na.m...pe0... dasa pa~nhaa dasuddesaa dasa veyyaakara.naanii'ti, imassa kho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m ^a^V3.0049^ea^ aajaanaami. aaka"nkhamaanaa ca pana tumhe, aavuso, bhagavanta~n~neva upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha. yathaa vo {yathaa kho (ka0), yathaa no (bahuusu) a0 ni0 10.115, 172 pana paa.thabhedo natthi} bhagavaa byaakaroti tathaa na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti. ``eva.m, ayye''ti kho kaja"ngalakaa upaasakaa kaja"ngalikaaya kho bhikkhuniyaa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa kaja"ngalika.m bhikkhuni.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho kaja"ngalakaa upaasakaa yaavatako ahosi kaja"ngalikaaya bhikkhuniyaa saddhi.m kathaasallaapo, ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesu.m.

[03] ``saadhu ^a^M3.0303^ea^ saadhu, gahapatayo! pa.n.ditaa, gahapatayo, kaja"ngalikaa bhikkhunii. mahaapa~n~naa, gahapatayo, kaja"ngalikaa bhikkhunii. ma~ncepi tumhe, gahapatayo, upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha, ahampi ceta.m evameva.m ^a^P5.0059^ea^ {evameva (ka0) ma0 ni0 1.205 passitabba.m} byaakareyya.m yathaa ta.m kaja"ngalikaaya bhikkhuniyaa byaakata.m. eso ceva tassa {eso cevetassa (ma0 ni0 1.205)} attho. eva~nca na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ``yaavataa, bhikkhave, kaasikosalaa, yaavataa ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa vijita.m {vijite (sii0 ka0)}, raajaa tattha pasenadi kosalo aggamakkhaayati. ra~n~nopi ^a^T5.0063^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pasenadissa kosalassa attheva a~n~nathatta.m atthi vipari.naamo. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako tasmimpi nibbindati. tasmi.m nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hiinasmi.m.

[03] ``yaavataa, bhikkhave, candimasuuriyaa pariharanti disaa bhanti virocamaanaa, taava sahassadhaa loko. tasmi.m sahassadhaa loke sahassa.m candaana.m sahassa.m suuriyaana.m {suriyaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sahassa.m sinerupabbataraajaana.m sahassa.m jambudiipaana.m sahassa.m aparagoyaanaana.m sahassa.m uttarakuruuna.m sahassa.m pubbavidehaana.m cattaari mahaasamuddasahassaani cattaari mahaaraajasahassaani sahassa.m caatumahaaraajikaana.m sahassa.m taavati.msaana.m sahassa.m yaamaana.m sahassa.m tusitaana.m sahassa.m nimmaanaratiina.m sahassa.m paranimmitavasavattiina.m sahassa.m brahmalokaana.m. yaavataa, bhikkhave, sahassii lokadhaatu, mahaabrahmaa tattha ^a^P5.0060^ea^ aggamakkhaayati. mahaabrahmunopi kho, bhikkhave, attheva a~n~nathatta.m atthi ^a^V3.0050^ea^ vipari.naamo. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako tasmimpi nibbindati. tasmi.m nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hiinasmi.m.

[03] ``hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m aya.m loko sa.mva.t.tati. sa.mva.t.tamaane, bhikkhave, loke yebhuyyena sattaa aabhassarasa.mvattanikaa {aabhassaravattanikaa (sii0 syaa0)} bhavanti. te tattha honti manomayaa piitibhakkhaa saya.mpabhaa antalikkhecaraa subha.t.thaayino cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.thanti. sa.mva.t.tamaane, bhikkhave, loke aabhassaraa ^a^M3.0304^ea^ devaa aggamakkhaayanti. aabhassaraanampi kho, bhikkhave, devaana.m attheva a~n~nathatta.m atthi vipari.naamo. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako tasmimpi nibbindati ^a^T5.0064^ea^. tasmi.m nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hiinasmi.m.

[03] {a0 ni0 10.25} ``dasayimaani, bhikkhave, kasi.naayatanaani. katamaani dasa? pathaviikasi.nameko sa~njaanaati uddha.m adho tiriya.m advaya.m appamaa.na.m; aapokasi.nameko sa~njaanaati...pe0... tejokasi.nameko sa~njaanaati... vaayokasi.nameko sa~njaanaati... niilakasi.nameko sa~njaanaati... piitakasi.nameko sa~njaanaati... lohitakasi.nameko sa~njaanaati... odaatakasi.nameko sa~njaanaati... aakaasakasi.nameko sa~njaanaati... vi~n~naa.nakasi.nameko sa~njaanaati uddha.m adho tiriya.m advaya.m appamaa.na.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, dasa kasi.naayatanaani.

[03] ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m dasanna.m kasi.naayatanaana.m yadida.m vi~n~naa.nakasi.na.m eko sa~njaanaati uddha.m adho tiriya.m advaya.m appamaa.na.m. eva.msa~n~ninopi kho, bhikkhave, santi sattaa. eva.msa~n~niinampi kho, bhikkhave, sattaana.m attheva a~n~nathatta.m atthi vipari.naamo. eva.m passa.m ^a^P5.0061^ea^, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako tasmimpi nibbindati. tasmi.m nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hiinasmi.m.

[03] {dii0 ni0 3.338, 358; a0 ni0 8.64} ``a.t.thimaani, bhikkhave, abhibhaayatanaani. katamaani a.t.tha? ajjhatta.m ruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati parittaani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani; `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti, eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m pa.thama.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m ^a^V3.0051^ea^ ruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati appamaa.naani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani; `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti, eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m dutiya.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati parittaani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani; `taani ^a^T4.0065^ea^ abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti, eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m tatiya.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m ^a^M3.0305^ea^ aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati appamaa.naani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani; `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti, eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m catuttha.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati niilaani niilava.n.naani niilanidassanaani niilanibhaasaani. seyyathaapi naama umaapuppha.m niila.m niilava.n.na.m niilanidassana.m niilanibhaasa.m, seyyathaa vaa pana ta.m vattha.m baaraa.naseyyaka.m ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha.m niila.m niilava.n.na.m niilanidassana.m niilanibhaasa.m; evameva.m ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati niilaani niilava.n.naani niilanidassanaani niilanibhaasaani; `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti, eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m pa~ncama.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati piitaani piitava.n.naani piitanidassanaani piitanibhaasaani. seyyathaapi naama ka.nikaarapuppha.m piita.m piitava.n.na.m piitanidassana.m piitanibhaasa.m, seyyathaa vaa pana ta.m vattha.m baaraa.naseyyaka.m ^a^P5.0062^ea^ ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha.m piita.m piitava.n.na.m piitanidassana.m piitanibhaasa.m; evameva.m ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati piitaani piitava.n.naani piitanidassanaani piitanibhaasaani; `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti, eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m cha.t.tha.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati lohitakaani lohitakava.n.naani lohitakanidassanaani lohitakanibhaasaani. seyyathaapi naama bandhujiivakapuppha.m ^a^T5.0066^ea^ lohitaka.m lohitakava.n.na.m lohitakanidassana.m lohitakanibhaasa.m, seyyathaa vaa pana ta.m vattha.m baaraa.naseyyaka.m ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha.m lohitaka.m lohitakava.n.na.m lohitakanidassana.m lohitakanibhaasa.m; evameva.m ajjhatta.m ^a^V3.0052^ea^ aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati lohitakaani lohitakava.n.naani lohitakanidassanaani lohitakanibhaasaani; `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti, eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m sattama.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati odaataani odaatava.n.naani odaatanidassanaani odaatanibhaasaani. seyyathaapi naama osadhitaarakaa odaataa odaatava.n.naa odaatanidassanaa odaatanibhaasaa, seyyathaa ^a^M3.0306^ea^ vaa pana ta.m vattha.m baaraa.naseyyaka.m ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha.m odaata.m odaatava.n.na.m odaatanidassana.m odaatanibhaasa.m; evameva.m ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati odaataani odaatava.n.naani odaatanidassanaani odaatanibhaasaani; `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti, eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m a.t.thama.m abhibhaayatana.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha abhibhaayatanaani.

[03] ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m a.t.thanna.m abhibhaayatanaana.m yadida.m ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati odaataani odaatava.n.naani odaatanidassanaani odaatanibhaasaani; `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami passaamii'ti, eva.msa~n~nii hoti. eva.msa~n~ninopi kho, bhikkhave, santi sattaa. eva.msa~n~niinampi kho, bhikkhave, sattaana.m attheva a~n~nathatta.m ^a^P5.0063^ea^ atthi vipari.naamo. eva.m ^a^T5.0067^ea^ passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako tasmimpi nibbindati. tasmi.m nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hiinasmi.m.

[03] ``catasso imaa, bhikkhave, pa.tipadaa. katamaa catasso? dukkhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa, dukkhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa, sukhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa, sukhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, catasso pa.tipadaa.

[03] ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imaasa.m catunna.m pa.tipadaana.m yadida.m sukhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa. eva.mpa.tipannaapi kho, bhikkhave, santi sattaa. eva.mpa.tipannaanampi kho, bhikkhave, sattaana.m attheva a~n~nathatta.m atthi vipari.naamo. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako tasmimpi nibbindati. tasmi.m nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hiinasmi.m.

[03] ``catasso ^a^V3.0053^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, sa~n~naa. katamaa catasso? parittameko sa~njaanaati, mahaggatameko sa~njaanaati, appamaa.nameko sa~njaanaati, `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatanameko sa~njaanaati -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, catasso sa~n~naa.

[03] ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imaasa.m catunna.m sa~n~naana.m yadida.m `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatanameko sa~njaanaati. eva.msa~n~ninopi kho, bhikkhave, santi sattaa. eva.msa~n~niinampi kho, bhikkhave, sattaana.m attheva a~n~nathatta.m atthi vipari.naamo. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako tasmimpi nibbindati. tasmi.m nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hiinasmi.m.

[03] ``etadagga.m ^a^M3.0307^ea^, bhikkhave, baahirakaana.m di.t.thigataana.m yadida.m `no cassa.m, no ca me siyaa, na bhavissaami, na me bhavissatii'ti. eva.mdi.t.thino, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0068^ea^, eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `yaa caaya.m bhave appa.tikulyataa, saa cassa na ^a^P5.0064^ea^ bhavissati; yaa caaya.m bhavanirodhe paa.tikulyataa, saa cassa na bhavissatii'ti. eva.mdi.t.thinopi kho, bhikkhave, santi sattaa. eva.mdi.t.thiinampi kho, bhikkhave, sattaana.m attheva a~n~nathatta.m atthi vipari.naamo. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako tasmimpi nibbindati. tasmi.m nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hiinasmi.m.

[03] ``santi, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa paramatthavisuddhi.m pa~n~naapenti. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, paramatthavisuddhi.m pa~n~naapentaana.m yadida.m sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. te tadabhi~n~naaya tassa sacchikiriyaaya dhamma.m desenti. eva.mvaadinopi kho, bhikkhave, santi sattaa. eva.mvaadiinampi kho, bhikkhave, sattaana.m attheva a~n~nathatta.m atthi vipari.naamo. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako tasmimpi nibbindati. tasmi.m nibbindanto agge virajjati, pageva hiinasmi.m.

[03] ``santi, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa paramadi.t.thadhammanibbaana.m pa~n~naapenti. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, paramadi.t.thadhammanibbaana.m pa~n~naapentaana.m yadida.m channa.m phassaayatanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa anupaadaa vimokkho. eva.mvaadi.m kho ma.m, bhikkhave, evamakkhaayi.m eke sama.nabraahma.naa asataa tucchaa musaa abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti -- `sama.no ^a^V3.0054^ea^ gotamo na kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapeti, na ^a^T5.0069^ea^ ruupaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapeti, na vedanaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapetii'ti. kaamaana~ncaaha.m ^a^P5.0065^ea^, bhikkhave, pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapemi, ruupaana~nca pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapemi, vedanaana~nca pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapemi, di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto siitibhuuto anupaadaa parinibbaana.m pa~n~naapemii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena raajaa pasenadi kosalo uyyodhikaa nivatto hoti vijitasa"ngaamo laddhaadhippaayo. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena aaraamo tena paayaasi. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi, yaanena gantvaa yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova aaraama.m paavisi. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu ^a^M3.0308^ea^ abbhokaase ca"nkamanti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``kaha.m nu kho, bhante, bhagavaa etarahi viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho. dassanakaamaa hi maya.m, bhante, ta.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti. ``eso, mahaaraaja, vihaaro sa.mvutadvaaro. tena appasaddo upasa"nkamitvaa ataramaano aalinda.m pavisitvaa ukkaasitvaa agga.la.m aako.tehi; vivarissati te bhagavaa dvaara''nti.

[03] atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena so vihaaro sa.mvutadvaaro, tena appasaddo upasa"nkamitvaa ataramaano aalinda.m pavisitvaa ukkaasitvaa agga.la.m aako.tesi. vivari bhagavaa dvaara.m. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo vihaara.m pavisitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavato paadaani mukhena ^a^T5.0070^ea^ ca paricumbati paa.niihi ca parisambaahati naama~nca saaveti -- ``raajaaha.m, bhante, pasenadi kosalo; raajaaha.m, bhante ^a^P5.0066^ea^, pasenadi kosalo''ti.

[03] ``ka.m pana tva.m, mahaaraaja, atthavasa.m sampassamaano imasmi.m sariire evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karosi, mettuupahaara.m upada.msesii''ti? ``kata~n~nuta.m kho aha.m, bhante, katavedita.m sampassamaano bhagavati evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karomi, mettuupahaara.m upada.msemi.

[03] ``bhagavaa ^a^V3.0055^ea^ hi, bhante, bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno bahujanasukhaaya bahuno janassa ariye ~naaye pati.t.thaapitaa yadida.m kalyaa.nadhammataaya kusaladhammataaya. yampi, bhante, bhagavaa bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno bahujanasukhaaya bahuno janassa ariye ~naaye pati.t.thaapitaa yadida.m kalyaa.nadhammataaya kusaladhammataaya, idampi kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaano bhagavati evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karomi, mettuupahaara.m upada.msemi.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, bhagavaa siilavaa vuddhasiilo ariyasiilo kusalasiilo kusalasiilena samannaagato. yampi, bhante, bhagavaa siilavaa vuddhasiilo ariyasiilo kusalasiilo kusalasiilena samannaagato, idampi kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaano bhagavati evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karomi, mettuupahaara.m upada.msemi.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0309^ea^ capara.m, bhante, bhagavaa diigharatta.m aara~n~niko, ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevati. yampi, bhante, bhagavaa diigharatta.m aara~n~niko, ara~n~navanapatthaani ^a^P5.0067^ea^ pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevati, idampi kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaano bhagavati evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karomi, mettuupahaara.m upada.msemi.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, bhagavaa santu.t.tho ^a^T5.0071^ea^ itariitaraciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena. yampi, bhante, bhagavaa santu.t.tho itariitaraciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena, idampi kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaano bhagavati evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karomi, mettuupahaara.m upada.msemi. ``puna capara.m, bhante, bhagavaa aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. yampi, bhante, bhagavaa aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa, idampi kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaano bhagavati evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karomi, mettuupahaara.m upada.msemi.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, bhagavaa yaaya.m kathaa abhisallekhikaa cetovivara.nasappaayaa, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa santu.t.thikathaa pavivekakathaa asa.msaggakathaa viiriyaarambhakathaa siilakathaa samaadhikathaa ^a^V3.0056^ea^ pa~n~naakathaa vimuttikathaa vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa, evaruupaaya kathaaya nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. yampi, bhante, bhagavaa yaaya.m kathaa abhisallekhikaa cetovivara.nasappaayaa, seyyathida.m -- appicchakathaa...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa, evaruupaaya kathaaya nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, idampi kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaano bhagavati evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karomi, mettuupahaara.m upada.msemi.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, bhagavaa catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii ^a^P5.0068^ea^ akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. yampi, bhante, bhagavaa catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m ^a^T5.0072^ea^ nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, idampi kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaano bhagavati evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karomi, mettuupahaara.m upada.msemi.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0310^ea^ capara.m, bhante, bhagavaa anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. yampi, bhante, bhagavaa anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, idampi kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaano bhagavati evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karomi, mettuupahaara.m upada.msemi.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, bhagavaa dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa ^a^T5.0073^ea^ vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa ^a^V3.0057^ea^ manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa ^a^P5.0069^ea^ micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa; ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti, iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati. yampi, bhante, bhagavaa dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati, idampi kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaano bhagavati evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karomi, mettuupahaara.m upada.msemi.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0311^ea^ capara.m, bhante, bhagavaa aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. yampi, bhante, bhagavaa aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati, idampi kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaano bhagavati evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karomi, mettuupahaara.m upada.msemi.

[03] ``handa ca daani maya.m, bhante, gacchaama. bahukiccaa maya.m bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ``yassa daani tva.m, mahaaraaja, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m ^a^T5.0074^ea^ katvaa pakkaamiiti. dasama.m.
[06] mahaavaggo tatiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] siihaadhivutti ^a^P5.0070^ea^ kaayena, cundena kasi.nena ca.
[22] kaa.lii ca dve mahaapa~nhaa, kosalehi pare duveti..

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V3.0058^ea^ kho aayasmaa upaali yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa upaali bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kati nu kho, bhante, atthavase pa.ticca tathaagatena saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m, paatimokkha.m uddi.t.tha''nti?

[03] ``dasa kho, upaali, atthavase pa.ticca tathaagatena saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m, paatimokkha.m uddi.t.tha.m. katame dasa? sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya, sa"nghaphaasutaaya, dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaaya, pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaraaya, di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya, samparaayikaana.m aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya, appasannaana.m pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya, saddhamma.t.thitiyaa, vinayaanuggahaaya -- ime kho, upaali, dasa atthavase pa.ticca tathaagatena saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m, paatimokkha.m uddi.t.tha''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ ``kati ^a^M3.0312^ea^ nu kho, bhante, paatimokkha.t.thapanaa''ti? ``dasa kho, upaali, paatimokkha.t.thapanaa. katame dasa? paaraajiko tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti ^a^T5.0075^ea^, paaraajikakathaa vippakataa hoti, anupasampanno tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno ^a^P5.0071^ea^ hoti, anupasampannakathaa vippakataa hoti, sikkha.m paccakkhaatako tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti, sikkha.m paccakkhaatakakathaa vippakataa hoti, pa.n.dako tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti, pa.n.dakakathaa vippakataa hoti, bhikkhuniduusako tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti, bhikkhuniduusakakathaa vippakataa hoti -- ime kho, upaali, dasa paatimokkha.t.thapanaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 231} ``katihi ^a^V3.0059^ea^ nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo''ti? ``dasahi kho, upaali, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo. katamehi dasahi? idhupaali, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti; paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m {satthaa sabya~njanaa (sii0) evamuparipi} kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; ubhayaani kho panassa paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso; vinaye kho pana .thito hoti asa.mhiiro; pa.tibalo hoti ubho atthapaccatthike sa~n~naapetu.m pa~n~naapetu.m nijjhaapetu.m pekkhetu.m pasaadetu.m; adhikara.nasamuppaadavuupasamakusalo ^a^P5.0072^ea^ hoti -- adhikara.na.m jaanaati; adhikara.nasamudaya.m jaanaati; adhikara.nanirodha.m ^a^T5.0076^ea^ jaanaati; adhikara.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m jaanaati. imehi kho, upaali, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^M3.0313^ea^ nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa upasampaadetabba''nti? ``dasahi kho, upaali, dhammehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa upasampaadetabba.m. katamehi dasahi? idhupaali, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; paatimokkha.m kho panassa vitthaarena svaagata.m hoti suvibhatta.m suppavatta.m suvinicchita.m suttaso anubya~njanaso; pa.tibalo hoti gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m vaa upa.t.thaapetu.m vaa; pa.tibalo hoti anabhirati.m vuupakaasetu.m vaa ^a^V3.0060^ea^ vuupakaasaapetu.m vaa; pa.tibalo hoti uppanna.m kukkucca.m dhammato vinodetu.m; pa.tibalo hoti uppanna.m di.t.thigata.m dhammato vivecetu.m; pa.tibalo hoti adhisiile samaadapetu.m; pa.tibalo hoti adhicitte samaadapetu.m; pa.tibalo hoti adhipa~n~naaya samaadapetu.m. imehi kho, upaali, dasahi dhammehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa upasampaadetabba''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^P5.0073^ea^ nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa nissayo ^a^T5.0077^ea^ daatabbo''ti? ``dasahi kho, upaali, dhammehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa nissayo daatabbo. katamehi dasahi? idhupaali, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; paatimokkha.m kho panassa vitthaarena svaagata.m hoti suvibhatta.m suppavatta.m suvinicchita.m suttaso anubya~njanaso; pa.tibalo hoti gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m vaa upa.t.thaapetu.m vaa; pa.tibalo hoti anabhirati.m vuupakaasetu.m vaa vuupakaasaapetu.m vaa; pa.tibalo hoti uppanna.m kukkucca.m dhammato vinodetu.m; pa.tibalo hoti uppanna.m di.t.thigata.m dhammato vivecetu.m; pa.tibalo hoti adhisiile...pe0... adhicitte... adhipa~n~naaya samaadapetu.m. imehi kho, upaali, dasahi dhammehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa nissayo daatabbo''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^M3.0314^ea^ nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo''ti? ``dasahi kho, upaali, dhammehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo. katamehi dasahi? idhupaali, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; paatimokkha.m kho panassa vitthaarena svaagata.m hoti suvibhatta.m suppavatta.m suvinicchita.m suttaso anubya~njanaso; pa.tibalo hoti gilaana.m upa.t.thaatu.m vaa upa.t.thaapetu.m vaa; pa.tibalo hoti anabhirati.m vuupakaasetu.m vaa vuupakaasaapetu.m vaa; pa.tibalo hoti uppanna.m kukkucca.m dhammato vinodetu.m; pa.tibalo hoti uppanna.m di.t.thigata.m dhammato vivecetu.m; pa.tibalo hoti adhisiile samaadapetu.m; pa.tibalo hoti adhicitte ^a^V3.0061^ea^ samaadapetu.m; pa.tibalo hoti adhipa~n~naaya samaadapetu.m. imehi kho, upaali, dasahi dhammehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saama.nero upa.t.thaapetabbo''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ ```sa"nghabhedo sa"nghabhedo'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, sa"ngho bhinno hotii''ti? ``idhupaali, bhikkhuu adhamma.m dhammoti diipenti, dhamma.m adhammoti diipenti, avinaya.m vinayoti ^a^P5.0074^ea^ diipenti, vinaya.m avinayoti diipenti, abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatena bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatena abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatena aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatena anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, apa~n~natta.m tathaagatena pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipenti ^a^T5.0078^ea^, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatena apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipenti. te imehi dasahi vatthuuhi avakassanti apakassanti aaveni {aaveni.m (cuu.lava0 352) aave.ni, aave.nika.m (tattheva adholipi)} kammaani karonti aaveni paatimokkha.m uddisanti. ettaavataa kho, upaali, sa"ngho bhinno hotii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 353} ```sa"nghasaamaggii ^a^M3.0315^ea^ sa"nghasaamaggii'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, sa"ngho samaggo hotii''ti? ``idhupaali, bhikkhuu adhamma.m adhammoti diipenti, dhamma.m dhammoti diipenti, avinaya.m avinayoti diipenti, vinaya.m vinayoti diipenti, abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatena abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatena bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatena anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatena aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, apa~n~natta.m tathaagatena apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatena pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipenti. te imehi dasahi vatthuuhi na avakassanti na apakassanti na aaveni kammaani karonti na aaveni paatimokkha.m uddisanti. ettaavataa kho, upaali, sa"ngho samaggo hotii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V3.0062^ea^ ^a^P5.0075^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```sa"nghabhedo sa"nghabhedo'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, sa"ngho bhinno hotii''ti ^a^T5.0079^ea^? ``idhaananda, bhikkhuu adhamma.m dhammoti diipenti, dhamma.m adhammoti diipenti, avinaya.m vinayoti diipenti...pe0... pa~n~natta.m tathaagatena apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipenti. te imehi dasahi vatthuuhi avakassanti apakassanti aaveni kammaani karonti aaveni paatimokkha.m uddisanti. ettaavataa kho, aananda, sa"ngho bhinno hotii''ti.

[03] ``samagga.m pana, bhante, sa"ngha.m bhinditvaa ki.m so pasavatii''ti? ``kappa.t.thika.m, aananda, kibbisa.m pasavatii''ti. ``ki.m pana, bhante, kappa.t.thika.m kibbisa''nti? ``kappa.m, aananda, nirayamhi paccatiiti --
[21] ``aapaayiko ^a^P5.0076^ea^ nerayiko, kappa.t.tho sa"nghabhedako.
[27] vaggarato adhamma.t.tho, yogakkhemaa padha.msati.
[22] sa"ngha.m samagga.m bhinditvaa {bhetvaana (sii0 syaa0), bhitvaana (ka0) cuu.lava0 354; itivu0 18; kathaava0 657} kappa.m nirayamhi paccatii''ti.. navama.m.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ```sa"nghasaamaggii ^a^M3.0316^ea^ sa"nghasaamaggii'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, sa"ngho samaggo hotii''ti? ``idhaananda, bhikkhuu adhamma.m adhammoti diipenti, dhamma.m dhammoti diipenti, avinaya.m avinayoti diipenti ^a^T5.0080^ea^, vinaya.m vinayoti diipenti, abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatena abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatena bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatena anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatena aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, apa~n~natta.m tathaagatena apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatena pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipenti. te imehi dasahi vatthuuhi ^a^V3.0063^ea^ na avakassanti na apakassanti na aaveni kammaani karonti na aaveni paatimokkha.m uddisanti. ettaavataa kho, aananda, sa"ngho samaggo hotii''ti.

[03] ``bhinna.m pana, bhante, sa"ngha.m samagga.m katvaa ki.m so pasavatii''ti? ``brahma.m, aananda, pu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti. ``ki.m pana, bhante, brahma.m pu~n~na''nti? ``kappa.m, aananda, saggamhi modatiiti --
[21] ``sukhaa ^a^P5.0077^ea^ sa"nghassa saamaggii, samaggaana~nca anuggaho.
[27] samaggarato dhamma.t.tho, yogakkhemaa na dha.msati.
[22] sa"ngha.m samagga.m katvaana, kappa.m saggamhi modatii''ti.. dasama.m.
[06] upaalivaggo catuttho.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T5.0081^ea^ ^a^V3.0064^ea^ kho aayasmaa upaali yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ^a^M3.0317^ea^ aayasmaa upaali bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena sa"nghe bha.n.danakalahaviggahavivaadaa uppajjanti, bhikkhuu ca na phaasu {phaasu.m (?)} viharantii''ti? ``idhupaali, bhikkhuu adhamma.m dhammoti diipenti, dhamma.m adhammoti diipenti, avinaya.m vinayoti diipenti, vinaya.m avinayoti diipenti, abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatena bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatena abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatena aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatena anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, apa~n~natta.m tathaagatena pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati ^a^P5.0078^ea^ diipenti, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatena apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipenti. aya.m kho, upaali, hetu aya.m paccayo, yena sa"nghe bha.n.danakalahaviggahavivaadaa uppajjanti, bhikkhuu ca na phaasu viharantii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, vivaadamuulaanii''ti? ``dasa kho, upaali, vivaadamuulaani. katamaani dasa? idhupaali, bhikkhuu adhamma.m dhammoti diipenti, dhamma.m adhammoti diipenti, avinaya.m vinayoti diipenti, vinaya.m avinayoti diipenti, abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatena bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaati diipenti ^a^T5.0082^ea^, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatena abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatena aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatena anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, apa~n~natta.m tathaagatena pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipenti, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatena apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipenti. imaani kho, upaali, dasa vivaadamuulaanii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ ``kati ^a^V3.0065^ea^ nu kho, bhante, vivaadamuulaanii''ti? ``dasa kho, upaali, vivaadamuulaani. katamaani dasa? idhupaali, bhikkhuu anaapatti.m aapattiiti diipenti, aapatti.m anaapattiiti diipenti, lahuka.m aapatti.m garukaapattiiti diipenti ^a^M3.0318^ea^, garuka.m aapatti.m lahukaapattiiti diipenti, du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaapattiiti diipenti, adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m du.t.thullaapattiiti diipenti, saavasesa.m aapatti.m anavasesaapattiiti diipenti, anavasesa.m aapatti.m saavasesaapattiiti diipenti ^a^P5.0079^ea^, sappa.tikamma.m aapatti.m appa.tikammaapattiiti diipenti, appa.tikamma.m aapatti.m sappa.tikammaapattiiti diipenti. imaani kho, upaali, dasa vivaadamuulaanii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kusinaaraaya.m viharati balihara.ne vanasa.n.de. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] {cuu.lava0 399; pari0 436} ``codakena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m paccavekkhitvaa pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo. katame pa~nca dhammaa ajjhatta.m ^a^T5.0083^ea^ paccavekkhitabbaa? codakena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro nu khomhi, parisuddhenamhi kaayasamaacaarena samannaagato acchiddena appa.tima.msena. sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti? no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti parisuddhena kaayasamaacaarena samannaagato acchiddena appa.tima.msena, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha taava aayasmaa kaayika.m sikkhassuu'ti, itissa bhavanti vattaaro.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro nu khomhi, parisuddhenamhi vaciisamaacaarena samannaagato acchiddena appa.tima.msena. sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti? no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^V3.0066^ea^ parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro hoti parisuddhena vaciisamaacaarena samannaagato acchiddena appa.tima.msena, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha taava aayasmaa vaacasika.m sikkhassuu'ti, itissa bhavanti vattaaro.

[03] ``puna ^a^P5.0080^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `metta.m nu kho me citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m sabrahmacaariisu anaaghaata.m. sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti? no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ^a^M3.0319^ea^ metta.m citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu anaaghaata.m, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha taava aayasmaa sabrahmacaariisu metta.m citta.m upa.t.thaapehii'ti, itissa bhavanti vattaaro.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, codakena bhikkhunaa ^a^T5.0084^ea^ para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `bahussuto nu khomhi sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaa me dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa. sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti? no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha taava aayasmaa aagama.m pariyaapu.nassuu'ti, itissa bhavanti vattaaro.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ubhayaani kho pana me paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso. sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti? no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ubhayaani paatimokkhaani vitthaarena ^a^P5.0081^ea^ svaagataani honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso, `ida.m panaayasmaa, kattha vutta.m bhagavataa'ti, iti pu.t.tho na sampaayissati. tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha taava aayasmaa ^a^V3.0067^ea^ vinaya.m sikkhassuu'ti, itissa bhavanti vattaaro. ime pa~nca dhammaa ajjhatta.m paccavekkhitabbaa.

[03] ``katame pa~nca ^a^T5.0085^ea^ dhammaa ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetabbaa? `kaalena vakkhaami, no akaalena; bhuutena vakkhaami, no abhuutena; sa.nhena vakkhaami, no pharusena; atthasa.mhitena vakkhaami, no anatthasa.mhitena; mettacitto vakkhaami, no dosantaro'ti -- ime pa~nca dhammaa ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetabbaa. codakena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m paccavekkhitvaa ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ {paaci0 497} ``dasayime ^a^M3.0320^ea^, bhikkhave, aadiinavaa raajantepurappavesane. katame dasa? idha, bhikkhave, raajaa mahesiyaa saddhi.m nisinno hoti. tatra bhikkhu pavisati. mahesii vaa bhikkhu.m disvaa sita.m paatukaroti, bhikkhu vaa mahesi.m disvaa sita.m paatukaroti. tattha ra~n~no eva.m hoti -- `addhaa imesa.m kata.m vaa karissanti vaa'ti! aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, raajaa bahukicco bahukara.niiyo a~n~natara.m itthi.m gantvaa na sarati -- `saa tena gabbha.m ga.nhaati'. tattha ra~n~no eva.m hoti -- `na kho idha a~n~no ^a^P5.0082^ea^ koci pavisati, a~n~natra pabbajitena. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma'nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no antepure a~n~natara.m ratana.m nassati. tattha ra~n~no eva.m hoti -- `na kho idha a~n~no koci pavisati, a~n~natra pabbajitena. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma'nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03] ``puna ^a^T5.0086^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no antepure abbhantaraa guyhamantaa bahiddhaa sambheda.m gacchanti. tattha ra~n~no eva.m hoti -- `na kho idha a~n~no koci pavisati, a~n~natra pabbajitena ^a^V3.0068^ea^. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma'nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no antepure pitaa vaa putta.m pattheti putto vaa pitara.m pattheti. tesa.m eva.m hoti -- `na kho idha a~n~no koci pavisati, a~n~natra pabbajitena. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma'nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncamo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, raajaa niica.t.thaaniya.m ucce .thaane .thapeti. yesa.m ta.m amanaapa.m tesa.m eva.m hoti -- `raajaa kho pabbajitena sa.msa.t.tho. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma'nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, cha.t.tho aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0321^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, raajaa ucca.t.thaaniya.m niice .thaane .thapeti. yesa.m ta.m amanaapa.m tesa.m eva.m hoti -- `raajaa kho pabbajitena sa.msa.t.tho. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma'nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, sattamo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, raajaa akaale sena.m uyyojeti. yesa.m ta.m amanaapa.m tesa.m eva.m hoti -- `raajaa kho pabbajitena sa.msa.t.tho. siyaa nu kho pabbajitassa kamma'nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, a.t.thamo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, raajaa kaale sena.m uyyojetvaa antaraamaggato nivattaapeti. yesa.m ta.m amanaapa.m tesa.m eva.m ^a^P5.0083^ea^ hoti -- `raajaa kho pabbajitena sa.msa.t.tho. siyaa nu ^a^T5.0087^ea^ kho pabbajitassa kamma'nti. aya.m, bhikkhave, navamo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ra~n~no antepura.m hatthisammadda.m assasammadda.m rathasammadda.m rajaniiyaani ruupasaddagandharasapho.t.thabbaani, yaani na pabbajitassa saaruppaani. aya.m, bhikkhave, dasamo aadiinavo raajantepurappavesane. ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa aadiinavaa raajantepurappavesane''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0069^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho sambahulaa sakkaa upaasakaa tadahuposathe yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho sakke upaasake bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``api nu tumhe, sakkaa, a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasathaa''ti? ``appekadaa maya.m, bhante, a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasaama, appekadaa na upavasaamaa''ti. ``tesa.m vo, sakkaa, alaabhaa tesa.m dulladdha.m, ye tumhe eva.m sokasabhaye jiivite mara.nasabhaye jiivite appekadaa a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasatha, appekadaa na upavasatha.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, sakkaa, idha puriso yena kenaci kamma.t.thaanena anaapajja akusala.m divasa.m a.d.dhakahaapa.na.m nibbiseyya. dakkho ^a^P5.0084^ea^ puriso u.t.thaanasampannoti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^M3.0322^ea^ ki.m ma~n~natha, sakkaa, idha puriso yena kenaci kamma.t.thaanena anaapajja akusala.m divasa.m kahaapa.na.m nibbiseyya. dakkho puriso u.t.thaanasampannoti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m, ma~n~natha, sakkaa, idha puriso yena kenaci kamma.t.thaanena anaapajja akusala.m divasa.m dve kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya ^a^T5.0088^ea^... tayo kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya... cattaaro kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya... pa~nca kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya... cha kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya... satta kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya... a.t.tha kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya... nava kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya... dasa kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya... viisa kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya... ti.msa kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya... cattaariisa.m kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya... pa~n~naasa.m kahaapa.ne nibbiseyya... kahaapa.nasata.m nibbiseyya. dakkho puriso u.t.thaanasampannoti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, sakkaa, api nu so puriso divase divase kahaapa.nasata.m kahaapa.nasahassa.m ^a^V3.0070^ea^ nibbisamaano laddha.m laddha.m nikkhipanto vassasataayuko vassasatajiivii mahanta.m bhogakkhandha.m adhigaccheyyaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, sakkaa, api nu so puriso bhogahetu bhoganidaana.m bhogaadhikara.na.m eka.m vaa ratti.m eka.m vaa divasa.m upa.d.dha.m vaa ratti.m upa.d.dha.m vaa divasa.m ekantasukhappa.tisa.mvedii vihareyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``kaamaa hi, bhante, aniccaa tucchaa musaa mosadhammaa''ti.

[03] ``idha pana vo, sakkaa, mama saavako dasa vassaani appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto yathaa mayaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano satampi vassaani satampi vassasataani satampi ^a^P5.0085^ea^ vassasahassaani ekantasukhappa.tisa.mvedii vihareyya. so ca khvassa sakadaagaamii vaa anaagaamii vaa apa.n.naka.m vaa sotaapanno. ti.t.thantu, sakkaa, dasa vassaani.

[03] idha mama saavako nava vassaani... a.t.tha vassaani... satta vassaani... cha vassaani... pa~nca vassaani cattaari vassaani... tii.ni vassaani... dve vassaani... eka.m vassa.m appamatto aataapii ^a^T5.0089^ea^ pahitatto viharanto yathaa mayaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano satampi vassaani satampi vassasataani satampi vassasahassaani ekantasukhappa.tisa.mvedii vihareyya, so ca khvassa sakadaagaamii ^a^M3.0323^ea^ vaa anaagaamii vaa apa.n.naka.m vaa sotaapanno. ti.t.thatu, sakkaa, eka.m vassa.m.

[03] idha mama saavako dasa maase appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto yathaa mayaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano satampi vassaani satampi vassasataani satampi vassasahassaani ekantasukhappa.tisa.mvedii vihareyya, so ca khvassa sakadaagaamii vaa anaagaamii vaa apa.n.naka.m vaa sotaapanno. ti.t.thantu, sakkaa, dasa maasaa.

[03] idha mama saavako nava maase... a.t.tha maase... satta maase... cha maase... pa~nca maase... cattaaro maase... tayo maase... dve maase... eka.m maasa.m... a.d.dhamaasa.m appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto yathaa mayaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano satampi vassaani satampi vassasataani ^a^V3.0071^ea^ satampi vassasahassaani ekantasukhappa.tisa.mvedii vihareyya, so ca khvassa sakadaagaamii vaa anaagaamii vaa apa.n.naka.m vaa sotaapanno. ti.t.thatu, sakkaa, a.d.dhamaaso.

[03] idha mama saavako dasa rattindive {rattidive (ka0)} appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto yathaa mayaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano satampi vassaani satampi vassasataani satampi vassasahassaani ekantasukhappa.tisa.mvedii vihareyya, so ca khvassa sakadaagaamii vaa anaagaamii vaa apa.n.naka.m vaa sotaapanno. ti.t.thantu, sakkaa, dasa rattindivaa.

[03] idha mama saavako nava rattindive... a.t.tha rattindive... satta rattindive... cha ^a^P5.0086^ea^ rattindive... pa~nca rattindive... cattaaro ^a^T5.0090^ea^ rattindive... tayo rattindive... dve rattindive... eka.m rattindiva.m appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto yathaa mayaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano satampi vassaani satampi vassasataani satampi vassasahassaani ekantasukhappa.tisa.mvedii vihareyya, so ca khvassa sakadaagaamii vaa anaagaamii vaa apa.n.naka.m vaa sotaapanno. tesa.m vo, sakkaa, alaabhaa tesa.m dulladdha.m, ye tumhe eva.m sokasabhaye jiivite mara.nasabhaye jiivite appekadaa a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasatha, appekadaa na upavasathaa''ti. ``ete maya.m, bhante, ajjatagge a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasissaamaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M3.0324^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho mahaali licchavi yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaali licchavi bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante hetu, ko paccayo paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya paapassa kammassa pavattiyaa''ti? ``lobho kho, mahaali, hetu, lobho paccayo paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya paapassa kammassa pavattiyaa. doso kho, mahaali, hetu, doso paccayo paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya paapassa kammassa pavattiyaa. moho kho, mahaali, hetu, moho paccayo paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya paapassa kammassa pavattiyaa. ayoniso manasikaaro kho, mahaali, hetu, ayoniso manasikaaro paccayo ^a^P5.0087^ea^ paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya paapassa kammassa ^a^T5.0091^ea^ pavattiyaa. micchaapa.nihita.m ^a^V3.0072^ea^ kho, mahaali, citta.m hetu, micchaapa.nihita.m citta.m paccayo paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya paapassa kammassa pavattiyaati. aya.m kho, mahaali, hetu, aya.m paccayo paapassa kammassa kiriyaaya paapassa kammassa pavattiyaa''ti.

[03] ``ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo kalyaa.nassa kammassa kiriyaaya kalyaa.nassa kammassa pavattiyaa''ti? ``alobho kho, mahaali, hetu, alobho paccayo kalyaa.nassa kammassa kiriyaaya kalyaa.nassa kammassa pavattiyaa. adoso kho, mahaali, hetu, adoso paccayo kalyaa.nassa kammassa kiriyaaya kalyaa.nassa kammassa pavattiyaa. amoho kho, mahaali, hetu, amoho paccayo kalyaa.nassa kammassa kiriyaaya kalyaa.nassa kammassa pavattiyaa. yoniso manasikaaro kho, mahaali, hetu, yoniso manasikaaro paccayo kalyaa.nassa kammassa kiriyaaya kalyaa.nassa kammassa pavattiyaa. sammaapa.nihita.m kho, mahaali, citta.m hetu, sammaapa.nihita.m citta.m paccayo kalyaa.nassa kammassa kiriyaaya kalyaa.nassa kammassa pavattiyaa. aya.m kho, mahaali, hetu, aya.m paccayo kalyaa.nassa kammassa kiriyaaya kalyaa.nassa kammassa pavattiyaa. ime ca, mahaali, dasa dhammaa loke na sa.mvijjeyyu.m, nayidha pa~n~naayetha adhammacariyaavisamacariyaati vaa dhammacariyaasamacariyaati vaa. yasmaa ca kho, mahaali, ime dasa dhammaa loke ^a^M3.0325^ea^ sa.mvijjanti, tasmaa pa~n~naayati adhammacariyaavisamacariyaati vaa dhammacariyaasamacariyaati vaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ ``dasayime, bhikkhave, dhammaa pabbajitena abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabbaa ^a^T5.0092^ea^. katame dasa? `veva.n.niyamhi ajjhupagato'ti pabbajitena abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m; `parapa.tibaddhaa me jiivikaa'ti pabbajitena ^a^P5.0088^ea^ abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m; `a~n~no me aakappo kara.niiyo'ti pabbajitena abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m; `kacci nu kho me attaa siilato na upavadatii'ti pabbajitena abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m; `kacci nu kho ma.m anuvicca vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii siilato na upavadantii'ti pabbajitena abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m; `sabbehi me piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo'ti pabbajitena abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m; `kammassakomhi kammadaayaado kammayoni kammabandhu kammapa.tisara.no, ya.m kamma.m karissaami kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa ^a^V3.0073^ea^ tassa daayaado bhavissaamii'ti pabbajitena abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m; `katha.mbhuutassa me rattindivaa viitivattantii'ti pabbajitena abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m; `kacci nu kho aha.m su~n~naagaare abhiramaamii'ti pabbajitena abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m; `atthi nu kho me uttari manussadhammo alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato, yenaaha.m {yoha.m (sii0 pii0 ka0), soha.m (syaa0)} pacchime kaale sabrahmacaariihi pu.t.tho na ma"nku bhavissaamii'ti pabbajitena abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhammaa pabbajitena abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabbaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ ``dasayime, bhikkhave, dhammaa sariira.t.thaa. katame dasa? siita.m, u.nha.m, jighacchaa, pipaasaa, uccaaro, passaavo, kaayasa.mvaro, vaciisa.mvaro, aajiivasa.mvaro, ponobhaviko {ponobbhaviko (ka0)} bhavasa"nkhaaro -- ime ^a^T5.0093^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhammaa sariira.t.thaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa ^a^P5.0089^ea^ bhikkhuu pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa ^a^M3.0326^ea^ upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m sannisinnaa sannipatitaa bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena upa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa sannipatitaa, kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti?

[03] ``idha maya.m, bhante, pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m sannisinnaa sannipatitaa bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharaamaa''ti. ``na kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, tumhaaka.m patiruupa.m kulaputtaana.m saddhaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m ^a^V3.0074^ea^ pabbajitaana.m, ya.m tumhe bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa vihareyyaatha.

[03] ``dasayime, bhikkhave, dhammaa saara.niiyaa piyakara.naa garukara.naa {piyakaraa.naa garukaraa.naa (?)} sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattanti. katame dasa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati ^a^T5.0094^ea^ sikkhaapadesu, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa ^a^P5.0090^ea^ manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0327^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto hoti kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyaa.namitto hoti kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suvaco hoti sovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagato khamo padakkhi.naggaahii anusaasani.m. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suvaco hoti sovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagato khamo padakkhi.naggaahii anusaasani.m, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaani taani sabrahmacaariina.m uccaavacaani ki.mkara.niiyaani ^a^V3.0075^ea^ -- tattha dakkho hoti analaso, tatruupaayaaya viima.msaaya samannaagato ala.m kaatu.m ala.m sa.mvidhaatu.m. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaani taani ^a^T5.0095^ea^ sabrahmacaariina.m uccaavacaani ki.mkara.niiyaani -- tattha dakkho hoti analaso tatruupaayaaya viima.msaaya samannaagato ala.m kaatu.m ala.m sa.mvidhaatu.m, ayampi dhammo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammakaamo hoti piyasamudaahaaro, abhidhamme abhivinaye u.laarapaamojjo. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammakaamo hoti piyasamudaahaaro, abhidhamme abhivinaye u.laarapaamojjo, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya ^a^P5.0091^ea^ kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0328^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitaraciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitaraciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo...pe0... sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satimaa hoti, paramena satinepakkena samannaagato, cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa anussaritaa. yampi ^a^T5.0096^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satimaa hoti, paramena satinepakkena samannaagato, cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa anussaritaa, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo...pe0... sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~n~navaa hoti, udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~n~navaa hoti, udayatthagaaminiyaa ^a^V3.0076^ea^ pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa, ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo...pe0... sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhammaa saara.niiyaa piyakara.naa garukara.naa sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] akkosavaggo pa~ncamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] vivaadaa ^a^P5.0092^ea^ dve ca muulaani, kusinaarapavesane.
[22] sakko mahaali abhi.nha.m, sariira.t.thaa ca bha.n.danaati..
[06] pa.thamapa.n.naasaka.m samatta.m.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T5.0097^ea^ ^a^M3.0329^ea^ ^a^V3.0077^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --
[03] ``no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paracittapariyaayakusalo hoti, atha `sacittapariyaayakusalo bhavissaamii'ti {bhavissaamaati (syaa0)} -- eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sacittapariyaayakusalo hoti? seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, itthii vaa puriso vaa daharo yuvaa ma.n.danakajaatiko aadaase vaa parisuddhe pariyodaate acche vaa udakapatte saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano sace tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, tasseva rajassa vaa a"nga.nassa vaa pahaanaaya vaayamati. no ce tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, tenevattamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo -- `laabhaa vata me, parisuddha.m vata me'ti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paccavekkha.naa bahukaaraa {bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano bahukaaro (ka0)} hoti kusalesu dhammesu -- `abhijjhaalu nu ^a^P5.0093^ea^ kho bahula.m viharaami, anabhijjhaalu nu kho bahula.m viharaami, byaapannacitto nu kho bahula.m viharaami, abyaapannacitto nu kho bahula.m viharaami, thinamiddhapariyu.t.thito nu kho bahula.m viharaami, vigatathinamiddho nu kho bahula.m viharaami ^a^T5.0098^ea^, uddhato nu kho bahula.m viharaami, anuddhato nu kho bahula.m viharaami, vicikiccho nu kho bahula.m viharaami, ti.n.navicikiccho nu kho bahula.m viharaami, kodhano nu kho bahula.m viharaami, akkodhano nu kho bahula.m viharaami, sa.mkili.t.thacitto nu kho bahula.m viharaami, asa.mkili.t.thacitto nu kho bahula.m viharaami ^a^V3.0078^ea^, saaraddhakaayo nu kho bahula.m viharaami, asaaraddhakaayo nu kho bahula.m viharaami, kusiito nu kho bahula.m viharaami, aaraddhaviiriyo nu kho bahula.m viharaami, asamaahito nu kho bahula.m viharaami, samaahito nu kho bahula.m viharaamii'ti.

[03] ``sace ^a^M3.0330^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `abhijjhaalu bahula.m viharaami, byaapannacitto bahula.m viharaami, thinamiddhapariyu.t.thito bahula.m viharaami, uddhato bahula.m viharaami, vicikiccho bahula.m viharaami, kodhano bahula.m viharaami, sa.mkili.t.thacitto bahula.m viharaami, saaraddhakaayo bahula.m viharaami, kusiito bahula.m viharaami, asamaahito bahula.m viharaamii'ti, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aadittacelo vaa aadittasiiso vaa. tasseva celassa vaa siisassa vaa nibbaapanaaya adhimatta.m chanda~nca vaayaama~nca ussaaha~nca usso.lhi~nca appa.tivaani~nca sati~nca sampaja~n~na~nca kareyya. evameva.m kho ^a^T5.0099^ea^ tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``sace ^a^P5.0094^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `anabhijjhaalu bahula.m viharaami, abyaapannacitto bahula.m viharaami, vigatathinamiddho bahula.m viharaami, anuddhato bahula.m viharaami, ti.n.navicikiccho bahula.m viharaami, akkodhano bahula.m viharaami, asa.mkili.t.thacitto bahula.m viharaami, asaaraddhakaayo bahula.m viharaami, aaraddhaviiriyo bahula.m viharaami, samaahito bahula.m viharaamii'ti, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesuyeva kusalesu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya uttari aasavaana.m khayaaya yogo kara.niiyo''ti. pa.thama.m.
[03] 52^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --
[03] ``no ^a^V3.0079^ea^ ce, aavuso, bhikkhu paracittapariyaayakusalo hoti, atha `sacittapariyaayakusalo bhavissaamii'ti -- eva~nhi vo, aavuso, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``katha~ncaavuso ^a^M3.0331^ea^, bhikkhu sacittapariyaayakusalo hoti? seyyathaapi, aavuso, itthii vaa puriso vaa daharo yuvaa ma.n.danakajaatiko aadaase vaa parisuddhe pariyodaate acche vaa udapatte saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano sace tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, tasseva rajassa vaa a"nga.nassa vaa pahaanaaya vaayamati. no ce tattha passati raja.m ^a^T5.0100^ea^ vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, tenevattamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo -- `laabhaa vata me, parisuddha.m vata me'ti.
