[03] ``sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `abhijjhaalu bahula.m viharaami...pe0... asamaahito bahula.m viharaamii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m. seyyathaapi, aavuso, aadittacelo vaa aadittasiiso vaa. tasseva celassa vaa siisassa vaa nibbaapanaaya ^a^T5.0101^ea^ adhimatta.m chanda~nca vaayaama~nca ussaaha~nca usso.lhi~nca appa.tivaani~nca sati~nca sampaja~n~na~nca kareyya. evameva.m kho, aavuso, tena bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya adhimatto chando ^a^V3.0080^ea^ ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``sace ^a^M3.0332^ea^ panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `anabhijjhaalu bahula.m viharaami...pe0... samaahito bahula.m viharaamii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesuyeva kusalesu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya uttari aasavaana.m khayaaya yogo kara.niiyo''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ``.thitimpaaha.m ^a^P5.0096^ea^, bhikkhave, na va.n.nayaami kusalesu dhammesu, pageva parihaani.m. vu.d.dhi~nca kho aha.m, bhikkhave, va.n.nayaami kusalesu dhammesu, no .thiti.m no haani.m.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, haani hoti kusalesu dhammesu, no .thiti no vu.d.dhi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yattako hoti saddhaaya siilena sutena caagena pa~n~naaya pa.tibhaanena, tassa te dhammaa neva ti.t.thanti no va.d.dhanti. haanimeta.m, bhikkhave, vadaami kusalesu dhammesu, no .thiti.m no vu.d.dhi.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, haani hoti kusalesu dhammesu, no .thiti no vu.d.dhi.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave .thiti hoti kusalesu dhammesu, no haani no vu.d.dhi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yattako hoti saddhaaya siilena sutena caagena pa~n~naaya pa.tibhaanena, tassa te dhammaa neva haayanti no va.d.dhanti ^a^T5.0102^ea^. .thitimeta.m, bhikkhave, vadaami kusalesu dhammesu, no haani.m no vu.d.dhi.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, .thiti hoti kusalesu dhammesu, no vu.d.dhi no haani.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, vu.d.dhi hoti kusalesu dhammesu, no .thiti no haani? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yattako hoti saddhaaya siilena sutena caagena pa~n~naaya pa.tibhaanena, tassa te dhammaa neva ti.t.thanti no haayanti. vu.d.dhimeta.m, bhikkhave, vadaami kusalesu dhammesu, no .thiti.m no haani.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, vu.d.dhi hoti kusalesu dhammesu, no .thiti no haani.
[03] ``no ^a^V3.0081^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paracittapariyaayakusalo hoti, atha `sacittapariyaayakusalo bhavissaamii'ti -- eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sacittapariyaayakusalo hoti? seyyathaapi ^a^P5.0097^ea^, bhikkhave, itthii vaa puriso vaa daharo yuvaa ma.n.danakajaatiko aadaase vaa ^a^M3.0333^ea^ parisuddhe pariyodaate acche vaa udapatte saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano sace tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, tasseva rajassa vaa a"nga.nassa vaa pahaanaaya vaayamati. no ce tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, tenevattamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo -- `laabhaa vata me, parisuddha.m vata me'ti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paccavekkha.naa bahukaaraa hoti kusalesu dhammesu -- `abhijjhaalu nu kho bahula.m viharaami, anabhijjhaalu nu kho bahula.m viharaami, byaapannacitto nu ^a^T5.0103^ea^ kho bahula.m viharaami, abyaapannacitto nu kho bahula.m viharaami, thinamiddhapariyu.t.thito nu kho bahula.m viharaami, vigatathinamiddho nu kho bahula.m viharaami, uddhato nu kho bahula.m viharaami, anuddhato nu kho bahula.m viharaami, vicikiccho nu kho bahula.m viharaami, ti.n.navicikiccho nu kho bahula.m viharaami, kodhano nu kho bahula.m viharaami, akkodhano nu kho bahula.m viharaami, sa.mkili.t.thacitto nu kho bahula.m viharaami, asa.mkili.t.thacitto nu kho bahula.m viharaami, saaraddhakaayo nu kho bahula.m viharaami, asaaraddhakaayo nu kho bahula.m viharaami, kusiito nu kho bahula.m viharaami, aaraddhaviiriyo nu kho bahula.m viharaami, samaahito nu kho bahula.m viharaami, asamaahito nu kho bahula.m viharaamii'ti.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `abhijjhaalu bahula.m viharaami, byaapannacitto bahula.m viharaami, thinamiddhapariyu.t.thito bahula.m viharaami, uddhato bahula.m viharaami, vicikiccho bahula.m viharaami, kodhano bahula.m viharaami, sa.mkili.t.thacitto bahula.m viharaami, saaraddhakaayo bahula.m viharaami, kusiito bahula.m viharaami, asamaahito bahula.m viharaamii'ti, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya ^a^P5.0098^ea^ adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aadittacelo vaa aadittasiiso vaa. tasseva celassa vaa siisassa vaa nibbaapanaaya adhimatta.m chanda~nca ^a^T5.0104^ea^ vaayaama~nca ussaaha~nca usso.lhi~nca appa.tivaani~nca sati~nca sampaja~n~na~nca kareyya; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tena bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva ^a^V3.0082^ea^ paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``sace ^a^M3.0334^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `anabhijjhaalu bahula.m viharaami, abyaapannacitto bahula.m viharaami, vigatathinamiddho bahula.m viharaami, anuddhato bahula.m viharaami, ti.n.navicikiccho bahula.m viharaami, akkodhano bahula.m viharaami, asa.mkili.t.thacitto bahula.m viharaami, asaaraddhakaayo bahula.m viharaami, aaraddhaviiriyo bahula.m viharaami, samaahito bahula.m viharaamii'ti, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesuyeva kusalesu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya uttari aasavaana.m khayaaya yogo kara.niiyo''ti. tatiya.m.
[03] 54^b^.^eb^ ``no ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paracittapariyaayakusalo hoti, atha `sacittapariyaayakusalo bhavissaamii'ti -- eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sacittapariyaayakusalo hoti? seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, itthii vaa puriso vaa daharo yuvaa ma.n.danakajaatiko aadaase vaa parisuddhe pariyodaate acche vaa udapatte saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano sace tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, tasseva rajassa vaa a"nga.nassa vaa pahaanaaya vaayamati. no ce tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, tenevattamano hoti ^a^P5.0099^ea^ paripu.n.nasa"nkappo -- `laabhaa vata me, parisuddha.m vata me'ti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno paccavekkha.naa bahukaaraa hoti ^a^T5.0105^ea^ kusalesu dhammesu -- `laabhii nu khomhi ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, na nu khomhi laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, laabhii nu khomhi adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, na nu khomhi laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaayaa'ti.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `laabhiimhi ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaayaa'ti, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa ajjhatta.m cetosamathe pati.t.thaaya adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya yogo kara.niiyo. so aparena samayena laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya.

[03] ``sace ^a^V3.0083^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `laabhiimhi adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, na laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassaa'ti, tena, bhikkhave ^a^M3.0335^ea^, bhikkhunaa adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya pati.t.thaaya ajjhatta.m cetosamathe yogo kara.niiyo. so aparena samayena laabhii ceva hoti adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya laabhii ca ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa.

[03] ``sace, pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `na laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaayaa'ti, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tilaabhaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aadittacelo vaa aadittasiiso vaa. tasseva celassa vaa siisassa vaa nibbaapanaaya adhimatta.m chanda~nca vaayaama~nca ussaaha~nca usso.lhi~nca appa.tivaani~nca sati~nca sampaja~n~na~nca kareyya. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tena ^a^T5.0106^ea^ bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tilaabhaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ^a^P5.0100^ea^ ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m. so aparena samayena laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya.

[03] ``sace pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `laabhiimhi ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaayaa'ti, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesuyeva kusalesu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya uttari aasavaana.m khayaaya yogo kara.niiyo.

[03] ``ciivarampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampi. pi.n.dapaatampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampi. senaasanampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampi. gaamanigamampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampi. janapadapadesampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampi. puggalampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampi.

[03] ```ciivarampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti kho ^a^V3.0084^ea^ paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa ciivara.m -- `ida.m kho me ciivara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupa.m ciivara.m na sevitabba.m. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa ciivara.m -- `ida.m kho me ^a^M3.0336^ea^ ciivara.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupa.m ciivara.m sevitabba.m. `ciivarampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti ya.m ^a^T5.0107^ea^ ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```pi.n.dapaatampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa pi.n.dapaata.m -- `ima.m kho me pi.n.dapaata.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa ^a^P5.0101^ea^ parihaayantii'ti, evaruupo pi.n.dapaato na sevitabbo. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa pi.n.dapaata.m -- `ima.m kho me pi.n.dapaata.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupo pi.n.dapaato sevitabbo. `pi.n.dapaatampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```senaasanampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa senaasana.m -- `ida.m kho me senaasana.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupa.m senaasana.m na sevitabba.m. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa senaasana.m -- `ida.m kho me senaasana.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupa.m senaasana.m sevitabba.m. `senaasanampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```gaamanigamampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa gaamanigama.m -- `ima.m kho me gaamanigama.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti ^a^T5.0108^ea^, evaruupo gaamanigamo na sevitabbo. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa gaamanigama.m -- `ima.m kho me gaamanigama.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupo gaamanigamo sevitabbo ^a^V3.0085^ea^. `gaamanigamampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```janapadapadesampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa janapadapadesa.m -- `ima.m kho me janapadapadesa.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa ^a^M3.0337^ea^ ^a^P5.0102^ea^ dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupo janapadapadeso na sevitabbo. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa janapadapadesa.m -- `ima.m kho me janapadapadesa.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupo janapadapadeso sevitabbo. `janapadapadesampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```puggalampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? tattha ya.m ja~n~naa puggala.m -- `ima.m kho me puggala.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaruupo puggalo na sevitabbo. tattha ya.m ja~n~naa puggala.m -- `ima.m kho me puggala.m sevato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaruupo puggalo sevitabbo ^a^T5.0109^ea^. `puggalampaaha.m, bhikkhave, duvidhena vadaami -- sevitabbampi asevitabbampii'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti {bhikkhavoti (sii0 syaa0)}. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ```parihaanadhammo puggalo, parihaanadhammo puggalo'ti, aavuso, vuccati. `aparihaanadhammo puggalo, aparihaanadhammo puggalo'ti, aavuso, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, parihaanadhammo puggalo vutto bhagavataa, kittaavataa ca pana aparihaanadhammo puggalo vutto ^a^V3.0086^ea^ bhagavataa''ti? ``duuratopi kho maya.m, aavuso, aagacchaama aayasmato saariputtassa santike etassa bhaasitassa atthama~n~naatu.m. saadhu vataayasmanta.myeva saariputta.m pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho ^a^P5.0103^ea^. aayasmato saariputtassa sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti.
[03] ``tenahaavuso ^a^M3.0338^ea^, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, parihaanadhammo puggalo vutto bhagavataa? idhaavuso, bhikkhu assuta~nceva dhamma.m na su.naati, sutaa cassa dhammaa sammosa.m gacchanti, ye cassa dhammaa pubbe cetaso asamphu.t.thapubbaa te cassa na samudaacaranti, avi~n~naata~nceva na vijaanaati. ettaavataa kho, aavuso, parihaanadhammo puggalo vutto bhagavataa.

[03] ``kittaavataa ca panaavuso, aparihaanadhammo puggalo vutto bhagavataa? idhaavuso, bhikkhu assuta~nceva dhamma.m su.naati, sutaa cassa dhammaa ^a^T5.0110^ea^ na sammosa.m gacchanti, ye cassa dhammaa pubbe cetaso asamphu.t.thapubbaa te cassa samudaacaranti, avi~n~naata~nceva vijaanaati. ettaavataa kho, aavuso, aparihaanadhammo puggalo vutto bhagavataa.
[03] ``no ce, aavuso, bhikkhu paracittapariyaayakusalo hoti, atha `sacittapariyaayakusalo bhavissaamii'ti -- eva~nhi vo, aavuso, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``katha~ncaavuso, bhikkhu sacittapariyaayakusalo hoti? seyyathaapi, aavuso, itthii vaa puriso vaa daharo yuvaa ma.n.danakajaatiko aadaase vaa parisuddhe pariyodaate acche vaa udapatte saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano sace tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, tasseva rajassa vaa a"nga.nassa vaa pahaanaaya vaayamati. no ce tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, tenevattamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo ^a^P5.0104^ea^ -- `laabhaa vata me, parisuddha.m vata me'ti. evameva kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno paccavekkha.naa bahukaaraa hoti kusalesu dhammesu -- `anabhijjhaalu nu kho bahula.m viharaami, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no, abyaapannacitto nu kho bahula.m viharaami, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no, vigatathinamiddho nu kho bahula.m ^a^V3.0087^ea^ viharaami, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no, anuddhato nu kho bahula.m viharaami, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no, ti.n.navicikiccho nu kho bahula.m viharaami, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no, akkodhano nu kho bahula.m viharaami, sa.mvijjati ^a^M3.0339^ea^ nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu ^a^T5.0111^ea^ no, asa.mkili.t.thacitto nu kho bahula.m viharaami, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no, laabhii nu khomhi ajjhatta.m dhammapaamojjassa, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no, laabhii nu khomhi ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no, laabhii nu khomhi adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti.

[03] ``sace pana, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano sabbepime kusale dhamme attani na samanupassati, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sabbesa.myeva imesa.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tilaabhaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nc kara.niiya.m. seyyathaapi, aavuso, aadittacelo vaa aadittasiiso vaa. tasseva celassa vaa siisassa vaa nibbaapanaaya adhimatta.m chanda~nca vaayaama~nca ussaaha~nca usso.lhi~nca appa.tivaani~nca sati~nca sampaja~n~na~nc kareyya. evameva.m kho, aavuso, tena bhikkhunaa sabbesa.myeva kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tilaabhaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nc kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano ekacce kusale dhamme attani samanupassati, ekacce kusale dhamme attani ^a^P5.0105^ea^ na samanupassati, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa ye kusale dhamme attani samanupassati tesu kusalesu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya, ye kusale dhamme attani na samanupassati tesa.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tilaabhaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ^a^T5.0112^ea^ ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m. seyyathaapi, aavuso, aadittacelo vaa aadittasiiso vaa. tasseva celassa vaa siisassa vaa nibbaapanaaya adhimatta.m chanda~nca vaayaama~nca ussaaha~nca usso.lhi~nca appa.tivaani~nca sati~nca sampaja~n~na~nca kareyya. evameva.m kho, aavuso, tena bhikkhunaa ye kusale dhamme attani samanupassati tesu kusalesu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya, ye kusale dhamme attani na samanupassati tesa.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tilaabhaaya ^a^V3.0088^ea^ adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano sabbepime kusale dhamme attani samanupassati, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sabbesveva imesu kusalesu ^a^M3.0340^ea^ dhammesu pati.t.thaaya uttari aasavaana.m khayaaya yogo kara.niiyo''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ ``dasayimaa, bhikkhave, sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa. katamaa dasa? asubhasa~n~naa, mara.nasa~n~naa, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa, aniccasa~n~naa, anicce dukkhasa~n~naa, dukkhe anattasa~n~naa, pahaanasa~n~naa, viraagasa~n~naa, nirodhasa~n~naa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, dasa sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ ``dasayimaa ^a^P5.0106^ea^, bhikkhave, sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti ^a^T5.0113^ea^ mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa. katamaa dasa? aniccasa~n~naa, anattasa~n~naa, mara.nasa~n~naa, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~naa, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa, a.t.thikasa~n~naa, pu.lavakasa~n~naa {pulavakasa~n~naa (sii0 pii0), pu.luvakasa~n~naa (ka0), a0 ni0 1.463-472}, viniilakasa~n~naa, vicchiddakasa~n~naa, uddhumaatakasa~n~naa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, dasa sa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa honti mahaanisa.msaa amatogadhaa amatapariyosaanaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 8.83} ``sace, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `ki.mmuulakaa, aavuso, sabbe dhammaa, ki.msambhavaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.msamudayaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.msamosara.naa sabbe dhammaa, ki.mpamukhaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.madhipateyyaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.muttaraa sabbe dhammaa, ki.msaaraa sabbe dhammaa, ki.mogadhaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa sabbe dhammaa'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0089^ea^, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m kinti byaakareyyaathaa''ti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa bhagava.mnettikaa bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti.
[03] ``tena ^a^M3.0341^ea^ hi, bhikkhave, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `ki.mmuulakaa, aavuso, sabbe dhammaa, ki.msambhavaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.msamudayaa ^a^T5.0114^ea^ sabbe dhammaa, ki.msamosara.naa sabbe ^a^P5.0107^ea^ dhammaa ki.mpamukhaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.m adhipateyyaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.muttaraa sabbe dhammaa, ki.msaaraa sabbe dhammaa, ki.mogadhaa sabbe dhammaa, ki.mpariyosaanaa sabbe dhammaa'ti, eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `chandamuulakaa, aavuso, sabbe dhammaa, manasikaarasambhavaa sabbe dhammaa, phassasamudayaa sabbe dhammaa, vedanaasamosara.naa sabbe dhammaa, samaadhippamukhaa sabbe dhammaa, sataadhipateyyaa sabbe dhammaa, pa~n~nuttaraa sabbe dhammaa, vimuttisaaraa sabbe dhammaa, amatogadhaa sabbe dhammaa, nibbaanapariyosaanaa sabbe dhammaa'ti. eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaathaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `yathaapabbajjaaparicita~nca no citta.m bhavissati, na cuppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassanti; aniccasa~n~naaparicita~nca no citta.m bhavissati, anattasa~n~naaparicita~nca no citta.m bhavissati, asubhasa~n~naaparicita~nca no citta.m bhavissati, aadiinavasa~n~naaparicita~nca no citta.m bhavissati, lokassa sama~nca visama~nca ~natvaa ta.msa~n~naaparicita~nca no citta.m bhavissati, lokassa bhava~nca {sambhava~nca (sii0 syaa0)} vibhava~nca ~natvaa ta.msa~n~naaparicita~nca no citta.m bhavissati, lokassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca ~natvaa ta.msa~n~naaparicita~nca no citta.m bhavissati, pahaanasa~n~naaparicita~nca ^a^T5.0115^ea^ no citta.m bhavissati, viraagasa~n~naaparicita~nca no citta.m bhavissati, nirodhasa~n~naaparicita~nca no citta.m bhavissatii'ti -- eva~nhi ^a^P5.0108^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``yato ^a^M3.0342^ea^ ^a^V3.0090^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno yathaapabbajjaaparicita~nca citta.m hoti na cuppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti, aniccasa~n~naaparicita~nca citta.m hoti, anattasa~n~naaparicita~nca citta.m hoti, asubhasa~n~naaparicita~nca citta.m hoti, aadiinavasa~n~naaparicita~nca citta.m hoti, lokassa sama~nca visama~nca ~natvaa ta.msa~n~naaparicita~nca citta.m hoti, lokassa bhava~nca vibhava~nca ~natvaa ta.msa~n~naaparicita~nca citta.m hoti, lokassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca ~natvaa ta.msa~n~naaparicita~nca citta.m hoti, pahaanasa~n~naaparicita~nca citta.m hoti, viraagasa~n~naaparicita~nca citta.m hoti, nirodhasa~n~naaparicita~nca citta.m hoti, tassa dvinna.m phalaana.m a~n~natara.m phala.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- di.t.theva dhamme a~n~naa, sati vaa upaadisese anaagaamitaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa girimaanando aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``aayasmaa, bhante, girimaanando aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano ^a^T5.0116^ea^. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa yenaayasmaa girimaanando tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. ``sace kho tva.m, aananda, girimaanandassa bhikkhuno dasa sa~n~naa bhaaseyyaasi, .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m girimaanandassa bhikkhuno dasa sa~n~naa sutvaa so aabaadho .thaanaso pa.tippassambheyya.

[03] ``katamaa dasa? aniccasa~n~naa ^a^P5.0109^ea^, anattasa~n~naa, asubhasa~n~naa, aadiinavasa~n~naa, pahaanasa~n~naa, viraagasa~n~naa, nirodhasa~n~naa, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa {anabhiratisa~n~naa (ka0)}, sabbasa"nkhaaresu anicchaasa~n~naa, aanaapaanassati.

[03] ``katamaa caananda, aniccasa~n~naa? idhaananda, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ruupa.m anicca.m, vedanaa aniccaa ^a^M3.0343^ea^, sa~n~naa aniccaa ^a^V3.0091^ea^, sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, vi~n~naa.na.m anicca'nti. iti imesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu aniccaanupassii viharati. aya.m vuccataananda, aniccasa~n~naa.

[03] ``katamaa caananda, anattasa~n~naa? idhaananda, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `cakkhu anattaa, ruupaa anattaa, sota.m anattaa, saddaa anattaa, ghaana.m anattaa, gandhaa anattaa, jivhaa anattaa, rasaa anattaa, kaayaa anattaa, pho.t.thabbaa anattaa, mano anattaa, dhammaa anattaa'ti. iti imesu chasu ajjhattikabaahiresu aayatanesu anattaanupassii viharati. aya.m vuccataananda, anattasa~n~naa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^T5.0117^ea^ caananda, asubhasa~n~naa? idhaananda, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m uddha.m paadatalaa adho kesamatthakaa tacapariyanta.m puura.m naanaappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta'nti. iti imasmi.m kaaye asubhaanupassii viharati. aya.m vuccataananda, asubhasa~n~naa.

[01] ``katamaa caananda, aadiinavasa~n~naa? idhaananda, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `bahudukkho kho aya.m ^a^P5.0110^ea^ kaayo bahuaadiinavo? iti imasmi.m kaaye vividhaa aabaadhaa uppajjanti, seyyathida.m -- cakkhurogo sotarogo ghaanarogo jivhaarogo kaayarogo siisarogo ka.n.narogo mukharogo dantarogo o.t.tharogo kaaso saaso pinaaso .daaho {.daho (sii0 syaa0)} jaro kucchirogo mucchaa pakkhandikaa suulaa visuucikaa ku.t.tha.m ga.n.do kilaaso soso apamaaro daddu ka.n.du kacchu nakhasaa vitacchikaa lohita.m pitta.m {lohitapitta.m (sii0)} madhumeho a.msaa pi.lakaa bhagandalaa pittasamu.t.thaanaa aabaadhaa semhasamu.t.thaanaa aabaadhaa vaatasamu.t.thaanaa aabaadhaa sannipaatikaa aabaadhaa utupari.naamajaa aabaadhaa visamaparihaarajaa aabaadhaa opakkamikaa aabaadhaa kammavipaakajaa aabaadhaa siita.m u.nha.m jighacchaa pipaasaa uccaaro passaavo'ti. iti ^a^M3.0344^ea^ imasmi.m kaaye aadiinavaanupassii viharati. aya.m vuccataananda, aadiinavasa~n~naa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^T5.0118^ea^ caananda, pahaanasa~n~naa? idhaananda, bhikkhu uppanna.m kaamavitakka.m naadhivaaseti, pajahati ^a^V3.0092^ea^, vinodeti, byantiikaroti, anabhaava.m gameti. uppanna.m byaapaadavitakka.m naadhivaaseti, pajahati, vinodeti, byantiikaroti, anabhaava.m gameti. uppanna.m vihi.msaavitakka.m naadhivaaseti, pajahati, vinodeti, byantiikaroti, anabhaava.m gameti. uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme naadhivaaseti, pajahati, vinodeti, byantiikaroti, anabhaava.m gameti. aya.m vuccataananda, pahaanasa~n~naa.

[01] ``katamaa caananda, viraagasa~n~naa? idhaananda, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhippa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nibbaana'nti. aya.m vuccataananda, viraagasa~n~naa.

[03] ``katamaa caananda, nirodhasa~n~naa? idhaananda, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `eta.m santa.m eta.m ^a^P5.0111^ea^ pa.niita.m yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhippa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo nirodho nibbaana'nti. aya.m vuccataananda, nirodhasa~n~naa.

[03] ``katamaa caananda, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa? idhaananda, bhikkhu ye loke upaadaanaa cetaso adhi.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaa, te pajahanto viharati anupaadiyanto. aya.m vuccataananda, sabbaloke anabhiratasa~n~naa.

[03] ``katamaa caananda, sabbasa"nkhaaresu anicchaasa~n~naa? idhaananda, bhikkhu sabbasa"nkhaaresu a.t.tiiyati haraayati jigucchati. aya.m vuccataananda, sabbasa"nkhaaresu ^a^T5.0119^ea^ anicchaasa~n~naa.

[03] ``katamaa caananda, aanaapaanassati? idhaananda, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so satova assasati satova passasati. diigha.m vaa assasanto `diigha.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati. diigha.m vaa passasanto `diigha.m passasaamii'ti pajaanaati. rassa.m vaa assasanto `rassa.m assasaamii'ti pajaanaati. rassa.m vaa passasanto `rassa.m ^a^M3.0345^ea^ passasaamii'ti pajaanaati. `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `sabbakaayapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `passambhaya.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m ^a^V3.0093^ea^ passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `piitipa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `piitipa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `sukhapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `sukhapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `cittasa"nkhaarapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `cittasa"nkhaarapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `passambhaya.m cittasa"nkhaara.m assasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `passambhaya.m cittasa"nkhaara.m passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `cittapa.tisa.mvedii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `cittapa.tisa.mvedii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati ^a^P5.0112^ea^. abhippamodaya.m citta.m...pe0... samaadaha.m citta.m...pe0... vimocaya.m citta.m...pe0... aniccaanupassii...pe0... viraagaanupassii...pe0... nirodhaanupassii...pe0... `pa.tinissaggaanupassii assasissaamii'ti sikkhati. `pa.tinissaggaanupassii passasissaamii'ti sikkhati. aya.m vuccataananda, aanaapaanassati.

[03] ``sace kho tva.m, aananda, girimaanandassa bhikkhuno imaa ^a^T5.0120^ea^ dasa sa~n~naa bhaaseyyaasi, .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati ya.m girimaanandassa bhikkhuno imaa dasa sa~n~naa sutvaa so aabaadho .thaanaso pa.tippassambheyyaa''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato santike imaa dasa sa~n~naa uggahetvaa yenaayasmaa girimaanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmato girimaanandassa imaa dasa sa~n~naa abhaasi. atha kho aayasmato girimaanandassa dasa sa~n~naa sutvaa so aabaadho .thaanaso pa.tippassambhi. vu.t.thahi caayasmaa girimaanando tamhaa aabaadhaa. tathaa pahiino ca panaayasmato girimaanandassa so aabaadho ahosii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] sacittavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] sacitta~nca saariputta, .thiti ca samathena ca.
[22] parihaano ca dve sa~n~naa, muulaa pabbajita.m giriiti..

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ ``purimaa ^a^M3.0346^ea^ ^a^V3.0094^ea^ ^a^P5.0113^ea^, bhikkhave, ko.ti na pa~n~naayati avijjaaya -- `ito pubbe avijjaa naahosi, atha pacchaa samabhavii'ti. eva~nceta.m, bhikkhave, vuccati, atha ca pana pa~n~naayati -- `idappaccayaa avijjaa'ti.

[03] ``avijjampaaha.m {avijjampaha.m (sii0 syaa0)}, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro avijjaaya? `pa~nca niivara.naa'tissa vacaniiya.m. pa~ncapaaha.m, bhikkhave, niivara.ne saahaare vadaami ^a^T5.0121^ea^, no anaahaare. ko caahaaro pa~ncanna.m niivara.naana.m? `tii.ni duccaritaanii'tissa vacaniiya.m. tii.nipaaha.m, bhikkhave, duccaritaani saahaaraani vadaami, no anaahaaraani. ko caahaaro ti.n.na.m duccaritaana.m? `indriyaasa.mvaro'tissa vacaniiya.m. indriyaasa.mvarampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro indriyaasa.mvarassa? `asataasampaja~n~na'ntissa vacaniiya.m. asataasampaja~n~nampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro asataasampaja~n~nassa? `ayonisomanasikaaro'tissa vacaniiya.m. ayonisomanasikaarampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro ayonisomanasikaarassa? `assaddhiya'ntissa vacaniiya.m. assaddhiyampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro assaddhiyassa? `asaddhammassavana'ntissa vacaniiya.m. asaddhammassavanampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro asaddhammassavanassa? `asappurisasa.msevo'tissa vacaniiya.m.

[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, asappurisasa.msevo paripuuro asaddhammassavana.m paripuureti, asaddhammassavana.m paripuura.m assaddhiya.m paripuureti, assaddhiya.m paripuura.m ayonisomanasikaara.m paripuureti, ayonisomanasikaaro paripuuro asataasampaja~n~na.m paripuureti, asataasampaja~n~na.m paripuura.m indriyaasa.mvara.m ^a^P5.0114^ea^ paripuureti, indriyaasa.mvaro paripuuro tii.ni duccaritaani paripuureti, tii.ni ^a^V3.0095^ea^ duccaritaani paripuuraani pa~nca niivara.ne paripuurenti, pa~nca niivara.naa paripuuraa avijja.m paripuurenti. evametissaa avijjaaya aahaaro hoti, eva~nca paaripuuri.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M3.0347^ea^, bhikkhave, uparipabbate thullaphusitake ^a^T5.0122^ea^ deve vassante ( ) {(galagalaayante) (sii0), (ga.laga.laayante) (syaa0)} ta.m udaka.m yathaaninna.m pavattamaana.m pabbatakandarapadarasaakhaa paripuureti, pabbatakandarapadarasaakhaa paripuuraa kusobbhe {kussubbhe (sii0), kusubbhe (syaa0), kusombhe (ka0) a0 ni0 3.96} paripuurenti. kusobbhaa paripuuraa mahaasobbhe {mahaasombhe (ka0)} paripuurenti, mahaasobbhaa paripuuraa kunnadiyo paripuurenti, kunnadiyo paripuuraa mahaanadiyo paripuurenti, mahaanadiyo paripuuraa mahaasamudda.m saagara.m paripuurenti; evametassa mahaasamuddassa saagarassa aahaaro hoti, eva~nca paaripuuri.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, asappurisasa.msevo paripuuro asaddhammassavana.m paripuureti, asaddhammassavana.m paripuura.m assaddhiya.m paripuureti, assaddhiya.m paripuura.m ayonisomanasikaara.m paripuureti, ayonisomanasikaaro paripuuro asataasampaja~n~na.m paripuureti, asataasampaja~n~na.m paripuura.m indriyaasa.mvara.m paripuureti, indriyaasa.mvaro paripuuro tii.ni duccaritaani paripuureti, tii.ni duccaritaani paripuuraani pa~nca niivara.ne paripuurenti, pa~nca niivara.naa paripuuraa avijja.m paripuurenti; evametissaa avijjaaya aahaaro hoti, eva~nca paaripuuri.

[03] ``vijjaavimuttimpaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro vijjaavimuttiyaa? `satta bojjha"ngaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. sattapaaha.m, bhikkhave, bojjha"nge saahaare vadaami, no anaahaare. ko caahaaro sattanna.m bojjha"ngaana.m? `cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. cattaaropaaha.m, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaane saahaare vadaami, no anaahaare. ko caahaaro catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m? `tii.ni sucaritaanii'tissa ^a^P5.0115^ea^ vacaniiya.m. tii.nipaaha.m, bhikkhave, sucaritaani saahaaraani vadaami, no anaahaaraani. ko caahaaro ti.n.na.m sucaritaana.m? `indriyasa.mvaro'tissa ^a^T5.0123^ea^ vacaniiya.m. indriyasa.mvarampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro indriyasa.mvarassa? `satisampaja~n~na'ntissa vacaniiya.m. satisampaja~n~nampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro satisampaja~n~nassa? `yonisomanasikaaro'tissa vacaniiya.m. yonisomanasikaarampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro yonisomanasikaarassa? `saddhaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. saddhampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro saddhaaya ^a^M3.0348^ea^? `saddhammassavana'ntissa vacaniiya.m. saddhammassavanampaaha.m, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0096^ea^, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro saddhammassavanassa? `sappurisasa.msevo'tissa vacaniiya.m.

[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, sappurisasa.msevo paripuuro saddhammassavana.m paripuureti, saddhammassavana.m paripuura.m saddha.m paripuureti, saddhaa paripuuraa yonisomanasikaara.m paripuureti, yonisomanasikaaro paripuuro satisampaja~n~na.m paripuureti, satisampaja~n~na.m paripuura.m indriyasa.mvara.m paripuureti, indriyasa.mvaro paripuuro tii.ni sucaritaani paripuureti, tii.ni sucaritaani paripuuraani cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuurenti, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa paripuuraa satta bojjha"nge paripuurenti, satta bojjha"ngaa paripuuraa vijjaavimutti.m paripuurenti; evametissaa vijjaavimuttiyaa aahaaro hoti, eva~nca paaripuuri.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, uparipabbate thullaphusitake deve vassante ta.m udaka.m yathaaninna.m pavattamaana.m pabbatakandarapadarasaakhaa paripuureti, pabbatakandarapadarasaakhaa paripuuraa kusobbhe paripuurenti, kusobbhaa paripuuraa mahaasobbhe ^a^T5.0124^ea^ paripuurenti, mahaasobbhaa paripuuraa kunnadiyo paripuurenti, kunnadiyo paripuuraa mahaanadiyo paripuurenti, mahaanadiyo paripuuraa mahaasamudda.m ^a^P5.0116^ea^ saagara.m paripuurenti; evametassa mahaasamuddassa saagarassa aahaaro hoti, eva~nca paaripuuri.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, sappurisasa.msevo paripuuro saddhammassavana.m paripuureti, saddhammassavana.m paripuura.m saddha.m paripuureti, saddhaa paripuuraa yonisomanasikaara.m paripuureti, yonisomanasikaaro paripuuro satisampaja~n~na.m paripuureti, satisampaja~n~na.m paripuura.m indriyasa.mvara.m paripuureti, indriyasa.mvaro paripuuro tii.ni sucaritaani paripuureti, tii.ni sucaritaani paripuuraani cattaaro satipa.t.thaane paripuurenti, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa paripuuraa satta bojjha"nge paripuurenti, satta bojjha"ngaa paripuuraa vijjaavimutti.m paripuurenti; evametissaa vijjaavimuttiyaa aahaaro hoti, eva~nca paaripuurii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ``purimaa, bhikkhave, ko.ti na pa~n~naayati bhavata.nhaaya -- `ito pubbe bhavata.nhaa naahosi ^a^V3.0097^ea^, atha pacchaa samabhavii'ti. eva~nceta.m, bhikkhave, vuccati, atha ca pana pa~n~naayati -- `idappaccayaa bhavata.nhaa'ti.

[03] ``bhavata.nhaampaaha.m ^a^M3.0349^ea^, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro bhavata.nhaaya? `avijjaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. avijjampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro avijjaaya? `pa~nca niivara.naa'tissa vacaniiya.m. pa~nca niivara.nepaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaare vadaami, no anaahaare. ko caahaaro pa~ncanna.m niivara.naana.m? `tii.ni duccaritaanii'tissa vacaniiya.m. tii.nipaaha.m, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0125^ea^, duccaritaani saahaaraani vadaami, no anaahaaraani. ko caahaaro ti.n.nanna.m duccaritaana.m? `indriyaasa.mvaro'tissa vacaniiya.m. indriyaasa.mvarampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m ^a^P5.0117^ea^. ko caahaaro indriyaasa.mvarassa? `asataasampaja~n~na'ntissa vacaniiya.m. asataasampaja~n~nampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro asataa sampaja~n~nassa? `ayonisomanasikaaro'tissa vacaniiya.m. ayonisomanasikaarampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro ayonisomanasikaarassa? `assaddhiya'ntissa vacaniiya.m. assaddhiyampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro assaddhiyassa? `assaddhammassavana'ntissa vacaniiya.m. assaddhammassavanampaaha.m, bhikkhave, saahaara.m vadaami, no anaahaara.m. ko caahaaro assaddhammassavanassa? `asappurisasa.msevo'tissa vacaniiya.m.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ``ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi ni.t.tha.m gataa sabbe te di.t.thisampannaa. tesa.m di.t.thisampannaana.m pa~ncanna.m idha ni.t.thaa, pa~ncanna.m idha vihaaya ni.t.thaa. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m idha ni.t.thaa? sattakkhattuparamassa ^a^P5.0120^ea^, kola.mkolassa, ekabiijissa, sakadaagaamissa, yo ca di.t.theva dhamme arahaa -- imesa.m pa~ncanna.m idha ni.t.thaa. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m idha vihaaya ni.t.thaa? antaraaparinibbaayissa, upahaccaparinibbaayissa, asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayissa, sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayissa, uddha.msotassa akani.t.thagaamino -- imesa.m pa~ncanna.m idha vihaaya ni.t.thaa. ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi ni.t.tha.m gataa, sabbe te di.t.thisampannaa. tesa.m di.t.thisampannaana.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m idha ni.t.thaa, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m idha vihaaya ni.t.thaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ ``ye keci, bhikkhave, mayi aveccappasannaa, sabbe te sotaapannaa. tesa.m sotaapannaana.m pa~ncanna.m idha ni.t.thaa, pa~ncanna.m idha vihaaya ni.t.thaa. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m idha ni.t.thaa? sattakkhattuparamassa, kola.mkolassa, ekabiijissa, sakadaagaamissa, yo ca di.t.theva dhamme arahaa ^a^V3.0100^ea^ -- imesa.m pa~ncanna.m idha ni.t.thaa. katamesa.m pa~ncanna.m idha vihaaya ni.t.thaa? antaraaparinibbaayissa, upahaccaparinibbaayissa, asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayissa, sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayissa, uddha.msotassa akani.t.thagaamino -- imesa.m pa~ncanna.m idha vihaaya ni.t.thaa. ye keci, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0129^ea^, mayi aveccappasannaa sabbe te sotaapannaa. tesa.m ^a^M3.0352^ea^ sotaapannaana.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m idha ni.t.thaa, imesa.m pa~ncanna.m idha vihaaya ni.t.thaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa saariputto magadhesu viharati naalakagaamake. atha kho saama.n.dakaani paribbaajako yenaayasmaa ^a^P5.0121^ea^ saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho saama.n.dakaani paribbaajako aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso saariputta, sukha.m, ki.m dukkha''nti? ``abhinibbatti kho, aavuso ^a^T5.0130^ea^, dukkhaa, anabhinibbatti sukhaa. abhinibbattiyaa, aavuso, sati ida.m dukkha.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- siita.m u.nha.m jighacchaa pipaasaa uccaaro passaavo aggisamphasso da.n.dasamphasso satthasamphasso ~naatiipi mittaapi sa"ngamma samaagamma rosenti. abhinibbattiyaa, aavuso, sati ida.m dukkha.m paa.tika"nkha.m. anabhinibbattiyaa, aavuso, sati ida.m sukha.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- na siita.m na u.nha.m na jighacchaa na pipaasaa na uccaaro na passaavo na aggisamphasso na da.n.dasamphasso na satthasamphasso ~naatiipi mittaapi sa"ngamma samaagamma na rosenti. anabhinibbattiyaa, aavuso, sati ida.m sukha.m paa.tika"nkha''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa saariputto magadhesu viharati naalakagaamake. atha kho saama.n.dakaani paribbaajako yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho saama.n.dakaani paribbaajako aayasmanta.m ^a^P5.0122^ea^ saariputta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ki.m ^a^V3.0101^ea^ nu kho, aavuso, saariputta, imasmi.m dhammavinaye sukha.m, ki.m dukkha''nti? ``anabhirati kho, aavuso, imasmi.m dhammavinaye dukkhaa, abhirati sukhaa. anabhiratiyaa, aavuso, sati ida.m dukkha.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- gacchantopi sukha.m saata.m ^a^M3.0353^ea^ naadhigacchati, .thitopi... nisinnopi... sayaanopi... gaamagatopi... ara~n~nagatopi... rukkhamuulagatopi... su~n~naagaaragatopi... abbhokaasagatopi... bhikkhumajjhagatopi sukha.m saata.m naadhigacchati. anabhiratiyaa, aavuso, sati ^a^T5.0131^ea^ ida.m dukkha.m paa.tika"nkha.m.

[03] ``abhiratiyaa, aavuso, sati ida.m sukha.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- gacchantopi sukha.m saata.m adhigacchati, .thitopi... nisinnopi... sayaanopi... gaamagatopi... ara~n~nagatopi... rukkhamuulagatopi... su~n~naagaaragatopi... abbhokaasagatopi... bhikkhumajjhagatopi sukha.m saata.m adhigacchati. abhiratiyaa, aavuso, sati ida.m sukha.m paa.tika"nkha''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena na.lakapaana.m naama kosalaana.m nigamo tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa na.lakapaane viharati palaasavane. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa tadahuposathe bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto nisinno hoti. atha kho bhagavaa bahudeva ratti.m bhikkhuuna.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa tu.nhiibhuuta.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m anuviloketvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aamantesi --

[03] ``vigatathinamiddho {vigatathiinamiddho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kho, saariputta, bhikkhusa"ngho. pa.tibhaatu ta.m, saariputta ^a^P5.0123^ea^, bhikkhuuna.m dhammii kathaa. pi.t.thi me aagilaayati; tamaha.m aayamissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavato paccassosi.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~naapetvaa dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappesi paade paada.m accaadhaaya sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa. tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto ^a^V3.0102^ea^ bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0111^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m sambahulehi abhi~n~naatehi abhi~n~naatehi therehi saavakehi saddhi.m -- aayasmataa ca caalena {paalena (syaa0)}, aayasmataa ca upacaalena {uppaalena (syaa0)}, aayasmataa ca kukku.tena {kakka.tena (sii0 syaa0)}, aayasmataa ca ka.limbhena {kavimbhena (sii0)}, aayasmataa ca nika.tena {ka.tena (sii0)}, aayasmataa ca ka.tissahena; a~n~nehi ca abhi~n~naatehi abhi~n~naatehi therehi saavakehi saddhi.m.

[03] tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii bhadrehi ^a^T5.0144^ea^ bhadrehi yaanehi parapuraaya {para.mpuraaya (syaa0 a.t.tha0)} uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa mahaavana.m ajjhogaahanti bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. atha kho tesa.m aayasmantaana.m etadahosi -- ``ime kho sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii bhadrehi bhadrehi yaanehi parapuraaya uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa mahaavana.m ajjhogaahanti ^a^M3.0363^ea^ bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. `saddaka.n.takaa kho pana jhaanaa' vuttaa bhagavataa. ya.mnuuna maya.m yena gosi"ngasaalavanadaayo tenupasa"nkameyyaama ^a^P5.0134^ea^. tattha maya.m appasaddaa appaaki.n.naa phaasu.m {phaasu (syaa0 ka0)} vihareyyaamaa''ti. atha kho te aayasmanto yena gosi"ngasaalavanadaayo tenupasa"nkami.msu; tattha te aayasmanto appasaddaa appaaki.n.naa phaasu.m viharanti.

[03] ``saadhu ^a^V3.0112^ea^ saadhu, bhikkhave, yathaa te mahaasaavakaa sammaa byaakaramaanaa byaakareyyu.m, `saddaka.n.takaa hi, bhikkhave, jhaanaa' vuttaa mayaa.

[03] ``dasayime, bhikkhave, ka.n.takaa. katame dasa? pavivekaaraamassa sa"nga.nikaaraamataa ka.n.tako, asubhanimittaanuyoga.m anuyuttassa subhanimittaanuyogo ka.n.tako, indriyesu guttadvaarassa visuukadassana.m ka.n.tako, brahmacariyassa maatugaamuupacaaro {maatugaamopavicaaro (sii0), maatugaamuupavicaro (ka0)} ka.n.tako, {kathaa0 333} pa.thamassa ^a^P5.0135^ea^ jhaanassa saddo ka.n.tako, dutiyassa jhaanassa vitakkavicaaraa ka.n.takaa, tatiyassa jhaanassa piiti ka.n.tako, catutthassa jhaanassa assaasapassaaso ka.n.tako, sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca ka.n.tako raago ka.n.tako doso ka.n.tako moho ka.n.tako.

[03] ``tatraananda, yvaaya.m puggalo uddhato hoti ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati yatthassa ta.m uddhacca.m aparisesa.m nirujjhati, tassa savanenapi kata.m hoti, baahusaccenapi kata.m hoti, di.t.thiyaapi pa.tividdha.m hoti, saamaayikampi vimutti.m labhati. aya.m, aananda, puggalo amunaa purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. ta.m kissa hetu ^a^V3.0119^ea^? ima.m haananda, puggala.m dhammasoto nibbahati. tadantara.m ko jaaneyya a~n~natra tathaagatena! tasmaatihaananda, maa puggalesu pamaa.nikaa ahuvattha; maa puggalesu pamaa.na.m ga.nhittha. kha~n~nati haananda, puggalesu pamaa.na.m ga.nhanto. aha.m vaa, aananda, puggalesu pamaa.na.m ga.nheyya.m yo vaa panassa maadiso.
[03] ``kaa caananda, migasaalaa upaasikaa baalaa abyattaa ammakaa ammakapa~n~naa, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariye ~naa.ne! ime kho, aananda, dasa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.

[01] ``yathaaruupena, aananda, siilena puraa.no samannaagato ahosi tathaaruupena siilena isidatto samannaagato abhavissa, nayidha puraa.no isidattassa ^a^T5.0154^ea^ gatimpi a~n~nassa. yathaaruupaaya ^a^P5.0144^ea^ caananda, pa~n~naaya isidatto samannaagato ahosi tathaaruupaaya pa~n~naaya puraa.no samannaagato abhavissa, nayidha isidatto puraa.nassa gatimpi a~n~nassa. iti kho, aananda, ime puggalaa ubho eka"ngahiinaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammaa loke na sa.mvijjeyyu.m, na tathaagato loke uppajjeyya araha.m sammaasambuddho, na tathaagatappavedito dhammavinayo loke dibbeyya. katame tayo? jaati ca, jaraa ca, mara.na~nca -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa loke na sa.mvijjeyyu.m, na tathaagato loke uppajjeyya araha.m sammaasambuddho, na tathaagatappavedito dhammavinayo loke dibbeyya. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, ime tayo dhammaa loke sa.mvijjanti tasmaa tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho, tasmaa tathaagatappavedito dhammavinayo loke dibbati.

[03] ``tayome ^a^M3.0371^ea^, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo jaati.m pahaatu.m jara.m pahaatu.m mara.na.m pahaatu.m. katame tayo? raaga.m appahaaya, dosa.m appahaaya, moha.m appahaaya -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaaya abhabbo jaati.m pahaatu.m jara.m pahaatu.m mara.na.m pahaatu.m.

[03] ``tayome bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo raaga.m pahaatu.m dosa.m pahaatu.m moha.m pahaatu.m. katame ^a^V3.0120^ea^ tayo? sakkaayadi.t.thi.m appahaaya, vicikiccha.m appahaaya, siilabbataparaamaasa.m appahaaya -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaaya abhabbo raaga.m pahaatu.m dosa.m pahaatu.m moha.m pahaatu.m.

[03] ``tayome ^a^P5.0145^ea^, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo sakkaayadi.t.thi.m ^a^T5.0155^ea^ pahaatu.m vicikiccha.m pahaatu.m siilabbataparaamaasa.m pahaatu.m. katame tayo? ayonisomanasikaara.m appahaaya, kummaggasevana.m appahaaya, cetaso liinatta.m appahaaya -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaaya abhabbo sakkaayadi.t.thi.m pahaatu.m vicikiccha.m pahaatu.m siilabbataparaamaasa.m pahaatu.m.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo ayoniso manasikaara.m pahaatu.m kummaggasevana.m pahaatu.m cetaso liinatta.m pahaatu.m. katame tayo? mu.t.thasacca.m appahaaya, asampaja~n~na.m appahaaya, cetaso vikkhepa.m appahaaya -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaaya abhabbo ayonisomanasikaara.m pahaatu.m kummaggasevana.m pahaatu.m cetaso liinatta.m pahaatu.m.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo mu.t.thasacca.m pahaatu.m asampaja~n~na.m pahaatu.m cetaso vikkhepa.m pahaatu.m. katame tayo? ariyaana.m adassanakamyata.m appahaaya, ariyadhammassa {ariyadhamma.m (syaa0)} asotukamyata.m appahaaya, upaarambhacittata.m appahaaya -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaaya abhabbo mu.t.thasacca.m pahaatu.m asampaja~n~na.m pahaatu.m cetaso vikkhepa.m pahaatu.m.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo ariyaana.m adassanakamyata.m pahaatu.m ariyadhammassa asotukamyata.m pahaatu.m upaarambhacittata.m pahaatu.m. katame tayo? uddhacca.m appahaaya, asa.mvara.m appahaaya, dussiilya.m appahaaya ^a^M3.0372^ea^ -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaaya abhabbo ariyaana.m adassanakamyata.m pahaatu.m ariyadhammassa asotukamyata.m pahaatu.m upaarambhacittata.m pahaatu.m.

[03] ``tayome ^a^P5.0146^ea^, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo uddhacca.m pahaatu.m asa.mvara.m pahaatu.m dussiilya.m pahaatu.m. katame tayo ^a^T5.0156^ea^? assaddhiya.m appahaaya, avada~n~nuta.m appahaaya, kosajja.m appahaaya -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaaya abhabbo uddhacca.m pahaatu.m asa.mvara.m pahaatu.m dussiilya.m pahaatu.m.

[03] ``tayome ^a^V3.0121^ea^, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo assaddhiya.m pahaatu.m avada~n~nuta.m pahaatu.m kosajja.m pahaatu.m. katame tayo? anaadariya.m appahaaya, dovacassata.m appahaaya, paapamittata.m appahaaya -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaaya abhabbo assaddhiya.m pahaatu.m avada~n~nuta.m pahaatu.m kosajja.m pahaatu.m.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaaya abhabbo anaadariya.m pahaatu.m dovacassata.m pahaatu.m paapamittata.m pahaatu.m. katame tayo? ahirika.m appahaaya, anottappa.m appahaaya, pamaada.m appahaaya -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaaya abhabbo anaadariya.m pahaatu.m dovacassata.m pahaatu.m paapamittata.m pahaatu.m.

[03] ``ahirikoya.m, bhikkhave, anottaapii pamatto hoti. so pamatto samaano abhabbo anaadariya.m pahaatu.m dovacassata.m pahaatu.m paapamittata.m pahaatu.m. so paapamitto samaano abhabbo assaddhiya.m pahaatu.m avada~n~nuta.m pahaatu.m kosajja.m pahaatu.m. so kusiito samaano abhabbo uddhacca.m pahaatu.m asa.mvara.m pahaatu.m dussiilya.m pahaatu.m. so dussiilo samaano abhabbo ariyaana.m adassanakamyata.m pahaatu.m ariyadhammassa asotukamyata.m pahaatu.m upaarambhacittata.m pahaatu.m. so upaarambhacitto samaano abhabbo mu.t.thasacca.m pahaatu.m asampaja~n~na.m pahaatu.m cetaso vikkhepa.m pahaatu.m. so vikkhittacitto ^a^P5.0147^ea^ samaano abhabbo ayonisomanasikaara.m pahaatu.m kummaggasevana.m pahaatu.m cetaso liinatta.m pahaatu.m. so liinacitto samaano ^a^T5.0157^ea^ abhabbo sakkaayadi.t.thi.m pahaatu.m vicikiccha.m pahaatu.m siilabbataparaamaasa.m pahaatu.m. so vicikiccho samaano abhabbo raaga.m pahaatu.m dosa.m ^a^M3.0373^ea^ pahaatu.m moha.m pahaatu.m. so raaga.m appahaaya dosa.m appahaaya moha.m appahaaya abhabbo jaati.m pahaatu.m jara.m pahaatu.m mara.na.m pahaatu.m.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaaya bhabbo jaati.m pahaatu.m jara.m pahaatu.m mara.na.m pahaatu.m. katame tayo? raaga.m pahaaya, dosa.m pahaaya, moha.m pahaaya -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme pahaaya bhabbo jaati.m pahaatu.m jara.m pahaatu.m mara.na.m pahaatu.m.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 9.29} ``dasayimaani, bhikkhave, aaghaatavatthuuni. katamaani dasa? `anattha.m me acarii'ti aaghaata.m bandhati; `anattha.m me caratii'ti aaghaata.m bandhati; `anattha.m me carissatii'ti aaghaata.m bandhati; `piyassa me manaapassa anattha.m acarii'ti...pe0... `anattha.m caratii'ti...pe0... `anattha.m carissatii'ti aaghaata.m bandhati, `appiyassa me amanaapassa attha.m acarii'ti...pe0... `attha.m caratii'ti...pe0... `attha.m carissatii'ti ^a^M3.0376^ea^ aaghaata.m bandhati; a.t.thaane ca kuppati -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, dasa aaghaatavatthuunii''ti. navama.m.

[03] ``saddho ca, pu.n.niya, bhikkhu hoti, no ca upasa"nkamitaa; neva taava tathaagata.m dhammadesanaa pa.tibhaati. yato ca kho, pu.n.niya, bhikkhu saddho ca hoti upasa"nkamitaa ca, eva.m tathaagata.m ^a^T5.0165^ea^ dhammadesanaa pa.tibhaati.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano etadavoca --

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0137^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa mahaakassapo raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tatra kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo ^a^P5.0162^ea^ bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaakassapassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa mahaakassapo etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu a~n~na.m ^a^T5.0173^ea^ byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaamii'ti. tamena.m tathaagato vaa tathaagatasaavako vaa jhaayii samaapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyaayakusalo samanuyu~njati samanuggaahati samanubhaasati. so tathaagatena vaa tathaagatasaavakena vaa jhaayinaa samaapattikusalena paracittakusalena paracittapariyaayakusalena samanuyu~njiyamaano samanuggaahiyamaano samanubhaasiyamaano irii.na.m aapajjati vicina.m aapajjati anaya.m aapajjati byasana.m aapajjati anayabyasana.m aapajjati.

[03] ``tamena.m tathaagato vaa tathaagatasaavako vaa jhaayii samaapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyaayakusalo eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca manasi karoti -- `ki.m nu kho ayamaayasmaa a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaamii'ti.
[03] ``tamena.m ^a^M3.0387^ea^ tathaagato vaa tathaagatasaavako vaa jhaayii samaapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyaayakusalo eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati --

[03] `adhimaaniko kho ayamaayasmaa adhimaanasacco, appatte pattasa~n~nii, akate katasa~n~nii, anadhigate adhigatasa~n~nii. adhimaanena a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaamii'ti.

[03] ``tamena.m tathaagato vaa tathaagatasaavako vaa jhaayii samaapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyaayakusalo ^a^V3.0138^ea^ eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca manasi karoti -- `ki.m nu kho ayamaayasmaa nissaaya adhimaaniko adhimaanasacco, appatte pattasa~n~nii, akate katasa~n~nii, anadhigate adhigatasa~n~nii. adhimaanena ^a^T5.0174^ea^ a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- khii.naa jaati ^a^P5.0163^ea^, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaamii'ti.
[03] ``tamena.m tathaagato vaa tathaagatasaavako vaa jhaayii samaapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyaayakusalo eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati --

[03] `bahussuto kho pana ayamaayasmaa sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa. tasmaa ayamaayasmaa adhimaaniko adhimaanasacco, appatte pattasa~n~nii, akate katasa~n~nii, anadhigate adhigatasa~n~nii. adhimaanena a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaamii'ti.
[03] ``tamena.m tathaagato vaa tathaagatasaavako vaa jhaayii samaapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyaayakusalo eva.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati --
[03] `abhijjhaalu kho pana ayamaayasmaa; abhijjhaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa bahula.m viharati. abhijjhaapariyu.t.thaana.m kho pana tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihaanameta.m.
[03] `byaapanno ^a^M3.0388^ea^ kho pana ayamaayasmaa; byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa bahula.m viharati. byaapaadapariyu.t.thaana.m kho pana tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihaanameta.m.
[03] `thinamiddho kho pana ayamaayasmaa; thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa bahula.m viharati. thinamiddhapariyu.t.thaana.m kho pana tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihaanameta.m.

[03] `uddhato ^a^V3.0139^ea^ kho pana ayamaayasmaa; uddhaccapariyu.t.thitena ^a^T5.0175^ea^ cetasaa bahula.m viharati. uddhaccapariyu.t.thaana.m kho pana tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihaanameta.m.
[03] `vicikiccho kho pana ayamaayasmaa; vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa bahula.m viharati. vicikicchaapariyu.t.thaana.m kho pana tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihaanameta.m.
[03] `kammaaraamo kho pana ayamaayasmaa kammarato kammaaraamata.m anuyutto. kammaaraamataa ^a^P5.0164^ea^ kho pana tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihaanameta.m.
[03] `bhassaaraamo kho pana ayamaayasmaa bhassarato bhassaaraamata.m anuyutto. bhassaaraamataa kho pana tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihaanameta.m.
[03] `niddaaraamo kho pana ayamaayasmaa niddaarato niddaaraamata.m anuyutto. niddaaraamataa kho pana tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihaanameta.m.
[03] `sa"nga.nikaaraamo kho pana ayamaayasmaa sa"nga.nikarato sa"nga.nikaaraamata.m anuyutto. sa"nga.nikaaraamataa kho pana tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihaanameta.m.
[03] `sati kho pana ayamaayasmaa uttari kara.niiye oramattakena visesaadhigamena antaraa vosaana.m aapanno. antaraa vosaanagamana.m kho pana tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihaanameta.m'.

[03] ``so vataavuso, bhikkhu `ime dasa dhamme appahaaya imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissatii'ti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. so vataavuso, bhikkhu ^a^M3.0389^ea^ `ime dasa dhamme pahaaya imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ tatra ^a^T5.0176^ea^ ^a^V3.0140^ea^ kho bhagavaa kaala"nkata.m bhikkhu.m {kalandaka.m bhikkhu.m (sii0), kaa.lakabhikkhu.m (syaa0)} aarabbha bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhikara.niko hoti, adhikara.nasamathassa na va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhikara.niko hoti adhikara.nasamathassa na va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo na piyataaya na garutaaya na bhaavanaaya na saama~n~naaya na ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^P5.0165^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na sikkhaakaamo hoti, sikkhaasamaadaanassa {sikkhaakaamassa (ka0)} na va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na sikkhaakaamo hoti sikkhaasamaadaanassa na va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo na piyataaya na garutaaya na bhaavanaaya na saama~n~naaya na ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paapiccho hoti, icchaavinayassa na va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paapiccho hoti icchaavinayassa na va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo na piyataaya na garutaaya na bhaavanaaya na saama~n~naaya na ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kodhano hoti, kodhavinayassa na va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhavinayassa na va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo na piyataaya na garutaaya na bhaavanaaya na saama~n~naaya na ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu makkhii hoti, makkhavinayassa na va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu makkhii hoti makkhavinayassa na va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo na piyataaya na garutaaya na bhaavanaaya na saama~n~naaya na ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0390^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa.tho hoti ^a^T5.0177^ea^, saa.theyyavinayassa na va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0141^ea^, bhikkhu sa.tho hoti saa.theyyavinayassa na va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo na piyataaya na garutaaya na bhaavanaaya na saama~n~naaya na ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu maayaavii hoti, maayaavinayassa na va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu maayaavii hoti maayaavinayassa na va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo na piyataaya na garutaaya na bhaavanaaya na saama~n~naaya na ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^P5.0166^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaana.m na nisaamakajaatiko hoti, dhammanisantiyaa na va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaana.m na nisaamakajaatiko hoti dhammanisantiyaa na va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo na piyataaya na garutaaya na bhaavanaaya na saama~n~naaya na ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na pa.tisalliino hoti, pa.tisallaanassa na va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na pa.tisalliino hoti pa.tisallaanassa na va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo na piyataaya na garutaaya na bhaavanaaya na saama~n~naaya na ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m na pa.tisanthaarako {pa.tisandhaarako (ka0)} hoti, pa.tisanthaarakassa na va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m na pa.tisanthaarako hoti pa.tisanthaarakassa na va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo na piyataaya na garutaaya na bhaavanaaya na saama~n~naaya na ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``evaruupassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ki~ncaapi eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ^a^T5.0178^ea^ ma.m sabrahmacaarii sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m {garukareyyu.m (sii0 syaa0)} maaneyyu.m puujeyyu'nti, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii na ceva sakkaronti na garu.m karonti {garukaronti (sii0 syaa0)} na maanenti na puujenti. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaahissa, bhikkhave, vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii te paapake akusale dhamme appahiine samanupassanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, assakha.lu"nkassa ki~ncaapi eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ma.m ^a^V3.0142^ea^ manussaa aajaaniiya.t.thaane .thapeyyu.m, aajaaniiyabhojana~nca bhojeyyu.m, aajaaniiyaparimajjana~nca parimajjeyyu'nti, atha kho na.m manussaa na ^a^M3.0391^ea^ ceva aajaaniiya.t.thaane .thapenti na ca aajaaniiyabhojana.m bhojenti na ca aajaaniiyaparimajjana.m parimajjanti. ta.m ^a^P5.0167^ea^ kissa hetu? tathaahissa, bhikkhave, vi~n~nuu manussaa taani saa.theyyaani kuu.teyyaani jimheyyaani va"nkeyyaani appahiinaani samanupassanti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, evaruupassa bhikkhuno ki~ncaapi eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ma.m sabrahmacaarii sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu'nti, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii na ceva sakkaronti na garu.m karonti na maanenti na puujenti. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaahissa, bhikkhave, vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii te paapake akusale dhamme appahiine samanupassanti.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na adhikara.niko hoti, adhikara.nasamathassa va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na adhikara.niko hoti adhikara.nasamathassa va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo piyataaya garutaaya bhaavanaaya saama~n~naaya ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaakaamo hoti, sikkhaasamaadaanassa va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaakaamo hoti ^a^T5.0179^ea^ sikkhaasamaadaanassa va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo piyataaya garutaaya bhaavanaaya saama~n~naaya ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appiccho hoti, icchaavinayassa va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appiccho hoti icchaavinayassa va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo...pe0... ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkodhano hoti, kodhavinayassa va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkodhano hoti kodhavinayassa va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo...pe0... ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu amakkhii hoti, makkhavinayassa va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0143^ea^, bhikkhu amakkhii hoti makkhavinayassa va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo...pe0... ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^P5.0168^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asa.tho hoti, saa.theyyavinayassa va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asa.tho hoti saa.theyyavinayassa va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo...pe0... ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0392^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu amaayaavii hoti, maayaavinayassa va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu amaayaavii hoti maayaavinayassa va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo...pe0... ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaana.m nisaamakajaatiko hoti, dhammanisantiyaa va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaana.m nisaamakajaatiko hoti dhammanisantiyaa va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo...pe0... ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisalliino hoti, pa.tisallaanassa va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisalliino hoti pa.tisallaanassa va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo...pe0... ekiibhaavaaya ^a^T5.0180^ea^ sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m pa.tisanthaarako hoti, pa.tisanthaarakassa va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacaariina.m pa.tisanthaarako hoti pa.tisanthaarakassa va.n.navaadii, ayampi dhammo piyataaya garutaaya bhaavanaaya saama~n~naaya ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``evaruupassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ki~ncaapi na eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ma.m sabrahmacaarii sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu'nti, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaahissa, bhikkhave, vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii te paapake akusale dhamme pahiine samanupassanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V3.0144^ea^, bhikkhave, bhaddassa assaajaaniiyassa ki~ncaapi na eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ma.m manussaa aajaaniiya.t.thaane .thapeyyu.m, aajaaniiyabhojana~nca bhojeyyu.m, aajaaniiyaparimajjana~nca parimajjeyyu'nti, atha kho na.m manussaa aajaaniiya.t.thaane ca .thapenti aajaaniiyabhojana~nca bhojenti ^a^P5.0169^ea^ aajaaniiyaparimajjana~nca parimajjanti. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaahissa, bhikkhave, vi~n~nuu manussaa taani saa.theyyaani kuu.teyyaani jimheyyaani va"nkeyyaani pahiinaani samanupassanti.

[01] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, evaruupassa bhikkhuno ki~ncaapi na eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vata ma.m sabrahmacaarii sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu'nti, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaahissa, bhikkhave, vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii te paapake akusale dhamme pahiine samanupassantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ ``yo ^a^T5.0181^ea^ ^a^M3.0393^ea^ so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosakaparibhaasako ariyuupavaadii sabrahmacaariina.m .thaanameta.m avakaaso {a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ya.m so dasanna.m byasanaana.m a~n~natara.m byasana.m nigaccheyya {na nigaccheyya (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}. katamesa.m dasanna.m? anadhigata.m naadhigacchati, adhigataa parihaayati, saddhammassa na vodaayanti, saddhammesu vaa adhimaaniko hoti anabhirato vaa brahmacariya.m carati, a~n~natara.m vaa sa.mkili.t.tha.m aapatti.m aapajjati, gaa.lha.m vaa rogaata"nka.m phusati, ummaada.m vaa paapu.naati cittakkhepa.m, sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosakaparibhaasako ariyuupavaadii sabrahmacaariina.m, .thaanameta.m avakaaso ya.m so imesa.m dasanna.m byasanaana.m a~n~natara.m byasana.m nigaccheyyaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ {sa.m0 ni0 1.181; su0 ni0 kokaalikasutta} atha ^a^P5.0170^ea^ kho kokaaliko bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho kokaaliko bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``paapicchaa, bhante, saariputtamoggallaanaa, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gataa''ti. ``maa ^a^V3.0145^ea^ heva.m, kokaalika, maa heva.m, kokaalika! pasaadehi, kokaalika, saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m. pesalaa saariputtamoggallaanaa''ti.

[03] dutiyampi kho kokaaliko bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki~ncaapi me, bhante, bhagavaa saddhaayiko paccayiko, atha kho paapicchaava saariputtamoggallaanaa, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gataa''ti. ``maa heva.m, kokaalika, maa heva.m, kokaalika! pasaadehi, kokaalika, saariputtamoggallaanesu ^a^T5.0182^ea^ citta.m. pesalaa saariputtamoggallaanaa''ti.

[03] tatiyampi kho kokaaliko bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki~ncaapi me, bhante, bhagavaa saddhaayiko paccayiko, atha kho paapicchaava saariputtamoggallaanaa, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gataa''ti. ``maa heva.m, kokaalika, maa heva.m, kokaalika! pasaadehi, kokaalika ^a^M3.0394^ea^, saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m. pesalaa saariputtamoggallaanaa''ti.

[03] atha kho kokaaliko bhikkhu u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. acirapakkantassa ca kokaalikassa bhikkhuno saasapamattiihi pii.lakaahi sabbo kaayo phu.to ahosi. saasapamattiyo hutvaa muggamattiyo ahesu.m, muggamattiyo hutvaa kalaayamattiyo ahesu.m, kalaayamattiyo hutvaa kola.t.thimattiyo ahesu.m, kola.t.thimattiyo hutvaa kolamattiyo ahesu.m, kolamattiyo hutvaa aamalakamattiyo ahesu.m, aamalakamattiyo hutvaa (ti.n.dukamattiyo ahesu.m, ti.n.dukamattiyo hutvaa,) {sa.m0 ni0 1.181; su0 ni0 kokaalikasutta natthi} be.luvasalaa.tukamattiyo ahesu.m, be.luvasalaa.tukamattiyo hutvaa billamattiyo ahesu.m, billamattiyo hutvaa pabhijji.msu, pubba~nca ^a^P5.0171^ea^ lohita~nca pagghari.msu. so suda.m kadalipattesu seti macchova visagilito.

[03] atha kho turuu paccekabrahmaa {tuduppaccekabrahmaa (sii0 pii0), tudi paccekabrahmaa (syaa0), turi paccekabrahmaa (ka0) sa.m0 ni0 1.180} yena kokaaliko bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa vehaase .thatvaa kokaalika.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``pasaadehi, kokaalika, saariputtamoggallaanesu citta.m. pesalaa saariputtamoggallaanaa''ti. ``kosi tva.m, aavuso''ti? ``aha.m turuu paccekabrahmaa''ti. ``nanu tva.m, aavuso, bhagavataa anaagaamii byaakato, atha ki~ncarahi idhaagato? passa yaava~nca te ida.m aparaddha''nti.
[03] atha ^a^V3.0146^ea^ kho turuu ^a^T5.0183^ea^ paccekabrahmaa kokaalika.m bhikkhu.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
