[03] ``tatra, gahapati, yvaaya.m kaamabhogii dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasena, dhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa asaahasena attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karoti, te ca bhoge agathito amucchito anajjhosanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati, aya.m, gahapati, kaamabhogii catuuhi .thaanehi paasa.mso. `dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasenaa'ti, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena paasa.mso. `attaana.m sukheti pii.netii'ti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena paasa.mso. `sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karotii'ti, iminaa tatiyena .thaanena paasa.mso. `te ca bhoge agathito amucchito anajjhosanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njatii'ti, iminaa catutthena .thaanena paasa.mso. aya.m, gahapati, kaamabhogii imehi catuuhi .thaanehi paasa.mso.

[03] ``ime kho, gahapati, dasa kaamabhogii santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. imesa.m kho, gahapati, dasanna.m kaamabhogiina.m yvaaya.m kaamabhogii dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasena, dhammena ^a^P5.0182^ea^ bhoge pariyesitvaa asaahasena attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karoti, te ca bhoge ^a^V3.0155^ea^ agathito amucchito anajjhosanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati, aya.m imesa.m dasanna.m kaamabhogiina.m aggo ca se.t.tho ca paamokkho {mokkho (ka0 sii0) a0 ni0 4.95; 5.181; sa.m0 ni0 3.662} ca uttamo ca pavaro ca. seyyathaapi, gahapati, gavaa khiira.m, khiiramhaa dadhi, dadhimhaa navaniita.m, navaniitamhaa sappi, sappimhaa sappima.n.do. sappima.n.do tattha aggamakkhaayati.

[03] evameva.m kho ^a^T5.0195^ea^, gahapati, imesa.m dasanna.m kaamabhogiina.m yvaaya.m kaamabhogii dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasena, dhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa asaahasena attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sa.mvibhajati ^a^M3.0404^ea^ pu~n~naani karoti, te ca bhoge agathito amucchito anajjhosanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati, aya.m imesa.m dasanna.m kaamabhogiina.m aggo ca se.t.tho ca paamokkho {mokkho (ka0 sii0) a0 ni0 5.181} ca uttamo ca pavaro caa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 9.27; sa.m0 ni0 5.1024} atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``yato, kho, gahapati, ariyasaavakassa pa~nca bhayaani veraani vuupasantaani honti, catuuhi ca sotaapattiya"ngehi samannaagato hoti, ariyo cassa ~naayo pa~n~naaya sudi.t.tho hoti suppa.tividdho, so aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya -- `khii.nanirayomhi khii.natiracchaanayoni khii.napettivisayo khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato. sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'ti.

[03] ``katamaani pa~nca bhayaani veraani vuupasantaani honti? ya.m ^a^P5.0183^ea^, gahapati, paa.naatipaatii paa.naatipaatapaccayaa di.t.thadhammikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati samparaayikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati cetasikampi dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato neva di.t.thadhammikampi {neva di.t.thadhammika.m} bhaya.m vera.m pasavati na samparaayikampi {na samparaayika.m} bhaya.m vera.m pasavati na cetasikampi {na cetasika.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. paa.naatipaataa pa.tiviratassa eva.m ta.m bhaya.m vera.m vuupasanta.m hoti ^a^T5.0196^ea^.

[03] ``ya.m ^a^V3.0156^ea^, gahapati, adinnaadaayii...pe0... kaamesumicchaacaarii... musaavaadii... suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaayii suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanapaccayaa di.t.thadhammikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati samparaayikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati cetasikampi dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato neva di.t.thadhammikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati na samparaayikampi bhaya.m vera.m pasavati na cetasikampi dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tiviratassa eva.m ^a^M3.0405^ea^ ta.m bhaya.m vera.m vuupasanta.m hoti. imaani pa~nca bhayaani veraani vuupasantaani honti.

[03] ``katamehi catuuhi sotaapattiya"ngehi samannaagato hoti? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... buddho bhagavaa'ti; dhamme aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti; sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ujuppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ~naayappa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, saamiicippa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, yadida.m cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa, esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'ti; ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti ^a^P5.0184^ea^ `akha.n.dehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammaasehi bhujissehi vi~n~nuppasatthehi aparaama.t.thehi ^a^T5.0197^ea^ samaadhisa.mvattanikehi'. imehi catuuhi sotaapattiya"ngehi samannaagato hoti.

[03] ``katamo cassa ariyo ~naayo pa~n~naaya sudi.t.tho hoti suppa.tividdho? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `iti imasmi.m sati ida.m hoti; imassuppaadaa ida.m uppajjati; imasmi.m asati ida.m na hoti; imassa nirodhaa ida.m nirujjhati, yadida.m -- avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti; avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho...pe0... evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa ^a^V3.0157^ea^ nirodho hotii'ti. aya~ncassa ariyo ~naayo pa~n~naaya sudi.t.tho hoti suppa.tividdho.

[03] ``yato kho, gahapati, ariyasaavakassa imaani pa~nca bhayaani veraani vuupasantaani honti, imehi ca catuuhi sotaapattiya"ngehi samannaagato hoti, aya~ncassa ariyo ~naayo ^a^T5.0198^ea^ pa~n~naaya sudi.t.tho hoti suppa.tividdho ^a^M3.0406^ea^, so aaka"nkhamaano attanaava attaana.m byaakareyya -- `khii.nanirayomhi khii.natiracchaanayoni khii.napettivisayo khii.naapaayaduggativinipaato; sotaapannohamasmi avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P5.0185^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati divaa divassa saavatthiyaa nikkhami bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. atha kho anaathapi.n.dikassa gahapatissa etadahosi -- ``akaalo kho taava bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. pa.tisalliino bhagavaa. manobhaavaniiyaanampi bhikkhuuna.m akaalo dassanaaya. pa.tisalliinaa manobhaavaniiyaa bhikkhuu. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyya''nti.

[03] atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa sa"ngamma samaagamma unnaadino uccaasaddamahaasaddaa anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m kathentaa nisinnaa honti. addasa.msu kho te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana a~n~nama~n~na.m sa.n.thaapesu.m -- ``appasaddaa bhonto hontu, maa bhonto saddamakattha. aya.m anaathapi.n.diko gahapati aaraama.m aagacchati sama.nassa gotamassa saavako. yaavataa kho pana sama.nassa gotamassa saavakaa gihii odaatavasanaa saavatthiya.m pa.tivasanti, aya.m tesa.m a~n~nataro anaathapi.n.diko gahapati. appasaddakaamaa ^a^T5.0199^ea^ kho pana te aayasmanto appasaddaviniitaa appasaddassa va.n.navaadino. appeva naama appasadda.m parisa.m viditvaa upasa"nkamitabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V3.0158^ea^ kho te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa tu.nhii ahesu.m. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m ^a^P5.0186^ea^ viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa ^a^M3.0407^ea^ etadavocu.m -- ``vadehi, gahapati, ki.mdi.t.thiko sama.no gotamo''ti? ``na kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavato sabba.m di.t.thi.m jaanaamii''ti.

[03] ``iti kira tva.m, gahapati, na sama.nassa gotamassa sabba.m di.t.thi.m jaanaasi; vadehi, gahapati, ki.mdi.t.thikaa bhikkhuu''ti? ``bhikkhuunampi kho aha.m, bhante, na sabba.m di.t.thi.m jaanaamii''ti.

[03] ``iti kira tva.m, gahapati, na sama.nassa gotamassa sabba.m di.t.thi.m jaanaasi napi bhikkhuuna.m sabba.m di.t.thi.m jaanaasi; vadehi, gahapati, ki.mdi.t.thikosi tuva''nti? ``eta.m kho, bhante, amhehi na dukkara.m byaakaatu.m ya.mdi.t.thikaa maya.m. i"ngha taava aayasmanto yathaasakaani di.t.thigataani byaakarontu, pacchaapeta.m amhehi na dukkara.m bhavissati byaakaatu.m ya.mdi.t.thikaa maya''nti.
[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro paribbaajako anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thiko aha.m, gahapatii''ti.
[03] a~n~nataropi kho ^a^T5.0200^ea^ paribbaajako anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thiko aha.m, gahapatii''ti.

[03] a~n~nataropi kho paribbaajako anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``antavaa loko...pe0... anantavaa loko... ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m... a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m... hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thiko aha.m, gahapatii''ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^V3.0159^ea^ vutte anaathapi.n.diko gahapati te paribbaajake etadavoca -- ``yvaaya.m, bhante, aayasmaa evamaaha -- `sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thiko aha.m, gahapatii'ti ^a^P5.0187^ea^, imassa ayamaayasmato di.t.thi attano vaa ayonisomanasikaarahetu uppannaa paratoghosapaccayaa vaa. saa kho panesaa di.t.thi bhuutaa sa"nkhataa cetayitaa pa.ticcasamuppannaa. ya.m kho pana ki~nci bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m cetayita.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m tadanicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m. ya.m dukkha.m tadeveso aayasmaa alliino, tadeveso aayasmaa ajjhupagato.

[03] ``yopaaya.m ^a^M3.0408^ea^, bhante, aayasmaa evamaaha -- `asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thiko aha.m, gahapatii'ti, imassaapi ayamaayasmato di.t.thi attano vaa ayonisomanasikaarahetu uppannaa paratoghosapaccayaa vaa. saa kho panesaa di.t.thi bhuutaa sa"nkhataa cetayitaa pa.ticcasamuppannaa. ya.m kho pana ki~nci bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m cetayita.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m tadanicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m. ya.m dukkha.m tadeveso aayasmaa alliino, tadeveso aayasmaa ajjhupagato.

[03] ``yopaaya.m, bhante, aayasmaa evamaaha -- `antavaa loko ^a^T5.0201^ea^ ...pe0... anantavaa loko... ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m... a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m... hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thiko aha.m, gahapatii'ti, imassaapi ayamaayasmato di.t.thi attano vaa ayonisomanasikaarahetu uppannaa paratoghosapaccayaa vaa. saa kho panesaa di.t.thi bhuutaa sa"nkhataa cetayitaa pa.ticcasamuppannaa. ya.m kho pana ki~nci bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m cetayita.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m tadanicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m. ya.m dukkha.m tadeveso aayasmaa alliino, tadeveso aayasmaa ajjhupagato''ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^P5.0188^ea^ vutte te paribbaajakaa anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m etadavocu.m -- ``byaakataani kho, gahapati, amhehi sabbeheva yathaasakaani di.t.thigataani. vadehi, gahapati, ki.mdi.t.thikosi tuva''nti? ``ya.m kho, bhante, ki~nci bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m cetayita.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m tadanicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m. `ya.m dukkha.m ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- eva.mdi.t.thiko aha.m, bhante''ti.

[03] ``ya.m ^a^V3.0160^ea^ kho, gahapati, ki~nci bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m cetayita.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m tadanicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m. ya.m dukkha.m tadeva tva.m, gahapati, alliino, tadeva tva.m, gahapati, ajjhupagato''ti.

[03] ``ya.m kho, bhante, ki~nci bhuuta.m sa"nkhata.m cetayita.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m tadanicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m. `ya.m dukkha.m ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, nameso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m ^a^T5.0202^ea^. tassa ca uttari nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaamii''ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^M3.0409^ea^ vutte te paribbaajakaa tu.nhiibhuutaa ma"nkubhuutaa pattakkhandhaa adhomukhaa pajjhaayantaa appa.tibhaanaa nisiidi.msu. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati te paribbaajake tu.nhiibhuute ma"nkubhuute pattakkhandhe adhomukhe pajjhaayante appa.tibhaane viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yaavatako ahosi tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi. ``saadhu saadhu, gahapati! eva.m kho te, gahapati, moghapurisaa kaalena kaala.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetabbaa''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa ^a^P5.0189^ea^ bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkante anaathapi.n.dike gahapatimhi bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vassasatupasampanno {bhikkhu diigharatta.m avedhi dhammo (syaa0)} imasmi.m dhammavinaye, sopi evameva.m a~n~natitthiye paribbaajake sahadhammena suniggahita.m nigga.nheyya yathaa ta.m anaathapi.n.dikena gahapatinaa niggahitaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V3.0161^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa campaaya.m viharati gaggaraaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire. atha kho vajjiyamaahito gahapati divaa divassa campaaya nikkhami bhagavanta.m ^a^T5.0203^ea^ dassanaaya. atha kho vajjiyamaahitassa gahapatissa etadahosi -- ``akaalo kho taava bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. pa.tisalliino bhagavaa. manobhaavaniiyaanampi bhikkhuuna.m akaalo dassanaaya. pa.tisalliinaa manobhaavaniiyaapi bhikkhuu. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyya''nti.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0410^ea^ kho vajjiyamaahito gahapati yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa sa"ngamma samaagamma unnaadino uccaasaddamahaasaddaa anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m kathentaa nisinnaa honti.

[03] addasa.msu kho te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa vajjiyamaahita.m gahapati.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana a~n~nama~n~na.m sa.n.thaapesu.m -- ``appasaddaa bhonto hontu. maa bhonto saddamakattha. aya.m vajjiyamaahito gahapati aagacchati sama.nassa gotamassa saavako. yaavataa kho pana ^a^P5.0190^ea^ sama.nassa gotamassa saavakaa gihii odaatavasanaa campaaya.m pa.tivasanti, aya.m tesa.m a~n~nataro vajjiyamaahito gahapati. appasaddakaamaa kho pana te aayasmanto appasaddaviniitaa appasaddassa va.n.navaadino. appeva naama appasadda.m parisa.m viditvaa upasa"nkamitabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti.

[03] atha kho te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa tu.nhii ahesu.m. atha kho vajjiyamaahito gahapati yena te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho vajjiyamaahita.m gahapati.m te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa etadavocu.m -- ``sacca.m ^a^T5.0204^ea^ kira, gahapati, sama.no gotamo sabba.m tapa.m garahati, sabba.m tapassi.m luukhaajiivi.m eka.msena upakkosati upavadatii''ti? ``na kho, bhante, bhagavaa sabba.m tapa.m garahati napi sabba.m tapassi.m luukhaajiivi.m eka.msena upakkosati upavadati. gaarayha.m kho, bhante, bhagavaa garahati ^a^V3.0162^ea^, pasa.msitabba.m pasa.msati. gaarayha.m kho pana, bhante, bhagavaa garahanto pasa.msitabba.m pasa.msanto vibhajjavaado bhagavaa. na so bhagavaa ettha eka.msavaado''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte a~n~nataro paribbaajako vajjiyamaahita.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``aagamehi tva.m, gahapati, yassa tva.m sama.nassa gotamassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, sama.no gotamo venayiko appa~n~nattiko''ti? ``etthapaaha.m, bhante, aayasmante vakkhaami sahadhammena -- `ida.m kusala'nti, bhante, bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m; `ida.m akusala'nti, bhante, bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m. iti kusalaakusala.m bhagavaa pa~n~naapayamaano sapa~n~nattiko bhagavaa; na so bhagavaa venayiko appa~n~nattiko''ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^M3.0411^ea^ vutte te paribbaajakaa tu.nhiibhuutaa ^a^P5.0191^ea^ ma"nkubhuutaa pattakkhandhaa adhomukhaa pajjhaayantaa appa.tibhaanaa nisiidi.msu. atha kho vajjiyamaahito gahapati te paribbaajake tu.nhiibhuute ma"nkubhuute pattakkhandhe adhomukhe pajjhaayante appa.tibhaane viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vajjiyamaahito gahapati yaavatako ahosi tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, gahapati! eva.m ^a^T5.0205^ea^ kho te, gahapati, moghapurisaa kaalena kaala.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetabbaa. naaha.m, gahapati, sabba.m tapa.m tapitabbanti vadaami; na ca panaaha.m, gahapati, sabba.m tapa.m na tapitabbanti vadaami; naaha.m, gahapati, sabba.m samaadaana.m samaaditabbanti vadaami; na panaaha.m, gahapati, sabba.m samaadaana.m na samaaditabbanti vadaami; naaha.m, gahapati, sabba.m padhaana.m padahitabbanti vadaami; na panaaha.m, gahapati, sabba.m padhaana.m na padahitabbanti vadaami; naaha.m, gahapati, sabbo pa.tinissaggo pa.tinissajjitabboti vadaami. na panaaha.m, gahapati, sabbo pa.tinissaggo na pa.tinissajjitabboti vadaami; naaha.m, gahapati, sabbaa vimutti vimuccitabbaati vadaami; na panaaha.m, gahapati, sabbaa vimutti na vimuccitabbaati vadaami.

[03] ``ya~nhi, gahapati, tapa.m tapato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, evaruupa.m tapa.m na tapitabbanti vadaami. ya~nca khvassa gahapati, tapa.m tapato akusalaa ^a^V3.0163^ea^ dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa ^a^P5.0192^ea^ abhiva.d.dhanti, evaruupa.m tapa.m tapitabbanti vadaami.

[03] ``ya~nhi, gahapati, samaadaana.m samaadiyato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, evaruupa.m samaadaana.m na samaaditabbanti vadaami. ya~nca khvassa, gahapati, samaadaana.m samaadiyato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, evaruupa.m samaadaana.m samaaditabbanti vadaami.

[03] ``ya~nhi, gahapati, padhaana.m padahato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, evaruupa.m padhaana.m na padahitabbanti vadaami. ya~nca khvassa, gahapati, padhaana.m padahato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti ^a^T5.0206^ea^, evaruupa.m padhaana.m padahitabbanti vadaami.

[03] ``ya~nhi ^a^M3.0412^ea^, gahapati, pa.tinissagga.m pa.tinissajjato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, evaruupo pa.tinissaggo na pa.tinissajjitabboti vadaami. ya~nca khvassa, gahapati, pa.tinissagga.m pa.tinissajjato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, evaruupo pa.tinissaggo pa.tinissajjitabboti vadaami.

[03] ``ya~nhi, gahapati, vimutti.m vimuccato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, evaruupaa vimutti na vimuccitabbaati vadaami. ya~nca khvassa, gahapati, vimutti.m vimuccato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, evaruupaa vimutti vimuccitabbaati vadaamii''ti.
[03] atha kho vajjiyamaahito gahapati bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkante vajjiyamaahite gahapatimhi bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu diigharatta.m apparajakkho imasmi.m dhammavinaye, sopi evameva.m a~n~natitthiye ^a^V3.0164^ea^ paribbaajake sahadhammena suniggahita.m nigga.nheyya yathaa ta.m vajjiyamaahitena gahapatinaa niggahitaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P5.0193^ea^ kho uttiyo paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho uttiyo paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, sassato loko, idameva ^a^T5.0207^ea^ sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, uttiya, mayaa -- `sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.
[03] ``ki.m pana, bho gotama, asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti? ``etampi kho, uttiya, abyaakata.m mayaa -- `asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, antavaa loko...pe0... anantavaa loko... ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m... a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m... hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa ^a^M3.0413^ea^... na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti? ``etampi kho, uttiya, abyaakata.m mayaa -- `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.
[03] ```ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti, iti pu.t.tho samaano `abyaakata.m kho eta.m, uttiya, mayaa -- sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi.
[03] ```ki.m pana, bho gotama, asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `etampi kho, uttiya, abyaakata.m mayaa asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi.

[03] ```ki.m ^a^V3.0165^ea^ nu kho, bho gotama, antavaa loko...pe0... anantavaa loko... ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m... a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m... hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva ^a^T5.0208^ea^ sacca.m moghama~n~nanti, iti pu.t.tho samaano ^a^P5.0194^ea^ -- `etampi kho, uttiya, abyaakata.m mayaa -- `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi. atha ki~ncarahi bhotaa gotamena byaakata''nti?

[03] ``abhi~n~naaya kho aha.m, uttiya, saavakaana.m dhamma.m desemi sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.

[03] ``ya.m paneta.m bhava.m gotamo abhi~n~naaya saavakaana.m dhamma.m desesi sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, sabbo vaa {sabbo ca (ka0)} tena loko niiyati {niiyissati (sii0), niyyaassati (syaa0), niyya.mssati (pii0)} upa.d.dho vaa tibhaago vaa''ti {tibhaago vaati padehi (ka0)}? eva.m vutte bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0414^ea^ kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``maa heva.m kho uttiyo paribbaajako paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m pa.tilabhi -- `sabbasaamukka.msika.m vata me sama.no gotamo pa~nha.m pu.t.tho sa.msaadeti, no vissajjeti, na nuuna visahatii'ti. tadassa uttiyassa paribbaajakassa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaa''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando uttiya.m paribbaajaka.m etadavoca -- ``tenahaavuso uttiya, upama.m te karissaami. upamaaya midhekacce vi~n~nuu purisaa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaananti. seyyathaapi, aavuso uttiya, ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m da.lhuddhaapa.m {da.lhuddaapa.m (sii0 pii0)} da.lhapaakaaratora.na.m ekadvaara.m. tatrassa dovaariko pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii a~n~naataana.m nivaaretaa ~naataana.m ^a^P5.0195^ea^ pavesetaa. so tassa nagarassa samantaa anupariyaayapatha.m anukkamati. anupariyaayapatha.m anukkamamaano na passeyya paakaarasandhi.m vaa paakaaravivara.m ^a^T5.0209^ea^ vaa, antamaso bi.laaranikkhamanamattampi. no ca khvassa eva.m ~naa.na.m hoti -- `ettakaa paa.naa ima.m nagara.m pavisanti vaa nikkhamanti vaa'ti. atha ^a^V3.0166^ea^ khvassa evamettha hoti -- `ye kho keci o.laarikaa paa.naa ima.m nagara.m pavisanti vaa nikkhamanti vaa, sabbe te iminaa dvaarena pavisanti vaa nikkhamanti vaa'ti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, aavuso uttiya, na tathaagatassa eva.m ussukka.m hoti -- `sabbo vaa tena loko niiyati, upa.d.dho vaa, tibhaago vaa'ti. atha kho evamettha tathaagatassa hoti -- `ye kho keci lokamhaa niiyi.msu vaa niiyanti vaa niiyissanti vaa, sabbe te pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne, catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittaa, satta bojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m bhaavetvaa. evamete {evametena (ka0)} lokamhaa niiyi.msu vaa niiyanti vaa niiyissanti vaa'ti. yadeva kho tva.m {yadeva khvettha (ka0)}, aavuso uttiya, bhagavanta.m pa~nha.m {ima.m pa~nha.m (syaa0 ka0)} apucchi tadeveta.m pa~nha.m bhagavanta.m a~n~nena pariyaayena apucchi. tasmaa te ta.m bhagavaa na byaakaasii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ ``eka.m ^a^M3.0415^ea^ ^a^P5.0196^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa aanando raajagahe viharati tapodaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa aanando rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya yena tapodaa tenupasa"nkami gattaani parisi~ncitu.m. tapodaaya {tapode (ka0)} gattaani parisi~ncitvaa paccuttaritvaa ekaciivaro a.t.thaasi gattaani pubbaapayamaano ^a^T5.0210^ea^. kokanudopi kho paribbaajako rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m paccu.t.thaaya yena tapodaa tenupasa"nkami gattaani parisi~ncitu.m.

[03] addasaa kho kokanudo paribbaajako aayasmanta.m aananda.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``kvettha {ko tettha (sii0), kvattha (pii0 ka0)}, aavuso''ti? ``ahamaavuso, bhikkhuu''ti.
[03] ``katamesa.m, aavuso, bhikkhuuna''nti? ``sama.naana.m, aavuso, sakyaputtiyaana''nti.
[03] ``puccheyyaama maya.m aayasmanta.m ki~ncideva desa.m, sace aayasmaa okaasa.m karoti pa~nhassa veyyaakara.naayaa''ti. ``pucchaavuso, sutvaa vedissaamaa''ti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, bho, `sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- eva.mdi.t.thi {eva.mdi.t.thiko (syaa0)} bhava''nti ^a^V3.0167^ea^? ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, eva.mdi.t.thi -- `sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.
[03] ``ki.m pana, bho, `asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava''nti? ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, eva.mdi.t.thi -- `asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, bho, antavaa loko...pe0... anantavaa loko... ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m... a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m... hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... hoti ca na ca hoti ^a^P5.0197^ea^ tathaagato para.m mara.naa... neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava''nti? ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, eva.mdi.t.thi -- `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.
[03] ``tena ^a^M3.0416^ea^ hi bhava.m na jaanaati, na passatii''ti? ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, na jaanaami na passaami. jaanaamaha.m, aavuso, passaamii''ti ^a^T5.0211^ea^.

[03] ```ki.m nu kho, bho, sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava'nti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `na kho aha.m, aavuso, eva.mdi.t.thi -- sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi.

[03] ```ki.m pana, bho, asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhava'nti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `na kho aha.m, aavuso, eva.mdi.t.thi -- asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, bho, antavaa loko...pe0... anantavaa loko... ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m... a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m... hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~nanti -- eva.mdi.t.thi bhavanti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `na kho aha.m, aavuso ^a^V3.0168^ea^, eva.mdi.t.thi -- neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti vadesi.

[03] ```tena hi bhava.m na jaanaati na passatii'ti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `na kho aha.m, aavuso, na jaanaami na passaami. jaanaamaha.m, aavuso, passaamii'ti vadesi. yathaa katha.m panaavuso, imassa bhaasitassa attho da.t.thabbo''ti?

[03] ```sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti kho, aavuso, di.t.thigatameta.m. `asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti kho, aavuso, di.t.thigatameta.m. antavaa loko...pe0... anantavaa loko... ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m... a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m... hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... na hoti ^a^T5.0212^ea^ tathaagato para.m mara.naa... hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti ^a^P5.0198^ea^ kho, aavuso, di.t.thigatameta.m.

[03] ``yaavataa ^a^M3.0417^ea^, aavuso, di.t.thi {di.t.thigataa (sabbattha)} yaavataa di.t.thi.t.thaana.m di.t.thiadhi.t.thaana.m di.t.thipariyu.t.thaana.m di.t.thisamu.t.thaana.m di.t.thisamugghaato {yaavataa di.t.thi.t.thaana adhi.t.thaana pariyu.t.thaana samu.t.thaana samugghaato (sii0 pii0)}, tamaha.m jaanaami tamaha.m passaami. tamaha.m jaananto tamaha.m passanto kyaaha.m vakkhaami -- `na jaanaami na passaamii'ti? jaanaamaha.m, aavuso, passaamii''ti.

[03] ``ko naamo aayasmaa, katha~nca panaayasmanta.m sabrahmacaarii jaanantii''ti? ```aanando'ti kho me, aavuso, naama.m. `aanando'ti ca pana ma.m sabrahmacaarii jaanantii''ti. ``mahaacariyena vata kira, bho, saddhi.m mantayamaanaa na jaanimha -- `aayasmaa aanando'ti. sace hi maya.m jaaneyyaama -- `aya.m aayasmaa aanando'ti, ettakampi no nappa.tibhaayeyya {nappa.tibhaaseyyaama (ka0) nappa.tibhaaseyya (bahuusu) ma0 ni0 3.216 passitabba.m}. khamatu ca me aayasmaa aanando''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
[03] 97^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa.

[01] ``katamehi ^a^V3.0169^ea^ dasahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu ^a^T5.0313^ea^.

[01] ``bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m ^a^P5.0199^ea^ kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa.
[03] ``kalyaa.namitto hoti kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko.
[03] ``sammaadi.t.thiko hoti sammaadassanena samannaagato.

[03] ``anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti; bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m ^a^M3.0418^ea^ tiropabbata.m asajjamaano gacchati, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karoti, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane gacchati, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kamati, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa paraamasati {parimasati (sii0)} parimajjati, yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti.
[03] ``dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.naati dibbe ca maanuse ca ye duure santike ca.

[03] ``parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati. saraaga.m vaa citta.m `saraaga.m citta'nti pajaanaati; viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m `viitaraaga.m citta'nti pajaanaati; sadosa.m vaa citta.m... viitadosa.m vaa citta.m... samoha.m vaa citta.m... viitamoha.m vaa citta.m... sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m... vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m... mahaggata.m vaa citta.m... amahaggata.m vaa citta.m... sauttara.m vaa citta.m... anuttara.m vaa citta.m... samaahita.m vaa citta.m... asamaahita.m vaa citta.m... vimutta.m vaa citta.m... avimutta.m vaa citta.m `avimutta.m citta'nti pajaanaati.

[03] ``anekavihita.m ^a^V3.0170^ea^ pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi ^a^P5.0200^ea^ jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi ^a^T5.0214^ea^ jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhapa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhapa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapannoti, iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.

[03] ``dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime vata kho bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena ^a^M3.0419^ea^ samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa; ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.

[01] ``aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^T5.0215^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi ^a^P5.0201^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato thero bhikkhu yassa.m yassa.m disaaya.m viharati, phaasuyeva viharati. katamehi dasahi? thero hoti ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito, siilavaa hoti ^a^V3.0171^ea^...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu, bahussuto hoti...pe0... di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdho, ubhayaani kho panassa paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso, adhikara.nasamuppaadavuupasamakusalo hoti, dhammakaamo hoti piyasamudaahaaro abhidhamme abhivinaye u.laarapaamojjo, santu.t.tho hoti itariitaraciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena, paasaadiko hoti abhikkantapa.tikkante {abhikkantapa.tikkanto (ka0)} susa.mvuto antaraghare nisajjaaya, catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. imehi ^a^M3.0420^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato ^a^T5.0216^ea^ thero bhikkhu yassa.m yassa.m disaaya.m viharati, phaasuyeva viharatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa upaali yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi ^a^P5.0202^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa upaali bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu''nti.

[03] ``durabhisambhavaani hi kho {durabhisambhavaani kho (sii0 pii0)}, upaali, ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani. dukkara.m paviveka.m durabhirama.m. ekatte haranti ma~n~ne mano vanaani samaadhi.m alabhamaanassa bhikkhuno. yo kho, upaali, eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m samaadhi.m alabhamaano ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevissaamii'ti, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `sa.msiidissati vaa uplavissati vaa'ti {uppilavissati vaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, upaali, mahaaudakarahado. atha aagaccheyya hatthinaago sattaratano vaa a.d.dha.t.tharatano {a.t.tharatano (sii0 pii0)} vaa. tassa evamassa -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m udakarahada.m ogaahetvaa ka.n.nasa.mdhovikampi khi.d.da.m kii.leyya.m pi.t.thisa.mdhovikampi khi.d.da.m kii.leyya.m. ka.n.nasa.mdhovikampi khi.d.da.m kii.litvaa pi.t.thisa.mdhovikampi khi.d.da.m kii.litvaa nhatvaa {nahaatvaa (sii0 pii0), nhaatvaa (syaa0)} ca pivitvaa ca paccuttaritvaa yena kaama.m pakkameyya'nti. so ta.m udakarahada.m ogaahetvaa ka.n.nasa.mdhovikampi khi.d.da.m kii.leyya pi.t.thisa.mdhovikampi khi.d.da.m kii.leyya; ka.n.nasa.mdhovikampi khi.d.da.m kii.litvaa pi.t.thisa.mdhovikampi khi.d.da.m kii.litvaa ^a^V3.0172^ea^ nhatvaa ca pivitvaa ca paccuttaritvaa yena kaama.m pakkameyya. ta.m kissa hetu? mahaa, upaali {mahaa hupaali (sii0 pii0)}, attabhaavo gambhiire gaadha.m vindati.

[03] ``atha aagaccheyya saso vaa bi.laaro vaa. tassa evamassa -- `ko ^a^T5.0217^ea^ caaha.m, ko ca hatthinaago! ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m udakarahada.m ogaahetvaa ka.n.nasa.mdhovikampi khi.d.da.m kii.leyya.m pi.t.thisa.mdhovikampi khi.d.da.m kii.leyya.m ^a^P5.0203^ea^; ka.n.nasa.mdhovikampi khi.d.da.m kii.litvaa pi.t.thisa.mdhovikampi khi.d.da.m kii.litvaa nhatvaa ca pivitvaa ca paccuttaritvaa yena kaama.m pakkameyya'nti. so ta.m udakarahada.m sahasaa appa.tisa"nkhaa pakkhandeyya. tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `sa.msiidissati vaa uplavissati vaa'ti ^a^M3.0421^ea^. ta.m kissa hetu? paritto, upaali, attabhaavo gambhiire gaadha.m na vindati. evameva.m kho, upaali, yo eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m samaadhi.m alabhamaano ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevissaamii'ti, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- `sa.msiidissati vaa uplavissati vaa'ti.
[03] ``seyyathaapi, upaali, daharo kumaaro mando uttaanaseyyako sakena muttakariisena kii.lati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, upaali, nanvaaya.m kevalaa paripuuraa baalakhi.d.daa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``sa kho so, upaali, kumaaro aparena samayena vuddhimanvaaya indriyaana.m paripaakamanvaaya yaani kaanici kumaarakaana.m kii.laapanakaani bhavanti, seyyathida.m -- va"nkaka.m {va"nka.m (sii0 pii0)} gha.tika.m mokkhacika.m ci"ngulaka.m {pi"ngulika.m (syaa0), ci"nkulaka.m (ka0)} pattaa.lhaka.m rathaka.m dhanuka.m, tehi kii.lati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, upaali, nanvaaya.m khi.d.daa purimaaya khi.d.daaya abhikkantataraa ca pa.niitataraa caa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``sa kho so, upaali, kumaaro aparena samayena vuddhimanvaaya indriyaana.m paripaakamanvaaya pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngibhuuto paricaareti cakkhuvi~n~neyyehi ruupehi i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi kaamuupasa.mhitehi ^a^T5.0218^ea^ rajaniiyehi, sotavi~n~neyyehi saddehi... ghaanavi~n~neyyehi gandhehi... jivhaavi~n~neyyehi rasehi... kaayavi~n~neyyehi pho.t.thabbehi ^a^P5.0204^ea^ i.t.thehi kantehi manaapehi piyaruupehi kaamuupasa.mhitehi rajaniiyehi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, upaali, nanvaaya.m khi.d.daa purimaahi khi.d.daahi abhikkantataraa ca pa.niitataraa caa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] {dii0 ni0 1.190; ma0 ni0 2.233} ``idha ^a^V3.0173^ea^ kho pana vo {voti nipaatamatta.m (a.t.tha0)}, upaali, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti.

[03] ``ta.m dhamma.m su.naati gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa kule paccaajaato. so ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa tathaagate saddha.m pa.tilabhati. so ^a^M3.0422^ea^ tena saddhaapa.tilaabhena samannaagato iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `sambaadho gharaavaaso rajaapatho, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti.

[03] ``so aparena samayena appa.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya appa.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani ^a^T5.0219^ea^ acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati.

[03] ``so eva.m pabbajito samaano bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati.
[03] ``adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii; athenena sucibhuutena attanaa viharati.
[03] ``abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarii hoti aaraacaarii ^a^P5.0205^ea^ virato methunaa gaamadhammaa.
[03] ``musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti saccavaadii saccasandho theto paccayiko avisa.mvaadako lokassa.

[03] ``pisu.na.m ^a^V3.0174^ea^ vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa na imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa sahitaana.m vaa anuppadaataa, samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii; samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] ``pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti. yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa, tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] ``samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii, nidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m.

[03] ``so ^a^M3.0423^ea^ biijagaamabhuutagaamasamaarambhaa pa.tivirato hoti. ekabhattiko hoti rattuuparato, virato vikaalabhojanaa. naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanaa pa.tivirato hoti, maalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, uccaasayanamahaasayanaa pa.tivirato hoti ^a^T5.0220^ea^, jaataruuparajatapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, aamakadha~n~napa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, aamakama.msapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, itthikumaarikapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, daasidaasapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, aje.lakapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, kukku.tasuukarapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, hatthigavassava.lavapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, khettavatthupa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, duuteyyapahi.nagamanaanuyogaa pa.tivirato hoti, kayavikkayaa pa.tivirato hoti, tulaakuu.taka.msakuu.tamaanakuu.taa pa.tivirato hoti ^a^P5.0206^ea^, ukko.tanava~ncananikatisaaciyogaa pa.tivirato hoti, chedanavadhabandhanaviparaamosaaalopasahasaakaaraa pa.tivirato hoti.

[03] ``so santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. yena yeneva pakkamati samaadaayeva pakkamati, seyyathaapi naama pakkhii saku.no yena yeneva .deti sapattabhaarova .deti. evameva.m bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena kucchiparihaarikena ^a^V3.0175^ea^ pi.n.dapaatena. yena yeneva pakkamati samaadaayeva pakkamati. so iminaa ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] ``so cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati; rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii ^a^T5.0221^ea^. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati; rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. so iminaa ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato ajjhatta.m abyaasekasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] ``so ^a^M3.0424^ea^ abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii hoti.

[03] ``so iminaa ca ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato, iminaa ca ariyena ^a^P5.0207^ea^ indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato, iminaa ca ariyena satisampaja~n~ne samannaagato vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. so ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa.

[03] ``so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti. byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii, byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodheti. thinamiddha.m pahaaya vigatathinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato ^a^V3.0176^ea^ sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti. uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto ^a^T5.0222^ea^, uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti. vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti.

[03] ``so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, upaali, `nanvaaya.m vihaaro purimehi vihaarehi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa'''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.
[03] ``imampi kho, upaali, mama saavakaa attani dhamma.m sampassamaanaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, no ca kho taava anuppattasadatthaa viharanti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0425^ea^ capara.m, upaali, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, upaali, `nanvaaya.m vihaaro purimehi vihaarehi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa'''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.
[03] ``imampi kho, upaali, mama saavakaa attani dhamma.m sampassamaanaa ara~n~navanapatthaani ^a^P5.0208^ea^ pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, no ca kho taava anuppattasadatthaa viharanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, upaali, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, upaali, `nanvaaya.m vihaaro purimehi vihaarehi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa'''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.
[03] ``imampi kho, upaali, mama saavakaa attani dhamma.m sampassamaanaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, no ca kho taava anuppattasadatthaa viharanti ^a^T5.0223^ea^.
[03] ``puna ^a^V3.0177^ea^ capara.m, upaali, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m...pe0....

[03] puna capara.m, upaali, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, upaali, `nanvaaya.m vihaaro purimehi vihaarehi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa'''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.
[03] ``imampi ^a^V3.0178^ea^ kho, upaali, mama saavakaa attani dhamma.m sampassamaanaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, no ca kho taava anuppattasadatthaa viharanti.
[03] ``puna capara.m, upaali, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0....

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ ``tisso ^a^T5.0225^ea^ ^a^V3.0179^ea^ ^a^M3.0427^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, sama.nasa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa satta dhamme paripuurenti. katamaa tisso? veva.n.niyamhi ajjhupagato, parapa.tibaddhaa me jiivikaa, a~n~no me aakappo kara.niiyoti -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso sama.nasa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa satta dhamme paripuurenti.

[03] ``katame satta? santatakaarii {satatakaarii (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} hoti santatavutti {satatavutti (syaa0 pii0)} siilesu, anabhijjhaalu hoti, abyaapajjo hoti, anatimaanii hoti, sikkhaakaamo hoti ^a^P5.0211^ea^, idamattha.mtissa hoti jiivitaparikkhaaresu, aaraddhaviiriyo ca {aaraddhaviriyo ca (sii0 pii0), aaraddhaviriyo (syaa0)} viharati. imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso sama.nasa~n~naa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ime satta dhamme paripuurentii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ ``sattime, bhikkhave, bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa tisso vijjaa paripuurenti. katame satta? satisambojjha"ngo, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo, viiriyasambojjha"ngo, piitisambojjha"ngo, passaddhisambojjha"ngo, samaadhisambojjha"ngo, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa tisso vijjaa paripuurenti. katamaa tisso? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi ^a^T5.0226^ea^ jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati ^a^V3.0180^ea^. aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjha"ngaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa imaa tisso vijjaa paripuurentii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ ``micchatta.m ^a^M3.0428^ea^, bhikkhave, aagamma viraadhanaa hoti, no aaraadhanaa. katha~nca, bhikkhave, micchatta.m aagamma viraadhanaa hoti, no aaraadhanaa? micchaadi.t.thikassa, bhikkhave, micchaasa"nkappo pahoti, micchaasa"nkappassa micchaavaacaa pahoti, micchaavaacassa micchaakammanto ^a^P5.0212^ea^ pahoti, micchaakammantassa micchaaaajiivo pahoti, micchaaaajiivassa micchaavaayaamo pahoti, micchaavaayaamassa micchaasati pahoti, micchaasatissa micchaasamaadhi pahoti, micchaasamaadhissa micchaa~naa.na.m pahoti, micchaa~naa.nissa {micchaa~naa.nassa (pii0 ka0)} micchaavimutti pahoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, micchatta.m aagamma viraadhanaa hoti, no aaraadhanaa.

[03] ``sammatta.m, bhikkhave, aagamma aaraadhanaa hoti, no viraadhanaa. katha~nca, bhikkhave, sammatta.m aagamma aaraadhanaa hoti, no viraadhanaa? sammaadi.t.thikassa, bhikkhave, sammaasa"nkappo pahoti, sammaasa"nkappassa sammaavaacaa pahoti, sammaavaacassa sammaakammanto pahoti, sammaakammantassa sammaaaajiivo pahoti, sammaaaajiivassa sammaavaayaamo pahoti, sammaavaayaamassa sammaasati pahoti, sammaasatissa sammaasamaadhi pahoti, sammaasamaadhissa ^a^T5.0227^ea^ sammaa~naa.na.m pahoti, sammaa~naa.nissa {sammaa~naa.nassa (pii0 ka0)} sammaavimutti pahoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sammatta.m aagamma aaraadhanaa hoti, no viraadhanaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 1.306; kathaa0 708} ``micchaadi.t.thikassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa micchaasa"nkappassa micchaavaacassa micchaakammantassa micchaaaajiivassa micchaavaayaamassa micchaasatissa micchaasamaadhissa micchaa~naa.nissa micchaavimuttissa ya~nca kaayakamma.m yathaadi.t.thi samatta.m samaadinna.m {samaadi.n.na.m (pii0 ka0)} ya~nca vaciikamma.m... ya~nca manokamma.m yathaadi.t.thi samatta.m samaadinna.m yaa ca cetanaa yaa ca patthanaa yo ca ^a^V3.0181^ea^ pa.nidhi ye ca sa"nkhaaraa, sabbe te dhammaa ani.t.thaaya akantaaya amanaapaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? di.t.thi hissa {di.t.thi hi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, bhikkhave, paapikaa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, nimbabiija.m vaa kosaatakibiija.m vaa tittakaalaabubiija.m vaa allaaya pathaviyaa nikkhitta.m ya~nceva ^a^P5.0213^ea^ pathavirasa.m upaadiyati ya~nca aaporasa.m upaadiyati ^a^M3.0429^ea^, sabba.m ta.m tittakattaaya ka.tukattaaya asaatattaaya sa.mvattati. ta.m kissa hetu? biija~nhi, bhikkhave, paapaka.m. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, micchaadi.t.thikassa purisapuggalassa micchaasa"nkappassa micchaavaacassa micchaakammantassa micchaaaajiivassa micchaavaayaamassa micchaasatissa micchaasamaadhissa micchaa~naa.nissa micchaavimuttissa ya~nceva kaayakamma.m yathaadi.t.thi samatta.m samaadinna.m ya~nca vaciikamma.m... ya~nca manokamma.m yathaadi.t.thi samatta.m samaadinna.m yaa ca cetanaa yaa ca patthanaa yo ca pa.nidhi ye ca sa"nkhaaraa, sabbe te dhammaa ani.t.thaaya akantaaya amanaapaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? di.t.thi hissa, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0228^ea^, paapikaa.

[03] ``sammaadi.t.thikassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa sammaasa"nkappassa sammaavaacassa sammaakammantassa sammaaaajiivassa sammaavaayaamassa sammaasatissa sammaasamaadhissa sammaa~naa.nissa sammaavimuttissa ya~nceva kaayakamma.m yathaadi.t.thi samatta.m samaadinna.m ya~nca vaciikamma.m yathaadi.t.thi samatta.m samaadinna.m ya~nca manokamma.m yathaadi.t.thi samatta.m samaadinna.m yaa ca cetanaa yaa ca patthanaa yo ca pa.nidhi ye ca sa"nkhaaraa, sabbe te dhammaa i.t.thaaya kantaaya manaapaaya hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? di.t.thi hissa, bhikkhave, bhaddikaa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ucchubiija.m vaa saalibiija.m vaa muddikaabiija.m vaa allaaya pathaviyaa nikkhitta.m ya~nca pathavirasa.m upaadiyati ya~nca aaporasa.m upaadiyati sabba.m ta.m saatattaaya madhurattaaya asecanakattaaya sa.mvattati. ta.m kissa hetu? biija~nhi bhikkhave, bhaddaka.m. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thikassa...pe0 ^a^P5.0214^ea^ ... sammaavimuttissa ya~nceva kaayakamma.m yathaadi.t.thi samatta.m samaadinna.m ya~nca vaciikamma.m... ya~nca manokamma.m yathaadi.t.thi samatta.m samaadinna.m yaa ca cetanaa yaa ca patthanaa yo ca pa.nidhi ye ca sa"nkhaaraa, sabbe te dhammaa i.t.thaaya kantaaya manaapaaya hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? di.t.thi hissa, bhikkhave, bhaddikaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ ``avijjaa ^a^V3.0182^ea^, bhikkhave, pubba"ngamaa akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa, anvadeva ^a^T5.0229^ea^ ahirika.m anottappa.m. avijjaagatassa, bhikkhave, aviddasuno micchaadi.t.thi pahoti, micchaadi.t.thikassa micchaasa"nkappo pahoti, micchaasa"nkappassa micchaavaacaa pahoti, micchaavaacassa micchaakammanto pahoti, micchaakammantassa ^a^M3.0430^ea^ micchaaaajiivo pahoti, micchaaaajiivassa micchaavaayaamo pahoti, micchaavaayaamassa micchaasati pahoti, micchaasatissa micchaasamaadhi pahoti, micchaasamaadhissa micchaa~naa.na.m pahoti, micchaa~naa.nissa micchaavimutti pahoti.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ ``atthi, bhikkhave, dakkhi.nesu janapadesu dhovana.m naama. tattha hoti annampi paanampi khajjampi bhojjampi leyyampi peyyampi naccampi giitampi vaaditampi. attheta.m, bhikkhave, dhovana.m; `neta.m natthii'ti vadaami. ta~nca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, dhovana.m hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya ^a^M3.0432^ea^ na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``aha~nca kho, bhikkhave, ariya.m dhovana.m desessaami, ya.m dhovana.m ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, ya.m dhovana.m aagamma jaatidhammaa sattaa jaatiyaa parimuccanti, jaraadhammaa sattaa jaraaya parimuccanti, mara.nadhammaa sattaa mara.nena parimuccanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaa ^a^T5.0232^ea^ sattaa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasehi parimuccanti. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ ``tikicchakaa ^a^P5.0218^ea^, bhikkhave, virecana.m denti pittasamu.t.thaanaanampi aabaadhaana.m pa.tighaataaya, semhasamu.t.thaanaanampi aabaadhaana.m pa.tighaataaya, vaatasamu.t.thaanaanampi aabaadhaana.m pa.tighaataaya. attheta.m, bhikkhave, virecana.m; `neta.m natthii'ti vadaami. ta~nca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, virecana.m sampajjatipi vipajjatipi.

[03] ``tesa.m ^a^V3.0196^ea^ no, bhante, amhaaka.m acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- `ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena ^a^P5.0229^ea^ attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo...pe0... ^a^T5.0246^ea^ tathaa pa.tipajjitabbanti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa'ti?

[03] ``tesa.m ^a^M3.0443^ea^ no, bhante, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa aanando satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa aanando imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaama. yathaa no aayasmaa aanando byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa'ti.

[03] ``atha kho maya.m, bhante, yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkamimhaa; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etamattha.m apucchimhaa. tesa.m no, bhante, aayasmataa aanandena imehi aakaarehi imehi padehi imehi bya~njanehi attho suvibhatto''ti {vibhattoti (?) evameva hi a~n~nesu iidisasuttesu dissati}.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhave! pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, aanando. mahaapa~n~no, bhikkhave, aanando. ma.m cepi tumhe, bhikkhave, upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha, ahampi ceta.m evameva.m {ahampi ta.m evameva.m (ma0 ni0 1.205)} byaakareyya.m yathaa ta.m aanandena byaakata.m. eso ceva tassa {eso cevetassa (ma0 ni0 1.205)} attho eva~nca na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ atha kho ajito paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ^a^T5.0347^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi ^a^P5.0230^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ajito paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[01] ``amhaaka.m ^a^V3.0197^ea^, bho gotama, pa.n.dito naama sabrahmacaarii. tena pa~ncamattaani citta.t.thaanasataani cintitaani, yehi a~n~natitthiyaa upaaraddhaava jaananti {upaaraddhaa pajaananti (sii0)} upaaraddhasmaa''ti {upaaraddhamhaati (sii0 pii0)}.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0444^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``dhaaretha no tumhe, bhikkhave, pa.n.ditavatthuunii''ti? ``etassa, bhagavaa, kaalo etassa, sugata, kaalo ya.m bhagavaa bhaaseyya, bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti.
[03] ``tena hi, bhikkhave, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``idha, bhikkhave, ekacco adhammikena vaadena adhammika.m vaada.m abhinigga.nhaati abhinippii.leti, tena ca adhammika.m parisa.m ra~njeti. tena saa adhammikaa parisaa uccaasaddamahaasaddaa hoti -- `pa.n.dito vata, bho, pa.n.dito vata, bho'ti.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco adhammikena vaadena dhammika.m vaada.m abhinigga.nhaati abhinippii.leti, tena ca adhammika.m parisa.m ra~njeti. tena saa adhammikaa parisaa uccaasaddamahaasaddaa hoti -- `pa.n.dito vata, bho, pa.n.dito vata, bho'ti.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco adhammikena vaadena dhammika~nca vaada.m adhammika~nca vaada.m abhinigga.nhaati abhinippii.leti, tena ca adhammika.m parisa.m ra~njeti. tena saa adhammikaa parisaa uccaasaddamahaasaddaa hoti -- `pa.n.dito vata, bho, pa.n.dito vata, bho'ti.

[03] ``adhammo ^a^T5.0248^ea^ ^a^P5.0231^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo dhammo ca; anattho ca veditabbo attho ca. adhamma~nca viditvaa dhamma~nca, anattha~nca viditvaa attha~nca yathaa dhammo yathaa attho tathaa pa.tipajjitabba.m.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, adhammo, katamo ca dhammo, katamo ca anattho, katamo ca attho? micchaadi.t.thi, bhikkhave, adhammo; sammaadi.t.thi dhammo; ye ca micchaadi.t.thipaccayaa aneke paapakaa ^a^V3.0198^ea^ akusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti, aya.m anattho; sammaadi.t.thipaccayaa ca aneke kusalaa dhammaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, aya.m attho.

[03] ``micchaasa"nkappo, bhikkhave, adhammo; sammaasa"nkappo dhammo... micchaavaacaa, bhikkhave, adhammo; sammaavaacaa dhammo... micchaakammanto, bhikkhave, adhammo; sammaakammanto dhammo... micchaaaajiivo, bhikkhave, adhammo; sammaaaajiivo dhammo ^a^M3.0445^ea^... micchaavaayaamo, bhikkhave, adhammo; sammaavaayaamo dhammo... micchaasati, bhikkhave, adhammo; sammaasati dhammo... micchaasamaadhi, bhikkhave adhammo; sammaasamaadhi dhammo... micchaa~naa.na.m, bhikkhave, adhammo; sammaa~naa.na.m dhammo ^a^T5.0249^ea^.

[03] ``micchaavimutti, bhikkhave, adhammo; sammaavimutti dhammo; ye ca micchaavimuttipaccayaa aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti, aya.m anattho; sammaavimuttipaccayaa ca aneke kusalaa dhammaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, aya.m attho.

[03] ```adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo dhammo ca; anattho ca veditabbo attho ca. adhamma~nca viditvaa dhamma~nca ^a^P5.0232^ea^, anattha~nca viditvaa attha~nca yathaa dhammo yathaa attho tathaa pa.tipajjitabba'nti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M3.0447^ea^ kho pana samayena jaa.nusso.ni {jaanussoni (ka0 sii0), jaanusso.ni (ka0 sii0), jaa.nuso.ni (ka0)} braahma.no tadahuposathe siisa.mnhaato {siisa.mnahaato (sii0 pii0), siisanhaato (syaa0)} nava.m khomayuga.m nivattho allakusamu.t.thi.m ^a^P5.0234^ea^ aadaaya bhagavato aviduure ekamanta.m .thito hoti.

[03] addasaa kho bhagavaa jaa.nusso.ni.m braahma.na.m tadahuposathe siisa.mnhaata.m nava.m khomayuga.m nivattha.m allakusamu.t.thi.m aadaaya ekamanta.m .thita.m. disvaana jaa.nusso.ni.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu tva.m, braahma.na, tadahuposathe siisa.mnhaato nava.m khomayuga.m nivattho allakusamu.t.thi.m aadaaya ekamanta.m .thito ^a^V3.0201^ea^? ki.m nvajja {ki.m nu ajja (syaa0), ki.m nu kho ajja (pii0), ki.m nu khvajja (ka0)} braahma.nakulassaa''ti {braahma.na brahmakusalassaati (ka0)}? ``paccoroha.nii, bho gotama, ajja braahma.nakulassaa''ti {brahmakusalassaati (ka0)}.

[03] ``yathaa katha.m pana, braahma.na, braahma.naana.m paccoroha.nii hotii''ti? ``idha, bho gotama, braahma.naa tadahuposathe siisa.mnhaataa nava.m khomayuga.m nivatthaa allena gomayena pathavi.m opu~njitvaa haritehi kusehi pattharitvaa {pavitthaaretvaa (ka0)} antaraa ca vela.m ^a^T5.0252^ea^ antaraa ca agyaagaara.m seyya.m kappenti. te ta.m ratti.m tikkhattu.m paccu.t.thaaya pa~njalikaa aggi.m namassanti -- `paccorohaama bhavanta.m, paccorohaama bhavanta'nti. bahukena ca sappitelanavaniitena aggi.m santappenti. tassaa ca rattiyaa accayena pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena braahma.ne santappenti. eva.m, bho gotama, braahma.naana.m paccoroha.nii hotii''ti.

[03] ``a~n~nathaa kho, braahma.na, braahma.naana.m paccoroha.nii hoti, a~n~nathaa ca pana ariyassa vinaye paccoroha.nii hotii''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye paccoroha.nii hoti? saadhu me bhava.m gotamo tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaa ariyassa vinaye paccoroha.nii hotii''ti.
[03] ``tena ^a^M3.0448^ea^ hi, braahma.na, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``idha ^a^P5.0235^ea^, braahma.na, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `micchaadi.t.thiyaa kho paapako vipaako di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaa' ti. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya micchaadi.t.thi.m pajahati; micchaadi.t.thiyaa paccorohati.
[03] ... micchaasa"nkappassa kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya micchaasa"nkappa.m pajahati; micchaasa"nkappaa paccorohati.
[03] ... micchaavaacaaya kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya micchaavaaca.m pajahati; micchaavaacaaya paccorohati.

[03] ...micchaakammantassa ^a^V3.0202^ea^ kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya micchaakammanta.m pajahati; micchaakammantaa ^a^T5.0253^ea^ paccorohati.
[03] ...micchaaaajiivassa kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya micchaaaajiiva.m pajahati; micchaaaajiivaa paccorohati.
[03] ...micchaavaayaamassa kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya micchaavaayaama.m pajahati; micchaavaayaamaa paccorohati.
[03] ...micchaasatiyaa kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya micchaasati.m pajahati; micchaasatiyaa paccorohati.
[03] ...micchaasamaadhissa kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya micchaasamaadhi.m pajahati; micchaasamaadhimhaa paccorohati.
[03] ...micchaa~naa.nassa ^a^M3.0449^ea^ kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya micchaa~naa.na.m pajahati; micchaa~naa.namhaa paccorohati.

[03] `micchaavimuttiyaa kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaa'ti. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya micchaavimutti.m pajahati; micchaavimuttiyaa paccorohati. eva.m kho, braahma.na, ariyassa vinaye paccoroha.nii hotii''ti.

[03] ``a~n~nathaa, bho gotama, braahma.naana.m paccoroha.nii, a~n~nathaa ca pana ariyassa vinaye paccoroha.nii hoti. imissaa ca, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye paccoroha.niyaa braahma.naana.m paccoroha.nii kala.m naagghati so.lasi.m. abhikkanta.m ^a^P5.0236^ea^, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ ``ariya.m ^a^V3.0203^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, paccoroha.ni.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha... katamaa ca, bhikkhave, ariyaa paccoroha.nii? idha, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti ^a^T5.0254^ea^ pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `micchaadi.t.thiyaa kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaa'ti. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya micchaadi.t.thi.m pajahati; micchaadi.t.thiyaa paccorohati. micchaasa"nkappassa kho paapako vipaako... micchaavaacaaya kho... micchaakammantassa kho... micchaaaajiivassa kho... micchaavaayaamassa kho... micchaasatiyaa kho... micchaasamaadhissa kho... micchaa~naa.nassa kho... micchaavimuttiyaa kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya micchaavimutti.m pajahati; micchaavimuttiyaa paccorohati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyaa paccoroha.nii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^V3.0217^ea^ kho pana samayena jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no tadahuposathe siisa.mnhaato nava.m khomayuga.m nivattho allakusamu.t.thi.m aadaaya bhagavato aviduure ekamanta.m .thito hoti.

[03] addasaa kho bhagavaa jaa.nusso.ni.m braahma.na.m tadahuposathe siisa.mnhaata.m nava.m khomayuga.m nivattha.m allakusamu.t.thi.m aadaaya ekamanta.m .thita.m. disvaana jaa.nusso.ni.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu tva.m, braahma.na, tadahuposathe siisa.mnhaato nava.m khomayuga.m nivattho allakusamu.t.thi.m aadaaya ekamanta.m .thito? ki.m nvajja braahma.nakulassaa''ti? ``paccoroha.nii, bho gotama, ajja braahma.nakulassaa''ti ^a^P5.0250^ea^.

[03] ``yathaa katha.m pana, braahma.na, braahma.naana.m paccoroha.nii hotii''ti? ``idha, bho gotama, braahma.naa tadahuposathe siisa.mnhaataa nava.m khomayuga.m nivatthaa allena gomayena pathavi.m opu~njitvaa haritehi kusehi pattharitvaa antaraa ca vela.m antaraa ca agyaagaara.m seyya.m kappenti. te ta.m ratti.m tikkhattu.m ^a^T5.0268^ea^ paccu.t.thaaya pa~njalikaa aggi.m namassanti -- `paccorohaama bhavanta.m, paccorohaama bhavanta'nti. bahukena ca sappitelanavaniitena aggi.m santappenti. tassaa ca rattiyaa accayena pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena braahma.ne santappenti. eva.m, bho gotama, braahma.naana.m paccoroha.nii hotii''ti.

[03] ``a~n~nathaa kho, braahma.na, braahma.naana.m paccoroha.nii hoti, a~n~nathaa ca pana ariyassa vinaye paccoroha.nii hotii''ti. ``yathaa katha.m ^a^M3.0460^ea^ pana, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye paccoroha.nii hoti? saadhu me bhava.m gotamo tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaa ariyassa vinaye paccoroha.nii hotii''ti.
[03] ``tena ^a^V3.0218^ea^ hi, braahma.na, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``idha, braahma.na, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `paa.naatipaatassa kho paapako vipaako di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaa' ti. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya paa.naatipaata.m pajahati; paa.naatipaataa paccorohati.
[03] ...adinnaadaanassa kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya adinnaadaana.m pajahati; adinnaadaanaa paccorohati.
[03] ...kaamesumicchaacaarassa kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya kaamesumicchaacaara.m pajahati; kaamesumicchaacaaraa paccorohati.
[03] ...musaavaadassa kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya ^a^P5.0251^ea^ musaavaada.m pajahati; musaavaadaa paccorohati.
[03] ...pisu.naaya vaacaaya kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme ^a^T5.0269^ea^ abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya pisu.na.m vaaca.m pajahati; pisu.naaya vaacaaya paccorohati.
[03] ...pharusaaya vaacaaya kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya pharusa.m vaaca.m pajahati; pharusaaya vaacaaya paccorohati.
[03] ...samphappalaapassa kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya samphappalaapa.m pajahati; samphappalaapaa paccorohati.
[03] ...abhijjhaaya ^a^M3.0461^ea^ kho paapako vipaako -- di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~ncaati. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya abhijjha.m pajahati; abhijjhaaya paccorohati.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 10.113} ``adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo anattho ca; dhammo ca veditabbo attho ca. adhamma~nca viditvaa anattha~nca, dhamma~nca viditvaa attha~nca yathaa dhammo yathaa attho tathaa pa.tipajjitabba.m.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, adhammo ca anattho ca? paa.naatipaato, adinnaadaana.m, kaamesumicchaacaaro, musaavaado, pisu.naa vaacaa, pharusaa vaacaa, samphappalaapo, abhijjhaa, byaapaado, micchaadi.t.thi -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, adhammo ^a^T5.0274^ea^ ca anattho ca.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, dhammo ca attho ca? paa.naatipaataa verama.nii, adinnaadaanaa verama.nii, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nii, musaavaadaa verama.nii, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.nii, samphappalaapaa verama.nii, anabhijjhaa, abyaapaado, sammaadi.t.thi -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammo ca attho ca.

[03] ```adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo anattho ca; dhammo ca veditabbo attho ca. adhamma~nca viditvaa anattha~nca, dhamma~nca viditvaa attha~nca yathaa dhammo yathaa attho tathaa pa.tipajjitabba'nti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ ``adhammo ^a^P5.0255^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo dhammo ca; anattho ca veditabbo attho ca. adhamma~nca viditvaa dhamma~nca, anattha~nca viditvaa attha~nca yathaa dhammo ^a^M3.0465^ea^ yathaa attho tathaa pa.tipajjitabba''nti. idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03] atha ^a^T5.0275^ea^ kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito, sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m puccheyyaama. yathaa no aayasmaa mahaakaccaano byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa''ti.

[03] ``tesa.m no, aavuso, amhaaka.m acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- `ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- adhammo ca, bhikkhave...pe0... tathaa ^a^T5.0276^ea^ pa.tipajjitabbanti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena ^a^M3.0466^ea^ uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa'ti?

[03] ``tesa.m ^a^V3.0225^ea^ no, aavuso, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito, sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaama. yathaa no aayasmaa mahaakaccaano byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa'ti. vibhajatu aayasmaa mahaakaccaano''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, puriso saaratthiko saara.m gavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva muula.m atikkamma khandha.m saakhaapalaase saara.m pariyesitabba.m ma~n~neyya. eva.msampadamida.m aayasmantaana.m satthari sammukhiibhuute ta.m bhagavanta.m atisitvaa amhe etamattha.m pa.tipucchitabba.m ma~n~natha {ma~n~netha (sii0), ma~n~neyyaatha (ka0)}. so haavuso, bhagavaa jaana.m jaanaati passa.m passati cakkhubhuuto ~naa.nabhuuto dhammabhuuto brahmabhuuto vattaa pavattaa atthassa ninnetaa amatassa daataa dhammassaamii tathaagato. so ceva panetassa kaalo ahosi ya.m tumhe bhagavanta.myeva ^a^P5.0257^ea^ upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha. yathaa vo bhagavaa byaakareyya tathaa na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti.

[03] ``addhaa, aavuso kaccaana, bhagavaa jaana.m jaanaati passa.m passati cakkhubhuuto ~naa.nabhuuto dhammabhuuto brahmabhuuto vattaa pavattaa atthassa ninnetaa amatassa ^a^T5.0277^ea^ daataa dhammassaamii tathaagato. so ceva panetassa kaalo ahosi ya.m maya.m bhagavanta.myeva upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaama. yathaa no bhagavaa byaakareyya tathaa na.m dhaareyyaama. api caayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito, sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. vibhajataayasmaa mahaakaccaano agaru.m karitvaa''ti.
