[03] ``ya.m kho no, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa ^a^V3.0228^ea^ vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo...pe0... tathaa pa.tipajjitabba'nti.

[03] ``tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- `ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo...pe0... tathaa pa.tipajjitabba'nti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa'ti?

[03] ``tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito, sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa ^a^P5.0260^ea^ vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaama. yathaa no aayasmaa mahaakaccaano byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa'ti.

[03] ``atha kho maya.m, bhante, yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano ^a^T5.0281^ea^ tenupasa"nkamimhaa; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m apucchimhaa. tesa.m no, bhante, aayasmataa mahaakaccaanena imehi akkharehi imehi padehi imehi bya~njanehi attho suvibhatto''ti.

[01] ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhave! pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, mahaakaccaano. mahaapa~n~no, bhikkhave, mahaakaccaano. ma.m cepi tumhe, bhikkhave, upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha, ahampi ceta.m evameva.m byaakareyya.m yathaa ta.m mahaakaccaanena byaakata.m. eso ceva tassa attho. eva~nca na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ ``adhammo ^a^M3.0470^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo dhammo ca; anattho ca veditabbo attho ca ^a^V3.0229^ea^. adhamma~nca viditvaa dhamma~nca, anattha~nca viditvaa attha~nca yathaa dhammo yathaa attho tathaa pa.tipajjitabba.m.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, adhammo, katamo ca dhammo; katamo ca anattho, katamo ca attho? paa.naatipaato, bhikkhave, adhammo; paa.naatipaataa verama.nii dhammo; ye ca paa.naatipaatapaccayaa aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti, aya.m anattho; paa.naatipaataa verama.nipaccayaa ca aneke kusalaa dhammaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, aya.m attho.

[03] ``adinnaadaana.m, bhikkhave, adhammo; adinnaadaanaa verama.nii dhammo... kaamesumicchaacaaro, bhikkhave ^a^P5.0261^ea^, adhammo; kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nii dhammo... musaavaado, bhikkhave, adhammo; musaavaadaa verama.nii dhammo... pisu.naa vaacaa, bhikkhave, adhammo; pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii dhammo... pharusaa vaacaa, bhikkhave, adhammo; pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.nii dhammo... samphappalaapo, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0282^ea^, adhammo; samphappalaapaa verama.nii dhammo... abhijjhaa, bhikkhave, adhammo; anabhijjhaa dhammo... byaapaado, bhikkhave, adhammo; abyaapaado dhammo....

[03] ``micchaadi.t.thi, bhikkhave, adhammo; sammaadi.t.thi dhammo; ye ca micchaadi.t.thipaccayaa aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti, aya.m anattho; sammaadi.t.thipaccayaa ca aneke kusalaa dhammaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, aya.m attho.

[03] ```adhammo ca, bhikkhave, veditabbo dhammo ca; anattho ca veditabbo attho ca. adhamma~nca viditvaa dhamma~nca, anattha~nca viditvaa attha~nca yathaa dhammo yathaa attho tathaa pa.tipajjitabba'nti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta''nti. sattama.m.
[03] 174^b^.^eb^ ``paa.naatipaatampaaha.m, bhikkhave, tividha.m vadaami -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``adinnaadaanampaaha.m ^a^M3.0471^ea^ ^a^V3.0230^ea^, bhikkhave, tividha.m vadaami -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``kaamesumicchaacaarampaaha.m, bhikkhave, tividha.m vadaami -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``musaavaadampaaha.m, bhikkhave, tividha.m vadaami -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``pisu.navaacampaaha.m, bhikkhave, tividha.m vadaami -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``pharusavaacampaaha.m, bhikkhave, tividha.m vadaami -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``samphappalaapampaaha.m, bhikkhave, tividha.m vadaami -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``abhijjhampaaha.m ^a^P5.0262^ea^, bhikkhave, tividha.m vadaami -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.
[03] ``byaapaadampaaha.m, bhikkhave, tividha.m vadaami -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi.

[03] ``micchaadi.t.thimpaaha.m, bhikkhave ^a^T5.0283^ea^, tividha.m vadaami -- lobhahetukampi, dosahetukampi, mohahetukampi. iti kho, bhikkhave, lobho kammanidaanasambhavo, doso kammanidaanasambhavo, moho kammanidaanasambhavo. lobhakkhayaa kammanidaanasa"nkhayo, dosakkhayaa kammanidaanasa"nkhayo, mohakkhayaa kammanidaanasa"nkhayo''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ ``saparikkamano ^a^V3.0231^ea^ aya.m, bhikkhave, dhammo, naaya.m dhammo aparikkamano. katha~nca, bhikkhave, saparikkamano aya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo aparikkamano? paa.naatipaatissa, bhikkhave, paa.naatipaataa verama.nii parikkamana.m hoti. adinnaadaayissa, bhikkhave, adinnaadaanaa verama.nii parikkamana.m hoti. kaamesumicchaacaarissa, bhikkhave, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nii parikkamana.m hoti. musaavaadissa, bhikkhave, musaavaadaa verama.nii parikkamana.m hoti. pisu.navaacassa ^a^M3.0472^ea^, bhikkhave, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii parikkamana.m hoti. pharusavaacassa, bhikkhave, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.nii parikkamana.m hoti. samphappalaapissa, bhikkhave, samphappalaapaa verama.nii parikkamana.m hoti. abhijjhaalussa, bhikkhave, anabhijjhaa parikkamana.m hoti. byaapannacittassa {byaapaadassa (sii0 pii0 ka0), byaapannassa (syaa0)}, bhikkhave, abyaapaado parikkamana.m hoti. micchaadi.t.thissa, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi parikkamana.m hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, saparikkamano aya.m dhammo, naaya.m dhammo aparikkamano''ti. navama.m.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m ^a^P5.0263^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa paavaaya.m {campaaya.m (ka0 sii0) dii0 ni0 2.189 passitabba.m} viharati cundassa kammaaraputtassa ambavane. atha kho cundo kammaaraputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^T5.0284^ea^ nisinna.m kho cunda.m kammaaraputta.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kassa no tva.m, cunda, soceyyaani rocesii''ti? ``braahma.naa, bhante, pacchaabhuumakaa kama.n.dalukaa sevaalamaalikaa {sevaalamaalakaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} aggiparicaarikaa udakorohakaa soceyyaani pa~n~napenti; tesaaha.m soceyyaani rocemii''ti.

[03] ``yathaa katha.m pana, cunda, braahma.naa pacchaabhuumakaa kama.n.dalukaa sevaalamaalikaa aggiparicaarikaa udakorohakaa soceyyaani pa~n~napentii''ti? ``idha, bhante, braahma.naa pacchaabhuumakaa kama.n.dalukaa sevaalamaalikaa aggiparicaarikaa udakorohakaa. te saavaka.m {saavake (syaa0 ka0)} eva.m samaadapenti -- `ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, kaalasseva {sakaalasseva (syaa0)} u.t.thahantova {u.t.thahanto (syaa0), vu.t.thahantova (pii0 ka0)} sayanamhaa pathavi.m aamaseyyaasi; no ce pathavi.m aamaseyyaasi, allaani gomayaani aamaseyyaasi; no ce allaani ^a^V3.0232^ea^ gomayaani aamaseyyaasi, haritaani ti.naani aamaseyyaasi; no ce haritaani ti.naani aamaseyyaasi, aggi.m paricareyyaasi; no ce aggi.m paricareyyaasi, pa~njaliko aadicca.m namasseyyaasi; no ce pa~njaliko aadicca.m namasseyyaasi, saayatatiyaka.m udaka.m oroheyyaasii'ti. eva.m kho, bhante, braahma.naa pacchaabhuumakaa ^a^M3.0473^ea^ kama.n.dalukaa sevaalamaalikaa aggiparicaarikaa udakorohakaa soceyyaani pa~n~napenti; tesaaha.m soceyyaani rocemii''ti.

[03] ``a~n~nathaa kho, cunda, braahma.naa pacchaabhuumakaa kama.n.dalukaa sevaalamaalikaa aggiparicaarikaa udakorohakaa soceyyaani pa~n~napenti, a~n~nathaa ca pana ^a^P5.0264^ea^ ariyassa vinaye soceyya.m hotii''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana, bhante, ariyassa vinaye soceyya.m hoti? saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaa ariyassa vinaye soceyya.m hotii''ti.
[03] ``tena hi, cunda, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi ^a^T5.0285^ea^ karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho cundo kammaaraputto bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --
[03] ``tividha.m kho, cunda, kaayena asoceyya.m hoti; catubbidha.m vaacaaya asoceyya.m hoti; tividha.m manasaa asoceyya.m hoti.
[03] ``katha~nca, cunda, tividha.m kaayena asoceyya.m hoti? ``idha, cunda, ekacco paa.naatipaatii hoti luddo lohitapaa.ni hatapahate nivi.t.tho adayaapanno sabbapaa.nabhuutesu {paa.nabhuutesu (ka0)}.
[03] ``adinnaadaayii hoti. ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m gaamagata.m vaa ara~n~nagata.m vaa ta.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadaataa hoti.

[03] ``kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti. yaa taa maaturakkhitaa piturakkhitaa maataapiturakkhitaa {natthi sii0 syaa0 pii0 potthakesu} bhaaturakkhitaa bhaginirakkhitaa ~naatirakkhitaa gottarakkhitaa {natthi sii0 syaa0 pii0 potthakesu} dhammarakkhitaa sasaamikaa saparida.n.daa antamaso maalaagu.laparikkhittaapi, tathaaruupaasu caaritta.m aapajjitaa hoti. eva.m kho, cunda, tividha.m kaayena asoceyya.m hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^V3.0233^ea^, cunda, catubbidha.m vaacaaya asoceyya.m hoti? idha, cunda, ekacco musaavaadii hoti. sabhaggato vaa parisaggato vaa ~naatimajjhagato vaa puugamajjhagato vaa raajakulamajjhagato vaa abhiniito sakkhipu.t.tho -- `ehambho ^a^M3.0474^ea^ purisa, ya.m jaanaasi ta.m vadehii'ti {so ajaana.m vaa aha.m jaanaamiiti, jaana.m vaa aha.m na jaanaamiiti, apassa.m vaa aha.m passaamiiti, passa.m vaa aha.m na passaamiiti (pii0 ka0) evamuparipi}, so ajaana.m vaa aaha `jaanaamii'ti, jaana.m vaa aaha `na jaanaamii'ti; apassa.m vaa aaha `passaamii'ti, passa.m vaa aaha `na passaamii'ti {so ajaana.m vaa aha.m jaanaamiiti, jaana.m vaa aha.m na jaanaamiiti, apassa.m vaa aha.m passaamiiti, passa.m vaa aha.m na passaamiiti (pii0 ka0) evamuparipi}. iti attahetu ^a^P5.0265^ea^ vaa parahetu vaa aamisaki~ncikkhahetu vaa sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] ``pisu.navaaco hoti. ito sutvaa amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa imesa.m ^a^T5.0286^ea^ akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti samaggaana.m vaa bhettaa {bhedaataa (ka0)}, bhinnaana.m vaa anuppadaataa, vaggaaraamo vaggarato vagganandii vaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.
[03] ``pharusavaaco hoti. yaa saa vaacaa a.n.dakaa kakkasaa paraka.tukaa paraabhisajjanii kodhasaamantaa asamaadhisa.mvattanikaa, tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] ``samphappalaapii hoti akaalavaadii abhuutavaadii anatthavaadii adhammavaadii avinayavaadii; anidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti akaalena anapadesa.m apariyantavati.m anatthasa.mhita.m. eva.m kho, cunda, catubbidha.m vaacaaya asoceyya.m hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, cunda, tividha.m manasaa asoceyya.m hoti? idha, cunda, ekacco abhijjhaalu hoti. ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m ta.m abhijjhaataa {abhijjhitaa (ka0) ma0 ni0 1.440 passitabba.m} hoti -- `aho vata ya.m parassa ta.m mamassaa'ti.
[03] ``byaapannacitto hoti padu.t.thamanasa"nkappo -- `ime sattaa ha~n~nantu vaa bajjhantu vaa ucchijjantu vaa vinassantu vaa maa vaa ahesu'nti {maa vaa ahesu.m iti vaa ti (sii0 pii0 ka0)}.

[03] ``micchaadi.t.thiko hoti vipariitadassano -- `natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m, natthi huta.m, natthi suka.tadukka.taana.m {natthettha paa.thabhedo} kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, natthi aya.m loko, natthi paro loko, natthi maataa, natthi pitaa, natthi sattaa opapaatikaa, natthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ^a^V3.0234^ea^ ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti. eva.m kho, cunda, manasaa tividha.m asoceyya.m hoti.

[03] ``ime ^a^M3.0475^ea^ ^a^P5.0266^ea^ kho, cunda, dasa akusalakammapathaa {akusalaa kammapathaa (?)}. imehi kho, cunda, dasahi akusalehi kammapathehi samannaagato kaalasseva u.t.thahantova ^a^T5.0287^ea^ sayanamhaa pathavi.m cepi aamasati, asuciyeva hoti; no cepi pathavi.m aamasati, asuciyeva hoti.
[03] ``allaani cepi gomayaani aamasati, asuciyeva hoti; no cepi allaani gomayaani aamasati, asuciyeva hoti.
[03] ``haritaani cepi ti.naani aamasati, asuciyeva hoti; no cepi haritaani ti.naani aamasati, asuciyeva hoti.
[03] ``aggi.m cepi paricarati, asuciyeva hoti, no cepi aggi.m paricarati, asuciyeva hoti.
[03] ``pa~njaliko cepi aadicca.m namassati, asuciyeva hoti; no cepi pa~njaliko aadicca.m namassati, asuciyeva hoti.

[03] ``saayatatiyaka.m cepi udaka.m orohati, asuciyeva hoti; no cepi saayatatiyaka.m udaka.m orohati, asuciyeva hoti. ta.m kissa hetu? ime, cunda, dasa akusalakammapathaa asuciiyeva {asucicceva (syaa0)} honti asucikara.naa ca.

[03] ``imesa.m pana, cunda, dasanna.m akusalaana.m kammapathaana.m samannaagamanahetu nirayo pa~n~naayati, tiracchaanayoni pa~n~naayati, pettivisayo pa~n~naayati, yaa vaa {yaa ca (ka0)} pana~n~naapi kaaci duggatiyo {duggati hoti (syaa0 ka0)}.
[03] ``tividha.m kho, cunda, kaayena soceyya.m hoti; catubbidha.m vaacaaya soceyya.m hoti; tividha.m manasaa soceyya.m hoti.

[03] ``katha.m ^a^V3.0235^ea^, cunda, tividha.m kaayena soceyya.m hoti? idha, cunda, ekacco paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti nihitada.n.do nihitasattho, lajjii dayaapanno, sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati.

[03] ``adinnaadaana.m ^a^M3.0476^ea^ pahaaya, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m gaamagata.m vaa ara~n~nagata.m vaa, na ta.m adinna.m {ta.m naadinna.m (ka0 sii0, ma0 ni0 1.441)} theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadaataa hoti.

[03] ``kaamesumicchaacaara.m pahaaya, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato ^a^T5.0288^ea^ hoti yaa taa maaturakkhitaa piturakkhitaa maataapiturakkhitaa bhaaturakkhitaa bhaginirakkhitaa ~naatirakkhitaa gottarakkhitaa dhammarakkhitaa sasaamikaa saparida.n.daa antamaso ^a^P5.0267^ea^ maalaagu.laparikkhittaapi, tathaaruupaasu na caaritta.m aapajjitaa hoti. eva.m kho, cunda, tividha.m kaayena soceyya.m hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, cunda, catubbidha.m vaacaaya soceyya.m hoti? idha, cunda, ekacco musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti. sabhaggato vaa parisaggato vaa ~naatimajjhagato vaa puugamajjhagato vaa raajakulamajjhagato vaa abhiniito sakkhipu.t.tho -- `ehambho purisa, ya.m jaanaasi ta.m vadehii'ti, so ajaana.m vaa aaha `na jaanaamii'ti, jaana.m vaa aaha `jaanaamii'ti, apassa.m vaa aaha `na passaamii'ti, passa.m vaa aaha `passaamii'ti. iti attahetu vaa parahetu vaa aamisaki~ncikkhahetu vaa na sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] ``pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya, pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti -- na ito sutvaa amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, na amutra vaa sutvaa imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa sahitaana.m vaa anuppadaataa samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] ``pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti. yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa, tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] ``samphappalaapa.m ^a^V3.0236^ea^ pahaaya, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii; nidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m. eva.m kho, cunda ^a^T5.0289^ea^, catubbidha.m vaacaaya soceyya.m hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M3.0477^ea^, cunda, tividha.m manasaa soceyya.m hoti? idha, cunda, ekacco anabhijjhaalu hoti. ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m ta.m anabhijjhitaa hoti -- `aho vata ya.m parassa ta.m mamassaa'ti.

[03] ``abyaapannacitto hoti appadu.t.thamanasa"nkappo -- `ime sattaa averaa hontu {ida.m pada.m sii0 syaa0 pii0 potthakesu natthi, tathaa ma0 ni0 1.441} abyaapajjaa, aniighaa sukhii attaana.m pariharantuu'ti.

[03] ``allaani cepi gomayaani aamasati, suciyeva hoti; no cepi allaani gomayaani aamasati, suciyeva hoti.
[03] ``haritaani cepi ti.naani aamasati, suciyeva hoti; no cepi haritaani ti.naani aamasati, suciyeva hoti.

[03] ``mayamassu, bho gotama, braahma.naa naama. daanaani dema, saddhaani karoma -- `ida.m daana.m petaana.m ~naatisaalohitaana.m upakappatu, ida.m daana.m petaa ~naatisaalohitaa paribhu~njantuu'ti. kacci ta.m, bho gotama, daana.m petaana.m ~naatisaalohitaana.m upakappati; kacci te petaa ~naatisaalohitaa ta.m daana.m paribhu~njantii''ti? ``.thaane kho, braahma.na, upakappati, no a.t.thaane''ti.

[03] ``katama.m ^a^V3.0238^ea^ pana, bho {katama~nca pana bho (sii0 pii0) katama.m (syaa0)} gotama, .thaana.m, katama.m a.t.thaana''nti? ``idha, braahma.na, ekacco paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, musaavaadii hoti, pisu.navaaco hoti, pharusavaaco hoti, samphappalaapii hoti, abhijjhaalu hoti, byaapannacitto hoti, micchaadi.t.thiko ^a^T5.0291^ea^ hoti. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa niraya.m upapajjati. yo nerayikaana.m sattaana.m aahaaro, tena so tattha yaapeti, tena so tattha ti.t.thati. idampi {ida.m (syaa0)} kho, braahma.na, a.t.thaana.m yattha .thitassa ta.m daana.m na upakappati.

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi ^a^V3.0250^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato puggalo na sevitabbo. katamehi dasahi? paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, musaavaadii hoti, pisu.navaaco hoti, pharusavaaco ^a^T5.0303^ea^ hoti, samphappalaapii hoti, abhijjhaalu hoti, byaapannacitto hoti, micchaadi.t.thiko hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato puggalo na sevitabbo.

[03] ``dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato puggalo sevitabbo. katamehi dasahi? paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato ^a^P5.0282^ea^ hoti, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, anabhijjhaalu hoti, abyaapannacitto hoti, sammaadi.t.thiko hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato puggalo sevitabbo''.

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi ^a^T5.0307^ea^ ^a^M3.0490^ea^ ^a^V3.0252^ea^ ^a^P5.0283^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi dasahi? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco paa.naatipaatii hoti luddo lohitapaa.ni hatapahate nivi.t.tho adayaapanno sabbapaa.nabhuutesu {natthettha paa.thabhedo}.
[03] ``adinnaadaayii hoti. ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m gaamagata.m vaa ara~n~nagata.m vaa, ta.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadaataa hoti.

[03] ``kaamesu micchaacaarii hoti. yaa taa maaturakkhitaa piturakkhitaa maataapiturakkhitaa bhaaturakkhitaa bhaginirakkhitaa ~naatirakkhitaa gottarakkhitaa dhammarakkhitaa sasaamikaa saparida.n.daa antamaso maalaagu.laparikkhittaapi, tathaaruupaasu caaritta.m aapajjitaa hoti.

[03] ``musaavaadii hoti. sabhaggato vaa parisaggato vaa ~naatimajjhagato vaa puugamajjhagato vaa raajakulamajjhagato vaa abhiniito sakkhipu.t.tho -- `ehambho purisa, ya.m jaanaasi ta.m vadehii'ti, so ajaana.m vaa aaha `jaanaamii'ti, jaana.m vaa aaha `na jaanaamii'ti, apassa.m vaa aaha `passaamii'ti, passa.m vaa aaha `na passaamii'ti. iti attahetu vaa parahetu vaa aamisaki~ncikkhahetu vaa sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] ``pisu.navaaco hoti -- ito sutvaa amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti samaggaana.m vaa bhettaa bhinnaana.m vaa anuppadaataa vaggaaraamo ^a^T5.0306^ea^ vaggarato vagganandii, vaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.
[03] ``pharusavaaco ^a^V3.0253^ea^ hoti -- yaa saa vaacaa a.n.dakaa kakkasaa paraka.tukaa paraabhisajjanii kodhasaamantaa asamaadhisa.mvattanikaa, tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] ``samphappalaapii ^a^M3.0491^ea^ hoti akaalavaadii abhuutavaadii anatthavaadii adhammavaadii avinayavaadii, anidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti akaalena anapadesa.m apariyantavati.m anatthasa.mhita.m.
[03] ``abhijjhaalu ^a^P5.0284^ea^ hoti. ya.m ta.m parassa paravittuupakara.na.m ta.m abhijjhaataa hoti -- `aho vata ya.m parassa ta.m mama assaa'ti.
[03] ``byaapannacitto hoti padu.t.thamanasa"nkappo -- `ime sattaa ha~n~nantu vaa bajjhantu vaa ucchijjantu vaa vinassantu vaa maa vaa ahesu'nti.

[03] ``micchaadi.t.thiko hoti vipariitadassano -- `natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m, natthi huta.m, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, natthi aya.m loko, natthi paro loko, natthi maataa, natthi pitaa, natthi sattaa opapaatikaa, natthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

[03] ``dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi dasahi? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno, sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ ``sa.msappaniiyapariyaaya.m ^a^M3.0495^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, dhammapariyaaya.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sa.msappaniiyapariyaayo dhammapariyaayo? kammassakaa, bhikkhave, sattaa kammadaayaadaa kammayonii kammabandhuu kammapa.tisara.naa, ya.m kamma.m karonti -- kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa -- tassa daayaadaa bhavanti.

[03] ``jimhagatikassa kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, jimhupapattikassa dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m vadaami -- ye vaa ekantadukkhaa nirayaa yaa vaa sa.msappajaatikaa tiracchaanayoni. katamaa ca saa, bhikkhave, sa.msappajaatikaa tiracchaanayoni? ahi vicchikaa satapadii nakulaa bi.laaraa muusikaa uluukaa, ye vaa pana~n~nepi keci tiracchaanayonikaa sattaa manusse disvaa sa.msappanti. iti kho, bhikkhave, bhuutaa bhuutassa upapatti hoti. ya.m karoti tena upapajjati. upapannamena.m phassaa phusanti. evamaha.m, bhikkhave, `kammadaayaadaa sattaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, daharatagge ce so aya.m {ce aya.m (syaa0)} kumaaro metta.m cetovimutti.m bhaaveyya, api nu kho {api nu so (?)} paapakamma.m kareyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``akaronta.m kho pana paapakamma.m api nu kho dukkha.m phuseyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante. akaronta~nhi, bhante, paapakamma.m kuto dukkha.m phusissatii''ti!

[03] ``bhaavetabbaa kho panaaya.m, bhikkhave, mettaacetovimutti itthiyaa vaa purisena vaa. itthiyaa vaa, bhikkhave, purisassa vaa naaya.m kaayo aadaaya gamaniiyo. cittantaro aya.m, bhikkhave ^a^V3.0268^ea^, macco. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ya.m kho me ida.m ki~nci pubbe iminaa karajakaayena paapakamma.m kata.m, sabba.m ta.m idha vedaniiya.m; na ta.m anuga.m bhavissatii'ti. eva.m bhaavitaa kho, bhikkhave, mettaa cetovimutti anaagaamitaaya sa.mvattati, idha pa~n~nassa bhikkhuno uttari {uttari.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vimutti.m appa.tivijjhato.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 2.16} atha ^a^V3.0269^ea^ kho a~n~nataro braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yenamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjantii''ti? ``adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu kho, braahma.na, evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjantii''ti.

[03] ``ko pana, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo ^a^T5.0324^ea^ yenamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa ^a^P5.0302^ea^ para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjantii''ti? ``dhammacariyaasamacariyaahetu kho, braahma.na, evamidhekacce sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjantii''ti.

[03] ``na kho aha.m imassa bhoto gotamassa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. saadhu me bhava.m gotamo tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaaha.m imassa bhoto gotamassa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaaneyya''nti. ``tena hi, braahma.na, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi ^a^M3.0506^ea^; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho so braahma.no bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ ``dasahi ^a^V3.0271^ea^ ^a^M3.0507^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi dasahi? paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, musaavaadii hoti, pisu.navaaco hoti, pharusavaaco hoti, samphappalaapii hoti, abhijjhaalu hoti, byaapannacitto hoti, micchaadi.t.thiko hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato ^a^T5.0326^ea^ yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

[03] ``dasahi ^a^P5.0304^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi dasahi? paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, anabhijjhaalu hoti, abyaapannacitto hoti, sammaadi.t.thiko hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti.

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ ``viisatiyaa, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi viisatiyaa? attanaa ca paa.naatipaatii hoti, para~nca paa.naatipaate samaadapeti; attanaa ca adinnaadaayii hoti, para~nca adinnaadaane samaadapeti; attanaa ca kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, para~nca kaamesumicchaacaare samaadapeti; attanaa ca musaavaadii hoti, para~nca musaavaade samaadapeti; attanaa ca pisu.navaaco hoti, para~nca pisu.naaya vaacaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca pharusavaaco hoti, para~nca pharusaaya vaacaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca samphappalaapii hoti, para~nca samphappalaape samaadapeti; attanaa ca abhijjhaalu hoti, para~nca abhijjhaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca byaapannacitto hoti, para~nca byaapaade samaadapeti; attanaa ca micchaadi.t.thiko hoti, para~nca micchaadi.t.thiyaa samaadapeti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, viisatiyaa dhammehi ^a^T5.0327^ea^ samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

[03] ``viisatiyaa ^a^V3.0272^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi viisatiyaa? attanaa ca paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti ^a^M3.0508^ea^, para~nca paa.naatipaataa verama.niyaa samaadapeti; attanaa ca adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca adinnaadaanaa verama.niyaa samaadapeti; attanaa ca kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.niyaa samaadapeti; attanaa ca musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca musaavaadaa verama.niyaa samaadapeti; attanaa ca pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.niyaa samaadapeti; attanaa ca ^a^P5.0305^ea^ pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.niyaa samaadapeti; attanaa ca samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca samphappalaapaa verama.niyaa samaadapeti; attanaa ca anabhijjhaalu hoti, para~nca anabhijjhaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca abyaapannacitto hoti, para~nca abyaapaade samaadapeti; attanaa ca sammaadi.t.thiko hoti, para~nca sammaadi.t.thiyaa samaadapeti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, viisatiyaa dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ ``ti.msaaya, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi ti.msaaya? attanaa ca paa.naatipaatii hoti, para~nca paa.naatipaate samaadapeti, paa.naatipaate ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ^a^T5.0328^ea^ ca adinnaadaayii hoti, para~nca adinnaadaane samaadapeti, adinnaadaane ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, para~nca kaamesumicchaacaare samaadapeti, kaamesumicchaacaare ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca musaavaadii hoti, para~nca musaavaade samaadapeti, musaavaade ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca pisu.navaaco hoti, para~nca pisu.naaya vaacaaya samaadapeti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca pharusavaaco hoti, para~nca pharusaaya vaacaaya samaadapeti, pharusaaya vaacaaya ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca samphappalaapii hoti, para~nca samphappalaape samaadapeti, samphappalaape ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca abhijjhaalu hoti, para~nca abhijjhaaya samaadapeti, abhijjhaaya ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca byaapannacitto hoti, para~nca byaapaade samaadapeti, byaapaade ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca micchaadi.t.thiko hoti, para~nca micchaadi.t.thiyaa samaadapeti, micchaadi.t.thiyaa ca samanu~n~no hoti -- imehi kho ^a^M3.0509^ea^, bhikkhave, ti.msaaya dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

[03] ``ti.msaaya ^a^V3.0273^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi ti.msaaya? attanaa ^a^P5.0306^ea^ ca paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca paa.naatipaataa verama.niyaa samaadapeti, paa.naatipaataa verama.niyaa ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca adinnaadaanaa verama.niyaa samaadapeti, adinnaadaanaa verama.niyaa ^a^T5.0329^ea^ ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.niyaa samaadapeti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.niyaa ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca musaavaadaa verama.niyaa samaadapeti, musaavaadaa verama.niyaa ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.niyaa samaadapeti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.niyaa ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.niyaa samaadapeti, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.niyaa ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca samphappalaapaa verama.niyaa samaadapeti, samphappalaapaa verama.niyaa ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca anabhijjhaalu hoti, para~nca anabhijjhaaya samaadapeti, anabhijjhaaya ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca abyaapannacitto hoti, para~nca abyaapaade samaadapeti, abyaapaade ca samanu~n~no hoti; attanaa ca sammaadi.t.thiko hoti, para~nca sammaadi.t.thiyaa samaadapeti, sammaadi.t.thiyaa ca samanu~n~no hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, ti.msaaya dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ ``cattaariisaaya, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi cattaariisaaya? attanaa ca paa.naatipaatii hoti, para~nca paa.naatipaate samaadapeti, paa.naatipaate ca samanu~n~no hoti ^a^T5.0330^ea^, paa.naatipaatassa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati; attanaa ca adinnaadaayii hoti, para~nca adinnaadaane samaadapeti, adinnaadaane ca samanu~n~no hoti, adinnaadaanassa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati; attanaa ca kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti ^a^M3.0510^ea^, para~nca kaamesumicchaacaare samaadapeti, kaamesumicchaacaare ^a^P5.0307^ea^ ca samanu~n~no hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarassa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati; attanaa ca musaavaadii hoti, para~nca musaavaade samaadapeti, musaavaade ca samanu~n~no hoti, musaavaadassa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati; attanaa ca pisu.navaaco hoti, para~nca pisu.naaya vaacaaya samaadapeti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya ca samanu~n~no hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya ca va.n.na.m bhaasati; attanaa ca pharusavaaco hoti, para~nca pharusaaya vaacaaya samaadapeti, pharusaaya ^a^V3.0274^ea^ vaacaaya ca samanu~n~no hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya ca va.n.na.m bhaasati; attanaa ca samphappalaapii hoti, para~nca samphappalaape samaadapeti, samphappalaape ca samanu~n~no hoti, samphappalaapassa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati; attanaa ca abhijjhaalu hoti, para~nca abhijjhaaya samaadapeti, abhijjhaaya ca samanu~n~no hoti, abhijjhaaya ca va.n.na.m bhaasati; attanaa ca byaapannacitto hoti, para~nca byaapaade samaadapeti, byaapaade ca samanu~n~no hoti, byaapaadassa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati; attanaa ca micchaadi.t.thiko hoti, para~nca micchaadi.t.thiyaa samaadapeti, micchaadi.t.thiyaa ca samanu~n~no hoti, micchaadi.t.thiyaa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, cattaariisaaya dhammehi samannaagato ^a^T5.0331^ea^ yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

attanaa ca pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.niyaa ca samaadapeti, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.niyaa ca samanu~n~no hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.niyaa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati; attanaa ca samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, para~nca samphappalaapaa verama.niyaa ^a^T5.0332^ea^ samaadapeti, samphappalaapaa verama.niyaa ca samanu~n~no hoti, samphappalaapaa verama.niyaa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati; attanaa ca anabhijjhaalu hoti, para~nca anabhijjhaaya samaadapeti, anabhijjhaaya ca samanu~n~no hoti, anabhijjhaaya ca va.n.na.m bhaasati; attanaa ca abyaapannacitto hoti, para~nca abyaapaade samaadapeti, abyaapaade ca samanu~n~no hoti, abyaapaadassa ca va.n.na.m bhaasati;
